115613800,"{'steamid': '76561198944667660', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1648910489}",brazilian,"Zerei e fiz 100% do jogo, achei ele extremamente pequeno, porém até que é divertido, poderia ser maior e com mais coisas para se fazer, em uma promoção até que vale a pena, principalmente se você jogou e gostou do Assassin's creed IV black flag.",1652825777,1652825777,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

115485741,"{'steamid': '76561198089190959', 'num_games_owned': 1954, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1652566552}",turkish,"[h1] Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry [/h1]

Standalone olarak çıkan bir spinoff'un kaç defa ana oyundan daha iyi olduğuna şahit oldunuz? Ben pek hatırlamıyorum. Dolayısıyla bu oyunun da Ac Black Flag'den (Ac BF) daha iyi bir tecrübe bırakması ben de hiç beklemediğim bir şaşkınlık oluşturmuştur. Şimdi bunun sebeplerinden bahsedelim.

Toplamda 8 saatlik bir macera sunan bu oyunda yine ana oyundaki etkinliklerin hepsi olmasa da kısmen biraz mevcut ve konu olarak Adewale'nin Edward ile olan macerasından sonra neler yaptığını anlatıyor ve senaryo olarak cidden çok daha iyi işler çıkarmışlar. Çünkü o zamanların köle ticareti, haklarının yenmesi ve onlara insan gibi davranılmamasını çok iyi işlemişler. Dolayısıyla tarım alanlarından kölelerin kaçmasını sağlamak size bir zulüm değil aslında vicdani bir görev gibi geliyor. Hakeza hikaye sunumu da çok iyi. Özellikle batmakta olan bir gemideki köleleri kurtarmaya çalışırken çok duygulandım. Yüzümde üzüntülü bir ifade oluştu. Moralim bozuldu. Çok etkileyici bir deneyimdi ve özellikle bu konu Ac Black Flag'in yoksun olduğu konulardan biridir. Black Flag konusu itibariyle hiç heyecan, drama ya da heyecan oluşturmayan aşırı sığ bir konu ilerleyişine sahipti.

Oynanış kısmında ise Ac BF ile birebir aynı olmasına rağmen Adewale'ye özel dövüş animasyonları eklemeleri gözümden kaçmadı ve aynı Connor gibi aşırı vahşi ve yırıtıcı bir dövüşme şekli var. Bu aşırı güzel olmuş. Edward'ın sanki tüy gibi ruhsuzca savurduğu kılıçları düşününce bu karar resmen TPS olan bir oyuna vuruş hissiyatı eklemiş oluyor. Edward insan mı öldürüyor yoksa tereyağına kılıç mı saplıyor belli olmuyordu. Ateşli silah olarak ise Alaybozan diye bilinen blunderbuss var kısa menzilde ne var ne yok herkesi tekte öldürmesi tam Adewale'ye yakışan ve aşırı vahşi bir silah gücü sunuyor.
Grafikler de yine birebir aynı. Yani güzel. Herhangi bir fark göremedim. Hatta Ac BF'deki yavaş render süreleri yani dibimde spawn olduğunu gördüğüm mob lar bile yine burda da var.

Müzikler ve melodiler konusunda kolaya kaçmamışlar ve gerek karakterlerin konuşmasındaki o dile ait ufak dokundurmalar, Afrika'yı hatırlatan eşleştirme müziği ve melodiler aşırı güzel durmuş ve sizi atmosferin içine sokuyor.

Sonuç itibariyle: Hikaye ve oynanış açısından ana oyundan çok daha güzel duran bir yapım karşımızda. Ac BF sıradan bir korsan hikayesiydi ve Ac külliyatına Edward'ın Haytham'ın babası olması dışında hiçbir şey katmıyordu. Bu oyunda ise daha dramatik olaylar silsilesi ve gayet mantıklı işleyen Adewale'nin karakter değişimi var. Ac BF'de ise Edward, sadece Adewale trip atıp gittiği için Brotherhood'a girmişti ve bu bizde oluşturulan paragöz ve faydacı Edward profiline uymuyordu. Yani Edward'ı zorla ve arkaplanı olmadan Assassin yapmış oluyorlardı. Bu oyunda ise Adewale'nin Edward ile olan macerasından sonra tesadüfen de olsa dünyada özgürlük için uğraşmaya değer çok daha başka işler olduğunu fark ediyor ve kendi tabiriyle 'artık çocukluktan çıkmış' oluyor. Hatta yer yer Edward ve Jackdaw'dan bahsetmesi çok hoş bir ayrıntı olmuş. Farkındayım çok Ac BF ile kıyasladım ama zatne o oyunun spinoff u olduğu için gayet mantıklı.

Ac BF biraz daha açık dünya olduğu ve korsanlık yapmaya izin verdiği için herkesce çok sevildi ama bence Ac ile alakası olmayan çok başka bir yapım. Benim gözümde 5/10 'ten fazla puan alamaz. Ama bu spinoff beni çok etkiledi ve Ac BF den alamadığım zevki bundan aldım. Adamsın Adewale !!!

115395790,"{'steamid': '76561198304856412', 'num_games_owned': 3250, 'num_reviews': 1565, 'playtime_forever': 948, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 948, 'last_played': 1652458832}",french,"histoire étrangement fade et courte, mais ambiance correcte",1652458879,1652458879,False,1,0,0.51086956262588501,0,True,False,False,False,,,

114946134,"{'steamid': '76561198371420009', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1626427117}",polish,samodzielne DLC do AC black flag ale jest git,1651685513,1651685513,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

114923678,"{'steamid': '76561198405639652', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 861, 'last_played': 1656181797}",brazilian,"[h1] O Brabo tem nome! [/h1]

Sempre tive vontade de jogar o Freedom Cry desde quando platinei o AC 4 no PS3, e agora finalmente joguei, e meu amigo, me diverti pá porra! Todo mundo que jogou o Black flag já ama o personagem, Adéwalé um homem nascido no horror da escravidão, que consegue fugir e se libertar. Virando bucaneiro, quartel-mestre, capitão e por fim mestre-assassino. A história é breve já que é uma DLC, mas é bem massa de se jogar pois as missões são diversificadas e cada vez mais a trama vai se escalando até o ato final, que mostra outra coisa que me faz gostar do Adé, a brutalidade. Meu AC favorito é o 3 justamento por causa do Connor, lutar com ele é a própria manifestação do BRABO, e assim é com o Adé, que chega a ser ainda mais foda, com finalizações muito locas na facãozada ou na garrucha que é a melhor coisa deste jogo, poder estourar cinco caras de uma vez com o bacamarte é deveras satisfatório kkk.

Acho o mapa naval bem suficiente, os navios negreiros e as plantações são bem legais de fazer, mas não tem muito o que se explorar, com tipo umas ilhas com um baúzinho só, contudo era muito chato ficar indo em 300 ilhinhas no 4 pra pegar colecionável, então no fim isso não é um problema. E é bem daora achar as outras armas perdidas pelo mapa e também é rapidão para upar seu navio.
Tive uma ótima experiencia nesse jogo, e me vejo entrando nele mesmo depois de zerar 100% só para descer a mão em uns otários. Vale muito a pena, ainda mais se tu é fã dos jogos das Américas como eu.

114297130,"{'steamid': '76561199167923643', 'num_games_owned': 231, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 664, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 602, 'last_played': 1650902300}",russian,"
[h1] ”Ah shit, here we go again” - чтобы прочистить карту [/h1]
Игра как мини 4-я часть, Hостальгия, вернутся на Карибы сечас, после столиких лет с прохождениа Blak Flag,
Технически то же самое(минимальные новинки вроде мушкетона, мачете); сюжетно интересно;

Mинус что заставляют ”гриндить” рабов чтобы продвинутся(+[spoiler] баг в 8-и мисий игра крашытся при входе на корабль с врабами, и капут-(сменить разрешение) [/spoiler]), мелкие лаги с ботами(то не идут по скрипту; то лаг с анимацыеи)  ВИДНО ЧТО ЗАБИЛИ НА СТАРЫЕ ПРОДУКТЫ!

ДЛС норм, понравилось не смотря на замечания(Ностальгия берет своё), еще из тех времен когда Ubisoft делали адекватные игры, а не гонались за чепухои и трендами.",1650659473,1650833395,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

113502506,"{'steamid': '76561198813287393', 'num_games_owned': 3407, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 589, 'last_played': 1649379731}",english,"Ubisoft has started REMOVING single player games (yes, base games, not just online DLC) that customers BOUGHT, from their library.

If you are thinking about buying this game (and ""BUY"" is the plain wording on every Steam store page), be aware you may only be able to play it for the next 6 weeks, before Ubisoft REMOVES it from your library.

Ubisoft also thinks it is clever to put the game on promotion for new suckers just before REMOVING the game.  Ie AC Liberation HD was on promotion price last week during the Steam summer sale, this week the store page says the game will no longer playable in 6 weeks time.

The Steam store pages (links below) for AC Liberation HD, and Silent Hunter 5, both have notices saying ""Please note this title will not be ACCESSIBLE following September 1st, 2022"".  Even though you BOUGHT these single player games, you will not be able to access them.

Ignore my previous review below, I am setting my review on every Ubisoft game I own to negative.  If you think this practice is unacceptable, please comment, upvote the review, or leave your own review.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/260210/Assassins_Creed_Liberation_HD/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/48110/Silent_Hunter_5_Battle_of_the_Atlantic/
80/100 A really fun 10 hour expansion to Black Flag, which can be purchased as a standalone game, or as a DLC addon to Black Flag.
I really enjoyed freeing slaves, the naval battles, and the beautiful Caribbean setting.  It's fairly short but really enjoyable.

It has the usual Ubisoft rubbish ie poor QA and testing, with a very frustrating bug during the Tail Louis Godin mission, which contiually (more than a dozen times, in different locations, including after Steam verify install and PC restart) left the hub display going but game world went black.  It didn't happen anywhere else, I had to abandon the mission and sink some ships for a while and come back, eventually I found an angle of attack that made it through.",1649380593,1657532024,False,0,1,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

113485210,"{'steamid': '76561199127293392', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 485, 'last_played': 1650311208}",english,"Although it's pretty short, it's very fun, especially if you liked AC Black Flag and a great throwback",1649351784,1649351784,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

113120916,"{'steamid': '76561198188127149', 'num_games_owned': 233, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1577365340}",schinese,"说说阿德瓦勒吧，阿德说过：“虽然我不喜欢当海盗，但是这方法能让我完美地实践刺客的信条”。
阿德是一个值得尊敬的人，玩过的都知道，开山刀，散弹枪就是他的标志。所有系列里面，我最喜欢的就是二太爷跟E叔，还有一个人就是阿德瓦勒。
我就说一点他到底怎么死的，就是给谢伊杀的。谢伊没有错，阿德也没有错。威肯也没错。
只不过他们的效力的方向发生了偏移
我就说说为什么那么敬佩他，临死前他告诫谢伊并说了一句话。
我已经是一个怪物了。
这句话能理解的人自然理解，不能理解的去看看自由呐喊的视频、小说、亲自体验DLC。
没有受过歧视的人是不知道，除了自己，眼睁睁的看着同胞的惨痛经历。
在内心是多么的彷徨，多么的残忍。",1648740271,1648740271,True,0,0,0,0,False,False,False,False,,,

110675426,"{'steamid': '76561198025030419', 'num_games_owned': 661, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 684, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 684, 'last_played': 1645414469}",english,"This is the shortest Assassin's Creed ""game"" there is. It's not a full novel, it's more of a novella. If you can get it for cheap (or free as part of DLC for AC4: Black Flag) then I recommend you play it for the story. It's a short, powerful story that I almost missed because of a few factors.
So here are my critiques:

- It's the second AC game with a black character, and it also happens to be the second AC game that is all about liberating slaves. It would be nice to have a black character that just is, but maybe that's my privilege talking, I don't know.

- It's ALL about rescuing slaves. And the game is realistic in that you can never rescue all the slaves. No matter how many slaves you liberate, there will always be another slaver walking down the street escorting a few more slaves. There are always slave ships in the West Indies to be liberated. Your job is NEVER done. When you start the game, that is extremely depressing.
- The game is VERY short. They set up so much to do with upgrading your ship and the Maroons' Hideout, it's almost like the game is unfinished.

All that said, I still recommend the game for the story. It gets pretty intense, emotionally, and I'm glad I played it, for all it's flaws. It's not ESSENTIAL to the AC story continuum, but it's a good, quick read. You can probably finish it in about 5 hours.",1645415561,1645415561,True,1,0,0.496774196624755859,0,True,False,False,False,,,

105633794,"{'steamid': '76561198807413314', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1580989318}",turkish,Ben Black Flag'dan sonra çok sıkıldım ama seriden bağımsız oynanabilir.,1639224436,1639224436,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

105211462,"{'steamid': '76561198191245050', 'num_games_owned': 258, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1666293131}",english,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry is a stand-alone game that was originally a DLC addition for Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag.
Set between the years of 1735 to 1737, you play as Adewale, a man who was born a slave but later found freedom as a pirate on Edward Kenway's ship, the Jackdaw.

Fast forward 15 years and Adewale is now a trained Assassin, shipwrecked in Saint-Domingue, off the coast of Haiti, with no weapons and no crew to help him, he has to find a ship in Port-au-Prince, and gather a brand-new crew, so he can free the slaves, and kill those who enslaved them.

Although a short game at about 3 hours, considering this was a DLC addition, that is a fair amount of gameplay you get without having to purchase Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag, and enough to give you the taste of the main game, and perhaps help convince you to purchase that.

The storyline in Freedom Cry is pretty good, as you would expect from any Assassins Creed game, lots of conspiracies to uncover, different gameplay modes including fighting enemies with a ship, the usual on land Assassins Creed activities, as well as deep dialog and cut scenes.

I am a big Assassin's Creed fan, and I have most of the games, except Assassin's Creed IV, so when the cance came to get Freedom Cry I jumped at it, as to be brutally honest I still have a lot of other Assassin's Creed games to finish, so being able to play a 3 hour game was just about perfect.
The Good

Excellent Graphics that you come to expect from any Assassin's Creed game, the high quality of everything in this franchise is something that should be appreciated. The story on this game is great, and the gameplay itself is top notch.
The Bad
If you are a fan of the Assassin's Creed Franchise then there is no bad here.
Overall
Want a taste of the Assassin's Creed Franchise as a newcomer, then this is a perfect short introduction, experienced in the Franchise and want to play them all, then you cant miss this.
I score Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry a strong 9/10

102804510,"{'steamid': '76561198001198139', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 972, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 972, 'last_played': 1636941587}",english,"I enjoyed Freedom Cry. Adéwalé is a seriously cool hero that makes Edward Kenway look somewhat lame and sleazy by comparison. The subject matter is bold for a AAA and really lets you see the world of Black Flag from a whole new perspective. The ship battle music is simply amazing and helps make sea combat distinct from Black Flag. On the bad side, It doesn't seem to be optimized well for PC. I can run Black Flag at max settings and the frame rate is silky smooth... but in Freedom Cry (which should in theory be exactly the same) is very choppy by comparison, I had to lower my settings and turn off vsync to get a playable experience. The story is pretty good, but lacks the depth and character of Black Flag. I feel like there is a lot of missed potential in terms of missions, they really could have made it epic with just a bit more effort. The AI is a bit dumb compared to Black Flag. Those points aside, it's a decent value and an overall worthy gaming experience.",1636942895,1636942895,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

102099683,"{'steamid': '76561198281883588', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1635866882}",russian,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry это спин-офф созданный на базе четвртой части и рассказывающий историю Адевале после событий четвёртой части.

Сразу начну с того что героя испортили. Раньше (в 4-й части) он был благородным и достаточно терпеливым человеком, в Крике свободы он идёт на пролом спасать всех рабов зная что из за этого будут ещё сильнее мучится другие рабы и в когда Адевале увидит к чему привели его действия он никак не будет сожалеть об этом.

Геймплей остался как в четвёртой части однако теперь чтобы начать некоторые миссии нужно будет то освободить рабов, то зачистить плантацию и всё это достаточно неприятно сказывается на впечатления об игре. Также есть возможность освобождать рабов, получая за это разные улучшения для самого героя.
С технической стороны всё хорошо, однако в одной из миссий пропали рабы за которыми нужно было следовать и из за этого пришлось начинать всю миссию сначала.
Хоть это и дополнение но под него написали неплохую музыку, однако в игру отсeутвуют шанти.
Про графику сказать нечего так как она ничем не отличается от основной игры.
P.S. Для полного погружения рекомендую играть без интерфейса,",1635871213,1646170529,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

101953320,"{'steamid': '76561198447216082', 'num_games_owned': 345, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 326, 'last_played': 1635675641}",russian,"""Пришло время повеселиться"" - думал я. Какая же это была ошибка...) Как говорится: ""Цена на товар не соответствует его качеству"". Это абсолютно не самостоятельная часть, а простое DLC. Я был очень сильно разочарован, когда прошел её всего лишь за 4,5 часа.
[b] Гемплей и графика [/b]

Решил объединит два пункта в один, потому что ничего с Черного флага не изменилось. Почти ничего... При этом все то, что я любил в ЧФ убрали. Так, под ножницы попали морские песни, тут мы плаваем под шум моря. Убрали почти все дополнительные квесты по собиранию. Зато в процесс игры добавили гриндилку, Для начала миссии нужно нагриндить определенно количество рабов. Такая душнина. Игра потеряла свою оптимизацию, даже на низких настройках она тормозит, при том, что устройство не старое.
[b] Сюжет [/b]

С историей Адевале, я считаю, что все тоже не однозначно. Сама история хорошая, да и ГГ благие цели преследует, но вот реализация не очень. Такого персонажа испортили. Из хорошего парня, Аде превратился в Эйдена Пирса. Просто нет слов...
Себестоимость игры должна составлять 99 р. Порекомендую только фанатам серии.",1635677700,1635677700,True,3,1,0.535215020179748535,1,True,False,False,False,,,

101450341,"{'steamid': '76561198092862237', 'num_games_owned': 446, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1631991437}",english,"From expansion to standalone title.

[i]Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry[/i] is an action-adventure downloadable content developed by Ubisoft Québec and published by Ubisoft, first released as a part of Season Pass to [i]Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag[/i], currently also available as a standalone title!
[b]Story[/b]
I recommend playing Assassin's Creed Black Flag before getting into this entry.
Freedom Cry is set 20 years after events that took place in Black Flag.
You play as Adewale, once a slave and right-hand man of Edward Kenway, now a member of Assassin brotherhood.

During his attempt to intercept Templar activity in the Carribean Sea, he is shipwrecked off the coast of Haiti, where he gets involved with Maroons into liberating slaves and fighting for their cause.
[b]Gameplay[/b]
Take Black Flag, make it smaller, replace piracy theme with slavery and voila!
Main elements are the same. Open world featuring naval and land combat/exploration, with progression focused on completing missions and slave liberation.

Biggest change outside of map size which now has been scaled down to being just a mere chunk of Caribbean Sea, comes in activities you can do while roaming. Most of them is now focused on already mentioned slave liberation.

No more forts, assassination contracts or collectibles hunting, here you liberate slaves from auctions or plantations, save those who are wounded or intercept ships with human cargo on board. Every saved person counts as for reaching milestones in that department you get rewarded by receiving new weapons or pouches increasing your item capacity.
Naval combat and exploration remain untouched, with only difference being in ship state, as game features less upgrade options so you can tackle bigger opponents straight from the start.
You still can board enemy ships and plunder them in order to gain materials you might sell or keep for upgrades.
On the ground, instead of two swords Adewale is using a machete, and as a replacement for a pistol he chose blunderbuss so now you can eliminate multiple enemies with a single well placed shot.
He also has new item to play with, firecrakers, which can distract opponents with their noise.
[b]Playtime, replayability and other modes[/b]
It took me 8 hours to complete everything Freedom Cry has to offer, that is 100% missions, exploring, collecting and fully upgrading my ship.
It doesn't have a lot of replayability, plus like most AC titles it offers option of continuing after the ending if you want to replay specific missions, further explore or engage in combat.
Only Single Player story is available.
[b]Pros and cons[/b]

Freedom Cry keeps good elements from Black Flag, including naval gameplay and stealth mechanics, plus adds new activities fitting with a narrative which make it stand out from main game. Story doesn't drag on and additional character development of Adewale is appreciated as his journey was cut rather short in main game.

However, removal of every single activity that was in Black Flag took a toll on exploration, where beside few unique weapons or upgrades you can only collect more coin chests, making this aspect feel unnecessary and boring at times, even with replacement game offers.
Plus keeping most expensive ship upgrades means you still will spend a good moment grinding to obtain resources to improve it, one of less popular elements of Black Flag.
Guess that's a one way to keep player busy for a bit longer.
Also standalone version of the game doesn't have shanties! Unthinkable.
[b]Final words and conclusion[/b]

If you are wondering about the differences between DLC and Standalone version of Freedom Cry, from what I could gather there aren't any, beside already mentioned lack of shanties in standalone version. However dlc has some audio issues from what I've read and obviously you need to own Black Flag before being able to play Freedom Cry.
Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry brings out more of gameplay known from Black Flag, with new storyline and activities that fit  into new theme. Short, but a decent adventure nonetheless.
Check out [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/31947302/] my curator page for more reviews! [/url]",1634925351,1634925758,True,46,1,0.835142016410827637,9,True,False,False,False,,,

100733765,"{'steamid': '76561198842269103', 'num_games_owned': 3397, 'num_reviews': 285, 'playtime_forever': 12021, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12020, 'last_played': 1680399448}",schinese,"[h1]及格的DLC[/h1]

刺客信条4:自由呐喊是继艾芙琳之后的第二部单人战役DLC，讲述了寒鸦号黑人大副Adewale的故事。在登上爱德华·肯威的寒鸦号成为一名海盗后，他发现属于自己的自由。15年后，Adewale已成为一名训练有素的刺客，在圣多明哥遭遇船难，以此来开启他的复仇之路。自由度方面还不算太出彩，就是打打猎，找找隐藏物品，完成一些支线任务之类不过总体来说游戏素质很让人满意，特别是先祖记忆剧情和历史剧情节奏融合方面做的非常优秀。
[h1]Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry[/h1]

自由呐喊DLC就仿佛是一整部浓缩的刺客信条，这既有好处，也有坏处。可惜的是，自由呐喊摒弃了刺客信条黑旗中对系列所做的改进内容。平淡的任务和令人讽刺的缺少自由度的自由呐喊感到有些失望。不过除此之外，Adewale的故事从内心深处更能打动人，自由呐喊所描写的故事是整个游戏界此前鲜有涉足的领域，而抛开了刺客与圣堂武士的神秘纠葛也让这部DLC的剧情展现出了独特的活力。",1633708405,1633708405,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

100722203,"{'steamid': '76561198453254882', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 466, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 466, 'last_played': 1633690868}",schinese,剧情太短，不值这个价钱。,1633692058,1633692058,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

95630083,"{'steamid': '76561199177676493', 'num_games_owned': 36, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1647179779}",english,no,1626130720,1626130720,True,0,0,0.427293449640274048,0,True,False,False,False,,,

95539142,"{'steamid': '76561198808110995', 'num_games_owned': 577, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 541, 'last_played': 1625971105}",english,"I have played almost every AC game but unfortunately Freedom Cry escaped my little completionist hands for YEARS!

But this last Summer sale I picked it up and decided I would start to stream games again! I played this standalone expansion of AC Black Flag since it featured Adewale who I really enjoyed in AC Black Flag.

The story is really nice and has some hard hitting moments that just remind you that while this is a short side story game. It's still a high quality experience you should expect to enjoy. I wish the story hadn't stopped 9 missions in!

The gameplay is as good as AC Black Flag so if you enjoyed Black Flag; you'll like it! If you haven't even played Black Flag you need to play that first since Freedom Cry seems to take place after the game.

The location is very important since most of us these days expect a nice map grind at the LEAST! And I'm not going to lie in Black Flag I loved every inch of that sea filled map! But in Freedom Cry very few locations of the handful of locations were actually interesting. A lot of empty islands with a chest maybe. It just falls short in the location. The areas that are nice; are quite nice. But overall not a lot of reason to explore the whole map unless you're a completionist like me.
Overall, the game is pretty cheap and is a solid experience for the price and expectations of it!",1626011023,1626011023,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

95349402,"{'steamid': '76561198187716814', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1625729400}",russian,"Пусть и не всем известная игра, но реально годная. Имеет несколько схожие задания, но вся серия Assassin's Creed такая, так что вообще топ! Интересная персонализация, вооружение, сама динамика и функционал, буквально свой флот собираешь и управляешь им! Благодаря этой части я узнал о подлых планах со стороны самого братства Ассассинов и это реально топово... Особенно переплетение этой части с серией 3 и 4 частью Assassin's Creed, не считая отсылки и намеки на остальные части этой серии!
- коротко говоря: мне очень понравилось, прошел еще не до конца, но играется на одном дыхании, советую!",1625770624,1625770624,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

94593607,"{'steamid': '76561198045377291', 'num_games_owned': 1686, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1624897397}",english,"Fairly decent expansion to Assassin's Creed IV. Been a while since I played that game so had to get used to the controls again.

Story alone take about 3 hours to complete so it's short but there is loads of side activities to keep you busy, so really more likely 8 to 10 hours to do everything. As you can see I just focused on the story.

Navel combat is fun as well as the general assassination gameplay. Basically the same side-activities from IV with the addition of Plantations. You have the side-activity of freeing slaves which goes towards unlocking better gear for your character which is interesting.
Pretty fun expansion to be honest.",1624897751,1624897751,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

94507640,"{'steamid': '76561198046409727', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 2808, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1684536233}",schinese,很好很好，非常好！！！！！！！,1624803770,1624803770,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

94274221,"{'steamid': '76561197993420097', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 501, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 501, 'last_played': 1617394118}",russian,"Assassin`s Creed Freedom Cry изначально была выпущена в качестве дополнения к Assassin`s Creed Black Flag, а уже после этого перенесена в отдельную игру. Главным героем данной игры является Адевале, бывший раб и квартермейстер Эдварда Кенуэя из Black Flag, поэтому для лучшего ознакомления с главным героем рекомендую сначала пойти Black Flag.
Сюжетная линия очень короткая и проходится за несколько часов.
Во многих аспектах, таких как графика и механика, Freedom Cry повторяет Черный Флаг, из изменений можно отметить:

-	Геймплей – его основу теперь составляет освобождение рабов, которое бывает нескольких видов: освобождение сразу большого количества рабов на плантациях и невольничьих кораблях, и точечное освобождение в городе. На освобождении рабов построено продвижение по сюжету, улучшение экипировки и корабля.
-	Карта была существенно урезана. Существует одно крупное поселение, несколько плантаций для освобождения рабов, пару мелких островков и всего лишь одно подводное задание.
-	Изменилось оружие. Теперь главный герой сражается с мачете и мушкетом.
Из минусов могу отметить миссии со слежкой, они меня выбешивали еще в Black Flag,  теперь благополучно перекочевали и сюда.

,1624547749,1624547749,True,9,0,0.644817590713500977,0,True,False,False,False,,,

94011816,"{'steamid': '76561198321220770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1163, 'last_played': 1698054912}",english,asdf,1624116684,1624116684,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

93967716,"{'steamid': '76561198820517646', 'num_games_owned': 241, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 707, 'last_played': 1706203148}",russian,"Отличное продолжение Адевале, напоминает Liberation. В 1735 году Порт-о-Пренс являлся центром рабовладения в Вест-Индии. Две тысячи угнетенных мужчин, женщин и детей выращивали кофе и хлопок и занимались производством сахара и индиго под надзором шестисот французов, которые жили в постоянном ожидании кровопролитного восстания.

Потерпев кораблекрушение у берегов острова, известного теперь под названием Гаити, Адевале лишается команды и оружия. В попытке собрать новую команду и раздобыть корабль, он знакомится с местными жителями и начинает помогать им. Однако чем больше он помогает, тем сильнее оказывается втянутым в дела сообщества маронов. Вынужденный снова столкнуться с ужасами своего прошлого, Адевале решает освободить рабов и уничтожить их угнетателей.
Адевале еще увидимся!!! В последний раз...",1624044779,1624044779,True,4,1,0.5846518874168396,0,True,False,False,False,,,

93812587,"{'steamid': '76561198173135393', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 390, 'last_played': 1623790799}",french,,1623778602,1623778602,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

93432790,"{'steamid': '76561198071029804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 428, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 428, 'last_played': 1623190351}",brazilian,"Tu gosta de História? Gosta de Assassin's Creed? Gosta de um mas do outro não? Não gosta de nem um e nem outro?

De qualquer forma, ""Freedom Cry"" não vale a pena. Não me refiro só ao preço, mas ao tempo. Eu sou fã da saga desde 2011, e, atualmente, uma das minhas graduações é História. Posso dizer com convicção que esse ""jogo"" é fraco, com gameplay repetitivo mas que se prolonga muito. Nem a fórmula clássica e fenomenal da saga dá vida a esse gameplay. O mapa, chato e sem vida, também é minúsculo pra caramba. A narrativa é muito morna, sem emoção alguma. E os gráficos, por algum motivo absurdo, são um downgrade monstro se comparados ao ""Black Flag.""
Dublagem: 7/10
Áudio e OST: 7/10
Enredo: 5/10
Visuais: 5/10
Gameplay: 7/10

93375791,"{'steamid': '76561198042383071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 249, 'playtime_forever': 483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 483, 'last_played': 1623100413}",english,"Solid game and definitely another Assassin's Creed game with roughly ~7-10 hours of gameplay. I was initially interested because of the AC: Black Flag tie-ins but I found this game definitely stands on its own two legs and doesn't lean into AC: Black Flag much at all (which is both a good and bad thing).

Outside of the gameplay the story definitely hits on some heavy tones in the story about slavery, racism, and more. One fascinating feature to this game was that you could build up a resistance by saving people ultimately making your forces bigger and bigger. This ultimately concluded with no real pay-off in the story or mission fighting alongside your resistance and was just a means to an end with upgrading equipment. I think if this game executed the resistance in a more meaningful way I would be stoked about this game. Unfortunately since it didn't, I still recommend this game but know what you are walking into and maybe wait for a sale!",1623101200,1623101200,True,7,0,0.601656556129455566,0,True,False,False,False,,,

91829866,"{'steamid': '76561198849406041', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1280, 'last_played': 1696023884}",english,It was a different type of game for me but allot of fun,1620751741,1620751741,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

91765976,"{'steamid': '76561198006349779', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1440296634}",brazilian,"Resolvi fazer um review a parte porque o game praticamente é um outro, tanto que o que eu comprei foi o Standalone pack.
São meras 4 horas, mas foram excelentes 4 horas. Adewelé é um protagonista muito foda, pqp. Ele merecia uma game completo.

O game tem um enredo bem interessante, com o Adewelé lutando pela liberdade dos escravos em Porto Príncipe e arredores. O enredo é bem consistente, apesar de que o tal Governador que é tanto mencionado mas aparece só no final. Mas dado o que vc passava no game, acho que nunca fiquei tão puto com um vilão, ainda mais a conversa que ele tem com o Adewelé no final.
O gameplay é bem variado, vc ajuda os escravos de diversas formas. E libertar os escravos dos navios negreiros, usando a mesma tática de abordar navios na pirataria de Black Flag foi uma boa sacada.

E o Adewelé é bem mais violento. Não só porque ele é mais forte mas o cara usa um fucking facão pra lutar. E crava o facão na cabeça, nas pernas. As lutas são brutais. Ainda mais estando meio que com sangue nos zói de ver os escravos sofrendo.
A missão perto do final no navio negreiro foi tensa. Entra pra lista de missões tensas/emocionantes da série e até dos jogos no geral.
Ah, as músicas são muito fodas, elas combinam demais. Dão todo um ar épico pro game. E aqui, trocaram a cantoria dos piratas pelas cantorias dos escravos nas plantações de açúcar. Tão boas quanto.
E um fato curioso. Eu achei a dublagem aqui mais bem trabalhada. Sincronia e voz estavam mais de acordo do que em Black Flag. Provavelmente por ser um game menor e ter saído depois.
No geral, vou dar uma nota maior que BF porque ele é um BF com um acabamento melhor.

91232341,"{'steamid': '76561198138786964', 'num_games_owned': 360, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 529, 'last_played': 1619878828}",english,"After releasing Assassin's Creed III and accompanying it with a smaller release, Assassin's Creed Liberation, Ubisoft thought of doing the same with Assassin's Creed IV and expand on the beautiful Caribbean world they crafted under the form of Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry.

Both the DLC and Standalone versions are one and the same which kinda degrades from the Standalone copy, it definitely feels like an Assassin's Creed game but not as feature-complete as its parent release, Assassin's Creed IV which is understandable but the introduction of new weapons and firearms really was a fantastic selling point for the game. Not only that but new gameplay mechanics were introduced that related to the main character and his story, freeing slaves and building up a revolutionary front.

The campaign is quite short and predictable and the exploration area feels very dwarfed when compared to the other games, but nonetheless, quite a great deal of fun this game was.",1619880287,1619880287,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

90600669,{'steamid': '76561198114628232', 'num_games_owned': 1734, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1618946809}",english,"I never rage quit as much as I rage quit in Black Flag and Freedom Cry. The game is not hard, the stories are cool, the setting is awesome, but the controls are some of the most atrocious, frustrating, rage inducing in any game I have ever played. The characters you control never do what they have to, the auto lock system that can't be disabled always forces you on paths you don't want to take. You want to jump forward? ow, look, something to lock on to the left and automatically change direction. You want to run past enemies? Oh, let's lock onto them, stop running and get beaten. You want to jump from a ledge onto an enemy? oh, look, another ledge, let's lock on to that, get discovered and fuck up the entire mission. I swear I've been fighting more with the camera and the controls than with the enemies. Thank got they ditched this gameplay system in later installments",1618872309,1618872309,False,0,0,0.462809920310974121,0,True,False,False,False,,,

90163963,"{'steamid': '76561198336656213', 'num_games_owned': 841, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1618136155}",english,"Played using max settings and SMAA at 4K 60 fps (AMD Ryzen 3800x, RX 6800 XT and 32 GB DDR4 RAM) using a ReShade preset.
Gameplay: 8/10 - Good old Assassin's Creed 4 style combat.
Story: 6.5/10 - Overall enjoyable, but nothing special. Didn't put me to sleep.
Graphics: 7/10 - Looks good for 2014.
Music and sound design: 6.5/10 - Soundtrack had a recognizable motif, but was not memorable. SFX decent.
Replayability: 5/10 - Small map. Nothing left to do once you finish the story and grab the few collectibles.

A formulaic, standalone DLC entry for AC4 Black Flag, this third-person action/adventure game follows Adewale, a freed slave that used to ride with Black Flag's protagonist Edward Kenway. Adewale's combat style is distinct from Kenway's and definitely felt good, but it's really just more of the same.
The story was an enjoyable experience, especially if you really wanted to know more about him and his convictions following on his appearance in Black Flag; however, it is nothing to cry home about.

There is very limited weapon customization, and no appearance customization at all for Adewale. I accidentally stumbled upon the best machete in the game just exploring on my ship following the first memory sequence. The best ranged weapon comes from 100% synch-ing the short main story, which I was able to do in 6 hours along with obtaining all chests and collectibles.

Freedom Cry looks and runs great on modern hardware, but is capped at 60 fps with horrible screen tearing even with AMD Freesync Premium if the in-game Vsync is turned off, so I recommend playing with Vsync ON.

Overall, if you enjoy the formulaic style of Assassin's Creed games prior to Origins, Freedom Cry is a great short adventure, and worth picking up for cheap.",1618189833,1618189833,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

89003885,"{'steamid': '76561198013580872', 'num_games_owned': 897, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1616582711}",spanish,"Resumen para vagos:
· Si te gusta Assassin's Creed: juégalo.
· Si te gusta Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag: juégalo.
· Si te gusta Assassin's Creed pero no has jugado a Black Flag, juega éste último primero antes de probar Freedom Cry.
· Si no te gusta Assassin's Creed, no sé qué haces leyendo esto.
Fijándome en las demás reseñas, solo veo la palabra ""corto"". ¿Pero qué queréis? Es un DLC de Black Flag que luego se vendió como juego independiente.

Tienes que verlo como un microcosmos de la campaña principal de Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag. Hay navegación en alta mar (con un mapa mucho más reducido), alguna que otra atalaya, misiones secundarias, mejoras del barco etc...
La historia se centra en Adewale, un colega de Edward Kenway,  que ahora es asesino y se dedica a liberar esclavos en las cercanías de Puerto Príncipe (Haití).
Venga un saludito por aquí.

87992785,"{'steamid': '76561198029595021', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1609641109}",czech,"Už od třetího dílu nás Ubisoft tajně připravovalo na to, že budeme hrát někdy za N-mana. Samotný koncept by ani nemusel být tak špatný, ale to zpracování je hrozné. Děj se odehrává po Black Flag a hrajete za Adéwalé, poddůstojníka Edwarda. To, že se z něj stal asasín mi nevadí, ale že má najednou z ničeho nic orlí zrak a celou dobu to nebylo na něm ve čtyřce absolutně znát, je opravdu divné.
Příběh by tu mohl být zajímavý, ale nakonec se v poslední minutě dozvíme, že je to o ničem.

Jak už jde poznat z názvu, tahle hra je o osvobozování otroků. Což je celkem dobrodružné, takových her moc není. Doslova na každém kroku můžete ty černochy posílat na svobodu. Je pěkné to sledovat (aukce černého majetku, bičování, topení jejich hlav, pálení cejchů, zavřeni v kleci, plutí otrokářské lodě, práce na plantážích, černošské průvody v okovech atd. tyto všechny disciplíny lze osvobozovat), ale často je to taky otrava, protože stráže po vás jdou stále i přesto, že je zachránit vážně nechcete. Jako že kvůli repetici, ne rasismu, nejspíš.

Já nejsem žádný rasista, ale (já vím, nezní to přesvědčivě) ta hra vás doslova nutí tyhle věci podstupovat. Pokud to neuděláte, nedostanete se dál v hlavním příběhu. Nebo si dokonce nemůžete koupit lepší zbraň, vyrobit větší vaky, vylepšit svoji loď, musíte k tomu prostě mít určitý počet osvobozených černochů, což mi přijde vážně směšné.
Aspoň tu máme databázi, kde nám píšou, jak to přesně bylo.
Na to, že se to odehrává v takových drsných podmínkách, tak tu ani jednou nezazní slavné slovo na „N“, takže to celkem ztrácí věrohodnost.
Je tu kompletně jiná hudba. Není špatná, hodí se to do jejich tématiky, ale k AC sérii určitě ne.
Mohli tu hru zachránit aspoň postavami z Black flag, ale bohužel nic.
Každopádně hra jako pro mě nic moc, ale dokážu si představit, že z toho musí být lidé černé pleti nadšeni. Pro ně je to majstrštyk.

87832573,"{'steamid': '76561198305265233', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1613744281}",schinese,"要是很多年后阿德还能左手玛雅开山刀右手龙骑大喷枪，那么某个二五仔可能会被做成冰鲜鳕鱼刺身吧........

87824269,"{'steamid': '76561198274976539', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 448, 'last_played': 1604500956}",english,It's very cool .,1614846491,1614846491,True,1,0,0.523809552192687988,0,True,False,False,False,,,

87792471,"{'steamid': '76561198000351285', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 583, 'last_played': 1614791575}",german,"Bislang für mich von allen AC-Teilen (chronologisch bis einschließlich AC Rogue) das schwächste Spiel. Story ist sehr simpel, vorhersehbar und kurz, die Spielwelt teils sehr unsauber gearbeitet und mit so vielen Bugs behaftet, wie ich sie in den von mir bisher gespielten AC-Spielen noch nicht hatte (trotzdem waren allesamt nur leichte Bugs, verglichen mit einem Bethesda-Game darf man von nahezu bugfrei sprechen).

Was das Gameplay angeht, macht man das selbe wie in AC Black Flag, lediglich das Plantagen-Befreien ist neu, was allerdings nicht wirklich zusätzlichen Spielspaß bringt. Auch die Ausbaumechaniken von Schiff und Charakter sind deutlich eingeschränkt - ansich braucht man das Schiff eigentlich garnicht ausbauen, es gibt weder Nebenmissionen noch Aspekte in der Hauptmission, die dies erforderlich machen würden. Es sei denn natürlich, man legt es drauf an und möchte gern einfach so Schlachten mit mehreren Schiffen ausfechten.

Gab es bislang in AC recht schnell den Punkt, an dem man mit seinem Geld nicht mehr wusste wohin, so ist dieser Punkt hier eigentlich seit Beginn da. Truhen sammeln, Leichen plündern, Schiffe ausrauben - wozu? Das bisschen was man in dem Spiel an Geld braucht, bekommt man eigentlich nebenbei.

Habe nun trotzdem überlegt, ob ich dem Spiel einen Daumen nach oben gebe oder nicht. Insgesamt ist es ein typisches AC-Spiel, allerdings stark abgespeckt. Man hat den Eindruck, die Entwickler haben das so nebenbei gemacht.

Daher würde ich sagen: Wer AC mag und auch diesen kleinen Storyschnippsel mitnehmen will, kann sich das Game im Sale holen. Wer allerdings ein wirklich gutes Spiel der AC-Reihe will, oder die Reihe noch garnicht kennt, sollte sich lieber einen anderen Teil der Reihe suchen. Gäbe es einen ""Meh""-Butten, würde ich den drücken, aber da es nicht so ist und ich das Spiel nicht wirklich empfehlen kann, gibts nen Daumen runter.",1614792242,1614792305,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

87738617,"{'steamid': '76561199099269459', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 3464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 972, 'last_played': 1628424081}",schinese,第一次玩的刺客信条系列玩的还是盗版的这部，上来就给我整个海战，不过还行，挺好的,1614706441,1614706441,True,7,2,0.608466148376464844,0,True,False,False,False,,,

87702815,"{'steamid': '76561198842505477', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 705, 'last_played': 1629822085}",schinese,真的很短，同样性质的启示录，兄弟会，叛变，时长至少是这个的两倍长。但如果不是很想玩黑旗，只是想体验一波做海盗的话，就单独入了吧。可是当你单独入了以后，就会想买黑旗了，所以，总的来说，不算差，但不是很推荐。,1614651870,1614651870,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

87560518,"{'steamid': '76561198217308404', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 378, 'last_played': 1614428760}",polish,"Ogólna ocena: 6,7 / 10 [na dzień 27-02-2021]

Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry był oryginalnie dodatkiem do podstawowej wersji „czwórki” i prawdopodobnie lepiej by było, gdyby tak zostało, zaś wydanie osobnej gry było pomysłem niezbyt dobrym (no chyba że pod względem finansowym...)

Żeby była jasność – Black Flag jest grą świetną, choć moim zdaniem słabszą od moim zdaniem absolutnie genialnej „trójki”, bo wpadł w pułapkę ustawioną na twórców sandboxów – eksploracja terenu jest miła, ale cierpi na tym dynamika samej gry. Ogólnie jednak była to rewolucja w dziedzinie serii, bo gracze nigdy wcześniej nie mieli do dyspozycji tak dużego świata gry. Freedom Cry jako samodzielny dodatek został wydany na wzór podstawowej wersji, przy czym JEST TYLKO DODATKIEM. I co z tego wyszło?
Mały sandbox XD

Naprawdę, graficznie gra wymiata, nawet na wysokich a nie najwyższych ustawieniach, choć trochę boli lock na 60 FPS. Dźwiękowo nie jest aż tak dobrze, gdyż szanty morskie nie działają, a powiedziałbym, że to one nadawały klimatu w Black Flagu. Mimo to, w tych dwóch szatach gra trzyma poziom. No ale niestety – fabuła jest nie dość, że krótka, to jeszcze przeciętna. A to wszystko we wcale nie najmniejszej cenie.

Jeśli lubisz serię AC to kolejne 5-6 godzin rozgrywki na pewno Ci się spodoba, w przeciwnym razie masz tu porządny, ale przeciętny produkt będący mieszanką gier RPG i gier akcji. Będzie to najwyższa ocena w moich recenzjach z łapką w górę, ale to też pierwsza część serii, która dała mi raczej negatywny vibe – wszystkie poprzednie chronologicznie oraz Unity dawały uczucie od dosłownego przechodzenia arcydzieł trójki czy tylko nieco jej ustępującej dwójki, poprzez trochę mniej przyjemne, aż do mocno mieszanych Unity, ale zawsze były one bardziej na plus. Tutaj po raz pierwszy naprawdę się zawiodłem.",1614452666,1614452666,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

87181766,"{'steamid': '76561198032499083', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1613930318}",russian,"[h1][i]Небольшое, но по своему интересное «ответвление» от оригинальной серии[/i][/h1]

В первую очередь стоит отметить, что это самостоятельное дополнение для [u]IV[/u][i](Black Flag)[/i] части серии [b]AC[/b]. Самостоятельное - это означает, что [u][b]это дополнение не требует наличия основной части игры[/b][/u].
[hr][/hr]

В этой игре[i][u](DLC)[/u][/i] предстоит играть за чернокожего ассасина Адевале, которого можно было также увидеть в основной сюжетной части [i]AC: Black Flag[/i]. Выглядит Адевале довольно-таки мощным и харизматичным, в арсенале у которого присутствуют практически все те же «игрушки», что и у Эдварда из [i]AC IV: Black Flag[/i], за исключением пистолетов, у Адевале их нет, зато есть мушкетон! Это что-то вроде дробовика, у которого имеются разные версии, как и у меча, каждый предмет имеет свои характеристики.
[hr][/hr]

Сюжет короткий, по большей части посредственный, но есть довольно-таки впечатлительные моменты, особенно ближе к концу(СПОЙЛЕР:[spoiler] очень понравился момент спасения рабов на тонувшем корабле.. печально и красиво.[/spoiler]).
[hr][/hr]

Геймплейно в дополнении все упрощено, денег и ресурсов дают очень много, а тратить их особо тут и не надо, большинство предметов добываются совсем другим путем и вообще вся прокачка экипировки - это либо поиск тайн на островах, которых тут всего-лишь несколько штук, либо спасение рабов, чем больше их спасено, тем больше предметов для улучшения доступно. Прокачка корабля также была упрощена и не составит труда. Игровых активностей тут также гораздо меньше, нет того переизбытка, как в основной части. Разнообразие этих активностей значительно отличается от тех, что были в [i]Black Flag[/i], все эти активности связаны со спасением рабов, от обычного спасения беглеца до освобождения рабов с корабля.
[hr][/hr]

[b][i][u]На прохождение всего дополнения уйдет порядка 3-8 часов[/u][/i][/b], в зависимости от того, делаете ли вы дополнительные активности или идете строго по основному сюжету. Т.е. для тех, кого интересует только сюжет, игра проходится достаточно быстро - за 3-4 часа, если не спидранить. Для любителей прочесать каждый уголок и увидеть заветные 100% и красиво закрашенную карту - на игру уйдет около 6-8 часов.
[hr][/hr]
[b]Стоит ли покупать?[/b]

Если интересуетесь всей серией и Вам интересно узнать частичку истории Адевале, который, помимо IV части, присутствует еще и в [i]«Изгое»[/i], то определенно стоит пройти это небольшое ответвление. Если же Вас интересует только основная сюжетная часть, то пропустив этот кусочек Вы навряд ли упустите что-нибудь важное.",1613933890,1613934057,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

87177952,"{'steamid': '76561198208294597', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 825, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 825, 'last_played': 1613861444}",brazilian,"Mais uma história incrível, com protagonista preto. 85506359,"{'steamid': '76561197986301871', 'num_games_owned': 654, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 678, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 678, 'last_played': 1611848701}",english,"Got this on sale and it's worth it for what I paid. It's a good story, but not really an Assassin's Creed story. It feels less polished than the main game and I had a lot of trouble with weird glitches and odd behaviour of AI, as well as unresponsive controls that just made me angry. An example of the latter is failing to use human shield as the npc I'm trying to use suddenly glitches and is too far away to be used, then I take shot damage. Also difficulties with boarding ships, often I had to just dive into the water and swim to the ship I was boarding and fight alone. Speaking of ships, the ship you sail in this feels as nimble as a brick...it's a pain to sail, and it would stop sailing, go backwards, and then go the opposite way I was intending to go. But aside from the lack of polish, I overall enjoyed this and think it's well worth it on sale. Don't pay full price for it, not ever.",1611849017,1611849017,True,0,1,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

85052196,"{'steamid': '76561198067088551', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 969, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 969, 'last_played': 1431713520}",german,"In Assassins Creed Freedom Cry Schlüpfen wir in die Rolle von Edward Kenways Quartiermeister Adewale. Der Teil steht ganz im Zeichen der Sklavenbefreiung und zeigt mehr die politische Seite der damaligen Zeit.
Positives:
- gutes Gameplay
- dunkelhäutiger Protagonist
- sehr schönes Setting
Negatives:
- Story doch recht öde und unspektakulär
- mit 16 Stunden doch auch recht kurz
Fazit:

Das ehemalige DLC Freedom Cry hätte eher auch ein DLC bleiben sollen, denn als jenes war es sehr gut geeignet. Als Standalone Game in meinen Augen eher weniger. Ich würde dem Spiel am liebsten eine Welle geben, da es nicht unbedingt schlecht ist, aber eben einfach nur meh.",1611174970,1611174970,False,3,0,0.560283660888671875,0,True,False,False,False,,,

84600692,"{'steamid': '76561197992717410', 'num_games_owned': 354, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1564429889}",russian,"Как Standalone DLC нелохо, но немного скучновато.",1610528306,1610528306,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

84455838,"{'steamid': '76561198076705047', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 815, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 815, 'last_played': 1610314314}",english,"I am kind of at two minds about this. In terms of the game itself from a mechanical standpoint it's pretty good. But after all it is just Black Flag. The only changes are that pistols are replaced by a BFG in the form of a blunderbus and that the swords are now machetes. So I cannot give it points for being good as it's mostly a reskin of Black Flag. That being said this one really has no reason to exist aside from a ""Let's make one with slaves in it!"" Story has always been the strong suit of th AC games and considering that Adewale is not a one trick pony in the story of later games this was a missed chance to tell more pieces of his story. Really nothing happens aside from his meeting his future baby mama. There's a governor who controls a slave trade in a region and Adewale frees some slaves then kill said governor. The End.
In any case, this is a Black Flag lite, for those who don't care about the story. It could serve as a demo.",1610314857,1610314857,False,0,0,0.47826087474822998,0,True,False,False,False,,,

84207655,"{'steamid': '76561198353897458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 737, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 737, 'last_played': 1600455143}",english,"Freedom Cry is a game, that lets you play AC IV from a different angle (I bought the standalone version instead of the DLC for ""Black Flag""). This angle is the career of Adéwalé, the former quartermaster on Edward Kenway's ship in Black Flag, after what happened in Assassin's Creed IV. The game is short but if you have played Black Flag before this, it is a nice continuation of the story. Map, gameplay-mechanics and functionalities are similar to Black Flag. It is a nice little additional story to Black Flag but can also be played independently, e.g. if you want to get a taste of what Black Flag feels like (although the story is not in chronological order then). Shanties, graphics etc are also there! Runs without major problems on a WIN10 1909 gaming-PC.",1610010501,1610010501,True,1,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

83581629,"{'steamid': '76561198208147705', 'num_games_owned': 59, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3942, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1863, 'last_played': 1710459738}",brazilian,"Recomendo demais, é um jogo curto por ter sido expansão do Black Flag mas não deixa de ser divertido, vale muito a pena !!!",1609349515,1609349515,True,3,0,0.54356849193572998,0,True,False,False,False,,,

83544776,"{'steamid': '76561198027961382', 'num_games_owned': 192, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 705, 'last_played': 1609307718}",english,"If you liked AC4: Black Flag or AC: Rogue, you'll love this.  You're essentially getting 8 more memories set in that same time period, only from the perspective of Adewale, the quartermaster from Black Flag.  Gameplay is the typical excellent fare of those games.  The graphics look great and it runs well.  Highly recommended.

NOTE: I've seen places mention that you get 3 hours of gameplay with this add-on.  Maaaaaybe if you don't do anything at all other than the story missions and do them quickly.  If you aim for 100% sync at all you're looking at 9+ hours easy.",1609311602,1609311602,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

83526570,"{'steamid': '76561198157068682', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1609290382}",english,"I bought the standalone version over the DLC version because I read there was an issue with a missing sound in the DLC version. Apparently this version is missing sea shanties though, so you can't really win either way. I usually turn the sea shanties off though, so this was the version I went with.

Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry is an extension of the Black Flag story. I wouldn't play this unless you've already completed Black Flag. I really like how they added some gameplay elements instead of just reskining Edward. Adewale fights with a machete, which I feel fits his character more than two pirate cutlasses would. You also get a blunderbuss, which is a pretty cool addition. The missions and naval combat are more of what you're familiar with, and you can upgrade the ship as per usual.

The biggest gameplay addition this time around is freeing slaves. As you free slaves, you'll get new unlocks like bigger ammo pouches and upgraded weapons. I'm sure most people feel pretty good when they're freeing slaves, so it's nice to be able to have those kind of feel good moments in games.

The story is short but sweet. You follow Adewale (the Jackdaw's quartermaster from Black Flag) who is shipwrecked whilst pursuing a Templar Admiral. He then decides to help some local freedom fighters so that they can fight for freedom and independence. This game doesn't take very long to beat, I've gotten all the upgrades and beat the main story in under six hours, but I didn't explore everywhere that you could go and I didn't do any of the diving areas.

So yeah. I'd recommend this game if you're looking for a short time waster, or want some more Black Flag. I would probably get it on sale though, as $15 for what's basically a DLC is a bit steep. It usually goes on sale for about $4ish dollars though, which is a much better price and definitely worth picking up.",1609291032,1609291032,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

83056791,"{'steamid': '76561199041353807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 474, 'last_played': 1608832576}",spanish,"Una expansion del Black Flag pero vendida por separado. 83052221,"{'steamid': '76561198401226948', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 346, 'last_played': 1608827310}",schinese,作为刺客信条4的DLC，流程不算长，但是讲述的故事特别完整。唯一一个我觉得收集品设置比较合理的一款刺客信条（可能是地图小的缘故），开船的时候就说到了寒鸦号好像沉船了，后来真的能在探索潜水地带的时候看到寒鸦号的船头；各探索岛的神秘物品设置的也比较好，真的有种探险的感觉，玛雅刀是真的暴力，砍人就跟切西瓜一样，我都觉得有点太残忍了。。。这就是阿德的暴力美学么？,1608828290,1608828290,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

82939668,"{'steamid': '76561198288219906', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1586165709}",german,"Seeschlachten sind wieder gut gelungen.
Gameplay ist gut gelungen.
Das sind die zwei meiner Meinung nach einzigen Punkte die für das Spiel sprechen.
Nur wenn man auch irgendwas im Spiel erreichen will dann empfehle ich Black Flag weiter.
Die Seeschlachten sind genau die selben genauso wie das Gameplay mit dem Unterschied das man Erfolgserlebnisse hat.

Assasins Creed Freedom Cry ist nichts als ein billiges Black Flag Imitat, das nur dafür gemacht wurde zu zeigen das Ubisoft gegen Sklaverei ist und das legt sich negativ auf die Qualität des Spiels aus.
Also Kein wirkliches Spiel einfach nur Image Verbesserung.

Also falls jemand von euch kurz vor dem Kauf steht rate ich dieser Person auf jeden Fall ab, Black Flag ist um längen besser es lohnt sich mehr und das feature ""Sklaven befreien"" was die einzige Mission von Anfang bis Ende in Freedom Cry ist gibt es auch in Black Flag nur mit dem Unterschied das es noch andere Sachen im Spiel gibt z.B. eine Sinnvolle Story.",1608711597,1608711597,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

Oyun her anı ile sırf olsun diye hazır BLack Flag var neden baş karakteri siyahi yapıp kendini tekrar eden görevlerle olayı uzatıp oynama süresini arttırmıyoruz ki kafasında yapılmış bir oyun.  O yüzden ana seri dışındaki bu oyuna hiç bulaşmayın derim. Tamamen zaman kaydı..",1605992194,1605992194,False,1,0,0.496183186769485474,0,True,False,False,False,,,

79450233,"{'steamid': '76561198933240481', 'num_games_owned': 12, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1028, 'last_played': 1677430449}",schinese,挺有意思的就是登录好麻烦啊，最好合在一起,1605687264,1605687264,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

79390902,"{'steamid': '76561198377915483', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 428, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 428, 'last_played': 1605569793}",latam,"El juego toma lugar 10 años después de Black Flag y aunque la historia es corta, deja una buena sensación, tiene un enfoque moral que no se ve mucho en Black Flag y jugar como Adewale luchando contra la esclavitud de distintas maneras es una idea que logra diferenciar la forma de jugar ambos juegos aunque sea un poco. Además se hacen varias menciones al Jackdaw y los hechos ocurridos en Black Flag y lo que ocurre con Adewale durante el lapso de 10 años entre ambos juegos, junto con unos cuantos Easter Eggs para los que desean saber más de la historia de Black Flag. Recomendado para conseguirlo a precio de oferta y disfrutar unas pocas horas más del ambiente tan bueno que tiene el Caribe (aunque más pequeño) en este juego.",1605571290,1605571290,True,4,0,0.579288065433502197,0,True,False,False,False,,,

79316205,"{'steamid': '76561199084759839', 'num_games_owned': 137, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1057, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1057, 'last_played': 1605408373}",english,never had the chance to play this game because ubisoft simply cant stop to f*ck up every single thing they make,1605458829,1678225733,False,2,3,0.477266401052474976,0,False,False,False,False,,,

79306553,"{'steamid': '76561198036498823', 'num_games_owned': 1354, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 639, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1605600583}",german,"Sicherlich ein gutes Spiel wenn man Black Flag gerade erst gespielt hat und daher die Steuerung kennt und verinnerlicht hat. Meine Spielerfahrung in wenigen ersten Momenten:

Szene Eins: Es ist bei mir schon einige Zeit her, dass ich es gespielt habe und daher kam ich mir etwas unbeholfen vor, als ich in einer Seeschlacht Startete, diese dennoch gewann, aber das Zielschiff versenkte und daraufhin tauchen musste. Beim Tauchen hat mich natürlich gleich ein Hai angegriffen und als ich ihm durch auftauchen entkommen wollte, wurde desynchronisiert.

Szene Zwei: Aufgrund dessen war ich wieder an Bord und das gegnerische Schiff (natürlich?) wieder auf See und ich konnte es kapern. Wie zieht man noch gleich eine Waffe? Habe ich überhaupt eine Waffe? Wie läuft man eigentlich und springen muss doch auch eine Taste sein!? Kein Zeitdruck... Die Crew stirbt gerade im Sekundentakt, aber kein Problem, am Ende schaffe ich es beim dritten Versuch.

Szene Drei: ""Oh Kapitän! Sie verfolgen uns und es sind zu viele!"" Ich fliehe, zerstöre dabei eines der größeren Schiffe im Weg, umsegle einen Wirbelsturm um die Gegner abzuhängen und schaffe es mit nur einem härteren Aufschlag durch eine Welle in den Zielbereich. Ich fühle mich ein weiteres mal gehetzt wie ein Reh zur Jagdzeit, aber ""Hey, first try!""

Szene Vier: Eine Frau läuft vorbei und wird gejagt. Ich checke kurz wie das Menü ging, weil ich jetzt wohl eine Waffe habe. Desynchronisiert. Okay, Frau läuft, Ich auch, da steht drücke LB, ich mache das, nur passiert dadurch nicht viel und ich renne hinter her, bin aber zu spät. Desynchronisiert. Ich fummel im Menü und checke das es Dartpfeile gab und versuche den Mann damit zu stoppen, aber leider habe ich an dieser Stelle des Spieles keine Dartpfeile. Ich bin jetzt zu weit weg um aufzuholen, Frau stirbt und... Desynchronisiert. Frau rennt, ich renne, bin aber wegen diesem einen Passanten zu langsam und Frau stirbt. Desynchronisiert. Ich renne wie ein Irrer los, bin direkt hinter dem Mann und.. zu langsam für Melee. Desynchronisiert. Ich renne und sehe töten und aus dem Augenwinkel noch irgendwas über Y drücken, während in dieser Sekunde... Desynchronisiert. Ich seufze und renne und bin gerade noch nah genug dran um den richtigen Button zu drücken und... easy! First try, weil ich habe die Steuerung ja intus.
So weit zu meinen ersten 28 Minuten in diesem Spiel.

Tldr - Kein Tutorial und man soll einfach gleich alles können. Die Einblendungen für die Steuerung sind viel zu kurz eingeblendet und es läuft darauf hinaus, dass man ständig nur desynchronisiert wird und aufgrund des Stress-Faktors in jeder Minute des Anfangs keine Zeit hat sich mit der Steuerung bekannt zu machen.
Wer Black Flag gerade erst gespielt hat oder plant sich beides zu holen, dem wird es sicher Spaß machen.
Wer das nicht hat, sollte sich aber auf einen harten Spieleinstieg gefasst machen.
Ich will das Spiel damit nicht im ganzen bewerten, was nach 28 Minuten nicht einmal ansatzweise möglich wäre, ich möchte nur allen potentiellen Käufern diesen Hinweis gegeben haben.
Update:

Nach 10 Stunden kann ich sagen, dass das Spiel an sich Spaß gemacht hat und eine sinnvolle Ergänzung zu AC4 Black Flag ist. Das Ende war dennoch nicht sehr befriedigend und letzt endlich wird es natürlich der Geschichte gerecht. Die Sklaven wurden halt nicht durch einen einzelnen Mann befreit.
7.5/10 - Would sneak again",1605446242,1605600799,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

SIM, e COMO cada esquina se repete isso o tempo todo, chega ser chato, inclusive o numero de escravos libertados interferem no liberar das upgrades e mesmo na continuação das missões, sim vc tem que ""farmar"" liberdades pra continuar, o jogo passa idéia de ter sido feito SUPER NA PRESSA, as missões não te fazem explorar o PEQUENO mapa o qual jogamos, os sons do jogo são bugados, as mecaninas de AC sempre foram meio estranhas e as vezes o char faz algo que vc não queria mas nossa... O que gostei foram das tempestades marítimas e os furacões, fora isso... quase nenhuma upgrade do navio, do proprio ADE com as melhorias presas, eu zerei o jogo sem pegar a ""MACHETE"" de aço...O jogo quase não tem opção de arma e ainda prendem atrás do ""libertar"" os escravos... Você depois que ZERA a campanha pode continuar jogando como todo AC pra fazer o 100% mas não tive o menor interesse, bem diferente do Black Flag que rodei cada canto do mapa...As animações rodam em 60 FPS porem no jogo fica em 30 a 40 e as vezes até menos independente do SEU PC... Disseram que versão Independente seria melhorzinha e com menos bugs que a da DLC então eu nem imagino a merlin que a DLC deve ser...",1603380166,1654476405,False,15,0,0.710780024528503418,0,True,False,False,False,,,

77537110,"{'steamid': '76561197966970006', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1603010185}",english,"Freedom Cry is an extra chapter of AC4: Black Flag originally as a DLC to Black Flag is also a stand alone game that brings in just enough new interesting features to make it worth the price. His main weapons is a machete, and its a brutal weapon that gets the blood flying and the blunderbluss, which adds a whole new element of gameplay, because now you can take out a concentrated group of soldiers with one shot. Overall a good game  and worth the asking price.",1602664781,1602664781,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

77107522,"{'steamid': '76561198876337885', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 1074, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1602167150}",russian,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry - отличное дополнение, рассказывающее о новой истории капитана корабля ""Эксперто Креде"" , а так же ассасина Адевале.

Начнем с того, что Адевале - это бывший раб, и бывший квартермейстер который плавал вместе на борту с капитаном Эдвардом Кенуэем, а после стал ассасином и пиратским капитаном, и сражался за освобождение рабов.

Сюжет очень короткий, но более менее захватывающий, есть много отсылок к Черному флагу и Изгою, так же затрагивает и третью часть, между этим есть не слабая связь. Изначально ""Крик свободы"" был дополнением к ""Черному флагу"", а после уже выпущен отдельной игрой, хотя думаю, что отдельной игрой делать было не обязательно. Плюс только в том, что для игры в Крик свободы не требуется копия ""Черного флага"".

Действие разворачивается около берегов острова Гаити, именно около этого острова потерпел кораблекрушение корабль Эдварда Кенуэя ""Галка"". После чего Адевале стал капитаном корабля ""Эксперто Креде"", и начинает помогать рабам. В принципе на этом всём и основан сюжет, кроме как освобождения рабов, тут больше ничего не будет. Освобождение плантации, абордаж кораблей с рабами и тд.
Именно это однообразие угнетает и быстро надоедает!

Геймплей немного отличается от того же ""Черного флага"". Улучшенная система боя, новые анимации и механика, больше крови и новое основное оружие - это мушкетон, довольно-таки отличное оружие и мачете, которым можно рубить врагов. Магазины убраны из игры, для приобретения нового оружия, Вам нужно освобождать рабов. Локации в игре не большие, но часов 15 провести можно, но не больше.
Так же есть улучшения корабля ""Эксперто Креде"".
Графика такая же как и в ""Черном флаге"", отличная.
Озвучка у Адевале понравилась больше чем в ""Черном флаге"", там была немного ужасная озвучка. Звуковое сопровождение в игре тоже порадовало.
Тем кому понравился ""Черный флаг"" и ""Изгой"" , данная часть будет по душе, ну а истинным фанатам АС тем более рекомендую к прохождению!
8 освобожденный рабов из 10!
Обзор составлен из моего мнения, если с чем то не согласны, то в комментариях пишите адекватно. У каждого свое мнение!",1601952648,1601952648,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

76745508,"{'steamid': '76561198391953814', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1610903444}",english,"An honest review from an old fan of the franchise...
Story/Plot/Sypnosis: A simple short story that shows the character development of the legendary Adewale, the quartermaster in Black Flag. No plot twists or so, just a simple liberation story.
Gameplay: Nothing different than Black Flag. Infact I had some performance issues, lots of stuttering for a game that is now so old.
Soundtrack: Suits the game and the environment, nothing special here.

76601997,"{'steamid': '76561198974671552', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1600620485}",english,"AMAZING GAME, but short :(",1601133016,1601133016,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

76544236,"{'steamid': '76561198170159766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1601050440}",english,"A very short and sweet AC experience. I enjoyed this as a nice companion piece to Black Flag. I always did wanted to know what became of Adewale after the events of Black Flag and here I got my answers. This is a very good game, the mission structure is very straight to the point and I appreciate the simplicity of the goals and tasks here. Suiting for not only a DLC, but even for a mainline AC game where I feel like they often try too much with adding too many complex systems for you to juggle.

In here it's like, kill this number of guys to complete the mission. Save this number of slaves to unlock these upgrades. None of that convoluted crap like hunting certain animals yielding certain upgrades found in Black Flag. But yeah Adewale is a serious and devoted member of the Assassin Brotherhood and he is very much like Altair and Connor with his straight forward thinking, just minus all the arrogance and emotionality, but still with just enough naivity for him to learn from even his opponents as to not see the world in black and white.

Speaking of black and white, we should address the not so subtle elephant in the room. I like that this game, much like Liberation, delved into the topic of slavery, but just like that game I don't think it was enough. I am by no means and SJW, and due to those types, it does make it difficult to talk about contentious topics without being branded as one--but I personally think they could have explored the theme a whole lot more in the story instead of making it this straight cut mission to take down the bad guys.

For instance, it was only near the end did they start making an argument on the slavers' behalf for what they do, but it was very Saturday morning cartoon like. While I don't think you can make a logical and reasonable argument FOR slavery, it would have been a beautiful challenge to try. But at the same time I think the final words of the governer kind of encapsulate the Templar philosophy so it's not entirely lost on its theme.

Anyways yeah I recommend this for a quick and concise Assassin's Creed experience, perfect for casuals who don't want to delve too deep into the AC lore and just get a taste of the gameplay without committing too much into the series. But of course this side story is definitely worth it for the long time fans as just another good AC experience as they most often are, flaws and all.

I'd say this game is a little too short, but it IS a DLC so you can't complain too much. Though Adewale's potential character development seems like Edward's in that they both deserved more games continuing their journeys, possibly even converging from time to time.",1601050953,1601050953,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

76418880,"{'steamid': '76561198849053221', 'num_games_owned': 147, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 403, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 403, 'last_played': 1600852667}",brazilian,"Quanto vale a sua liberdade? Fiz essa pergunta para mim toda vez que comprava escravos para liberta-los e ficava triste em imaginar que um dia o mundo passou por essa crueldade onde negros eram tratados como animais e nem se quer reconhecidos como humanos, um choque de realidade.
Imagina alguém ter você como objeto e propriedade e você não ter sua liberdade, quanto você lutaria para sobreviver? É algo inimaginável.
Que jogo rapazes, que jogo, ainda se mantem belo depois dos anos, recomendadíssimo principalmente pela história.
Uma jogabilidade incrível ao navegar muito prazeroso comparado ao AC3.",1600852966,1600852966,True,12,2,0.659240663051605225,0,True,False,False,False,,,

76270572,"{'steamid': '76561198058061539', 'num_games_owned': 258, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 390, 'last_played': 1600549258}",russian,"У ассасинов в основном дерьмовые ДЛС, но не с этим. 75850937,"{'steamid': '76561198061225352', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1599917751}",english,"Overall, Freedom Cry is okay. It's not worth the price, however, so I'm glad I got it on sale. You can really see why it's better suited as a DLC.

The gameplay is still the same Assassin's Creed style, but lacks in difficulty, number of areas to explore, not much detail in terms of lore and character development. Freeing the plantations and little side activities were quite entertaining and the new weapons were interesting too.

Visually, it's the same as Black Flag; which is fine because it looks stunning. But, my biggest problem is there's hardly any music in the background when exploring or sailing. Seriously? No shanties? No score? It made the whole experience feel quite empty and boring at times.
Buy it if you're a die-hard fan or want to kill some time for 5 or 6 hours.",1599918083,1599918083,False,9,0,0.595561385154724121,0,True,False,False,False,,,
