Like 4 hours or so. Its pretty cheap, so thats ok, but i still would have enjoyed a few more hours of content as Adewale",1598567142,1598567142,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

74855610,"{'steamid': '76561197966870672', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1598035384}",english,"Don't be fooled by what my supposed game time for this game is, I started playing this game as DLC for AC4 and when I was halfway through I found out it was also a standalone game now. I didn't bother going through the whole thing again just to make game time show up.

Ultimately, this game is not worth your time. Play AC4 instead. Adéwale is a better character there. Like AC4, I would summarize that this game has a terribly unlikable story and when it's about to get good - the DLC ends. That's not even a spoiler and I won't go into specifics.

What will you like? More AC4 core mechanics. Do the exploring, swimming, and stealth assassinating. [spoiler]This time, as an actual assassin, contrary to AC4.[/spoiler] Freeing slaves is a fun added mechanic and they shorthanded a lot of character progression, which I felt was good. They introduce some new weapons and new mechanics and moves. At the core, this DLC is more of the same of what you got in AC4 (so play AC4 instead).

So why not? The story is super disappointing. Adéwale is set up to be a fantastic character in AC4 and this DLC ruined him. Although he supposedly has a redemptive 'arch' (more of a sudden 90 degree incline) at the end, the game ended before I could forgive him for being a bad character. Not to mention that the event you think you're working towards never happens (again, I won't say what this all is, in case you do want to play it, but don't - play AC4 instead).

There is one, perhaps, petty beef I have with this game. The final mission has 2 side objectives. I like 100% completing these games, so I was going for it, but I missed one of them, but completed the mission. End credits - 20 minutes of them. Then, I retried, completed both of them and after the mission complete screen shows up - end credits again. I wasn't going to sit through 40 total minutes of credits, so I loaded back to the main menu.... and didn't get the mission completed. You have to watch the credits again if you want your 100%. That... felt like a 0/10 moment and I just quit out the game, knowing deep inside that I did do it.
Honestly, this game is not worth it. Buy AC4. Play that.",1598301256,1598301256,False,5,0,0.503524899482727051,0,True,False,False,False,,,

74474749,"{'steamid': '76561198050591619', 'num_games_owned': 2320, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 453, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 453, 'last_played': 1577681630}",english,"This was a pretty short DLC, but I really enjoyed this one. It’s really just more Black Flag, but this time playing as Adéwalé, Kenway’s quartermaster from AC4, instead of Edward Kenway. Adéwalé’s story is pretty great. Adéwalé is driven far more by conviction in comparison to Edward, whose motives were mostly fame and fortune. The story itself is, by nature, pretty powerful, as it revolves around slavery, and progression system is almost exclusively tied to freeing slaves and maroons that contribute to your resistance.

The combat in Freedom Cry feels so much better to me than AC4. To me, AC4’s combat felt a little floaty. Each strike from Edward’s sword(s) didn’t really feel like it had much impact. But Adéwalé’s strikes each feel like they have weight to them, and the NPCs seem to react far better to each strike. There’s also some pretty brutal combo finishers that just made combat a blast. For example, Adéwalé [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r1-vtNMM2zw]sweeping an enemy’s feet to topple them over before landing the killing blow[/url], or [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oyrz06t8hV8]leaving the machete stuck in an enemy’s leg, going for their head, then pulling out the machete[/url].

All that being said, it’s not perfect. I played the standalone version due to the [url=https://forums.ubi.com/showthread.php/1905435-Assassin-s-Creed-IV-Freedom-Cry-Audio-Bug-during-Combat]well-documented sound bugs in the DLC version[/url], but I got it on a pretty decent sale, so I definitely didn’t get shafted by the price difference between the two versions. The [url=https://i.imgur.com/tGrupZn.jpg]mission locking[/url], which forces you to explore an unrelated area of the map is kinda arbitrary since the majority of the DLC takes place in a single settlement, Port-au-Prince.

When I played through AC4, I was a bit displeased with the game’s draw distance, which was mainly regarding the persistent fog when trying to spot ships with the telescope while out on the ocean, but there were also some issues with NPCs popping/fading in even when you’re extremely close to them. Sadly, that’s no better in the Freedom Cry DLC. In [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AvLFANzFWmc]this example[/url], you can pretty clearly see NPCs fading in as Adéwalé is rounding the trailer of hay.

I also really missed having sea shanties when sailing around in this DLC. Although, I guess it makes sense though, as the crewmen are freed slaves and not pirates. I do have to say, the slave spirituals when taking out the overseers on a plantation were absolutely beautiful, and I only wish they had been just slightly louder so that they were easier to hear.
Finally, [url=https://imgur.com/a/oqFLc5m]here’s a few 1440p ultrawide screenshots from Assassin’s Creed: Freedom Cry.[/url]
[b]Disclaimer: This review was written in May 2019 and posted in August 2020.[/b]

[b]Disclaimer 2: This was originally played on Uplay before picking it up on Steam in an effort to consolidate my gaming library onto Steam. Steam playtime was idled to match playtime from Uplay.[/b]",1597696602,1604065965,True,7,0,0.606299221515655518,0,True,False,False,False,,,

73284758,"{'steamid': '76561198127019306', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1047, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1047, 'last_played': 1595721400}",english,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry is, in a very basic understanding, a reskinned extra story about Adewale in his efforts to liberate his brethren from French Slavery.

The game, as a story, leaves you wanting a bit as it tries to fit the Assassin's Creed crescendo approach to story telling into 10 missions that are all relatively short and take place primarily in the lone port. It's not terrible, I just believe had this been a more extended story it would be better.

Typical AC issues run rampant such as: running exactly not where you want to go; jumping to a place that you didn't aim for; surfaces not being sensibly climbable (dude you're a trained assassin and can't jump up to a rock ledge but can superman over onto a tree???); among many others I'm sure I'm missing.

As a short game, gameplay-wise it's pretty good. It's ACIV with a weapon swap to give a different flair to Adewale and it really shows his brutal, emotional approach to literally helping end slavery - kinda makes sense as he is an ex-slave; bravo it isn't a masterpiece rendition but by god for a video game taking on the issue of slavery it's pretty good.
NOW FOR SOME MINOR PROBLEMS; these are just my opinions but I do find them a bit... blah

3... 3 of the weapons are literally just found lying on the ground. The best machete in the game... is literally at a Fort (no spoilers... sorta (: ). A blunderbuss is found on an island. A mid-tier machete is found just lying on an island outside the Maroons Hideout. I like AC power fantasy as much as the next person but if I decided to play another run I would literally ignore freeing slaves and just pick up the actually found weapons of the game. Honestly for the Golden Machete I would rather have a Mayan temple as an homage to the base game (remember this would be a DLC)

About freeing slaves; it definitely is treated as a quota. 2 weapons are unlocked by freeing slaves. A few missions are locked behind freeing an amount or doing a type of freeing slaves; 3 out of 10 I believe. Not the best representation of what a resistance person's motivation would be - ""okay just 30 more and then the Maroons will give me a weapon."" It isn't terrible but it would likely be much better if all missions were locked behind dedication of some kind. Small amounts to not drag out the game but enough that it does feel like you're trying to buy trust with the resistance that you are trying to help.

All in all... This isn't a 20$ game. Maybe it is - but for AC games I'm not feeling it. That said if you truly wanted it or waited for a sale it's a great pickup. Decent recommend no rushing at it though.",1595722226,1595722226,True,1,0,0.523809552192687988,0,True,False,False,False,,,

73168637,{'steamid': '76561198136914169', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1595427381}",english,"If you liked AC4 Black flag and dont have it anymore, this is worth playing if you get it on sale. However, you would be much better off buying the dlc version of this game in black flag if possible as this version is missing a few features such as the sea shanties.

The standalone has very few tutorials and assumes you've already played AC4, it also has poor controller support in my experience. If you haven't played black flag don't bother with this until you've played it.
You can get AC4 black flag on sale for around the same price and it lasted me well over 40 hours at 95% completion. comparatively Freedom cry lasted me about 5 hours at about 80%.

TL;DR Buy AC4 Black flag if you want an assassin's creed game, it has a much better story and you'll have a much better experience. And then if you like black flag, get this as a dlc for it.",1595521813,1595521813,False,26,1,0.722828388214111328,0,True,False,False,False,,,

72899340,"{'steamid': '76561198091292992', 'num_games_owned': 1367, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1595083738}",schinese,"作为黑旗的大型DLC。 游戏性方面和黑旗一样，差不多可以理解为“换皮”。只是在表现形式以及主线故事上有所区别，和解放一样是解放奴隶为主题。流程很短，我作了百分百同步也才6小时左右。

70141148,"{'steamid': '76561198043096944', 'num_games_owned': 506, 'num_reviews': 220, 'playtime_forever': 281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1591002491}",german,"Nach viereinhalb Stunden habe ich jetzt auch das allein läufige Addon zu Black Flag beendet.

Im direkten Vergleich kann ich sagen, dass es mir eine Freude war in die Welt der Piraten zurückzukehren. So fand ich Black Flag bisher mit geringen Abstand das bisher beste AC. Die tropische Inselwelt, der Sound, die raue See versprühen einfach einen tollen Flair. Edward Kenway war schon ein extrem kurzweiliger Protagonist, in Freedom Cry steuern wir Adéwalé, einen ehemaligen Sklaven. Mit diesem Charakter konnte ich allerdings nicht so diese Bindung aufbauen, vielleicht lag es auch an der kurzen Spielzeit. Schlecht war der Charakter allerdings keinesfalls. Was etwas schade war ist, dass die Missionen recht ähnlich ablaufen und sich hauptsächlich ums befreien von Sklaven handelt, so fallen die Missionen oft ähnlich oder identisch aus, auch wenn die Rahmenhandlung und einige Missionen wirklich kurzweilig gestaltet sind. Abseits von der schicken Grafik und den spannenden Kämpfen bleibt Freedom Cry allerdings qualitativ hinter dem tollen Hauptspiel um einiges zurück. Ich für meinen Teil habe das Spiel mal einst im Sale für 3,74€ erworben und als Fan des Hauptspiels war es mir eine Freude knappe 7 Monate später noch einmal in die Welt einzukehren, auch wenn es nur für 4-5 St. war.
Wertung: 76 / 100
Unten habe ich die Assassin’s Creed Spiele aufgelistet, welche ich bereits beendet habe, die Wertungen dienen natürlich als Vergleich und Anhaltspunkt und spiegeln auch meine Worte in Zahlen dar.
Assassin’s Creed 82 / 100 Punkte
Assassin’s Creed II 88 / 100 Punkte
Assassin’s Creed Brotherhood 84 / 100 Punkte
Assassin’s Creed Revelations 88 / 100 Punkte
Assassin’s Creed III 83 / 100 Punkte
Assassin’s Creed III: Liberation HD 71 / 100 Punkte
Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag 90 / 100 Punkte
Assassin’s Creed IV: Freedom Cry 76 / 100 Punkte",1591010793,1591030087,True,7,0,0.630356788635253906,0,True,False,False,False,,,

70119398,"{'steamid': '76561198805410319', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 381, 'last_played': 1637062478}",russian,"Я решил купить эту игру только потому что это дополнение в виде отдельного сюжета к Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag и цена меня удивила так как она в разницу в 100 руб. Но я все таки решил поиграть, хочу сказать там очень короткий сюжет всего лишь 9 миссий и это без дополнительных заданий и карта мира тоже довольно маленькая, а улучшения оружия и сумок эта система с рабами очень дебильная на мой взгляд чтобы получить сумки и оружие тебе надо освободить определённое количество рабов и тебе приходится заниматься этим нудным процессом. В 4 части вы занимались тем что вы грабили склады на разных островах грабили корабли теперь ты берешь корабль только чтобы освобождать рабов и этим ты занимаешься почти всю игру и мне кажется, что она не стоит таких денег",1590965630,1590965630,False,5,0,0.556889176368713379,0,True,False,False,False,,,

68622540,"{'steamid': '76561198040629334', 'num_games_owned': 371, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1588693253}",english,"Was too bored to finish this one. Adewale was ok in Black Flag, but he didnt really do anything until the end of the game when he joins the Assassins. His character doesnt hold his own enough to be a leading man, but i guess it makes sense as this was a DLC for Black Flag rather than a full game.

The game just thrusts you into a mission without telling you anything about Ade, whats happened to him in the 10 or so years since Black Flag or what his mission is. It doesnt really matter as you then get stranded in Haiti and join the slave rebellion there. The templar target is confusing as it seems to be a woman who then becomes an ally. I gave up as the story didnt feel like it was really going anywhere and missions were locked behind how many slaves you freed. You do meet the leader of the slaves but he then takes a backseat and becomes your quatermaster on the Jackdaw, sorry i meant whatever this new ship is called.

Gameplay is the exact same with the exception of weapons, Ade has a machete and a blunderbuss, rather than pistols and swords. The larger world map is the lower south-eastern portion of the west-indies from Black Flag, though its changed a little. Its 10Yrs later so smaller settlements have popped up, Kingston is innaccessable and the town of Port-au-Prince is included where there was formally a hidden cove. Ship gameplay is the same, this time with an new brig that is a carbon copy of the jackdaw. I Didnt explore too much but the best part is the Jackdaw shipwreak, where you dive for the figurehead and Adewale reminices about old times.

The fleet gameplay has gone and been replaced with a similar mechanic to the assassin recruitment from brotherhood, Rev and AC3 except its freed slaves. The problem is that the main town is too small so you free one slave and you end up alerting every guard in the town. Slave freeing activities are mere feet away from one another.",1588693863,1588693863,False,1,0,0.504132270812988281,0,True,False,False,False,,,

67287962,"{'steamid': '76561198044049263', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 795, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 795, 'last_played': 1586770318}",turkish,"Özgürlüğü savunanların direnme gücü, zulmedenlerin gücünden daha fazladır. - Malcolm X
Sırf Zenci birinin güzel bir araba kullanması onu çaldığı anlamına gelmez. Tamam, ben bunu çaldım ama zenci olduğum için değil. - Will Smith/Siyah Giyen Adamlar III
Başaramayacağım dostum. Her yanım üşüyor, beyaz bir ışık görüyorum. Lanet olsun ışık bile beyaz lan! - Martin Lawrence/Bela iş başında

Zamanında insanlık olarak çok kötü şeyler yaptık. Aslında sayılabilecek o kadar çok şey var ki, Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry bunlardan sadece bir tanesine dikkat çekiyor ve tüm yaşananları bütün çıplaklığı ile gözler önüne seriyor. Bu sefer de tıpkı Assasin's Creed Liberation oyununda olduğu gibi zencilere olan zulüm konu alınıyor. Adéwalé, Edward ile yollarının ayrılması üzerinden 15 sene geçtikten sonra uzman bir suikastçi muhafız haline bürünür ve tapınakçılara ulaştırılacak bir paketin peşine düşer. Kendisini Saint-Domingue yani şimdiki Haiti'de bulan karakterimiz, görevini yapmaya çalışırken zulmün her türlüsüne şahit olur; pazarlarda satılan zencilerin sessiz çığlıklarına, odunla dövülüp kenara atılanlara ve sahibinin utanç dolu hareket ve hakaretlerinden bıkmış bir kadının yakarışlarına kadar. Kendisi de siyahi olan Adéwalé, zamanında yaşadığı anılar gözünün önünden bir film şeridi gibi geçmeye başlayınca bir karar vermek zorunda kalacaktır: ya kendisine verilen görevi yapacak ya da bu görevi kısa bir süreliğine göz ardı ederek zencilerin özgür kalması için elinden geleni ardına koymayacaktır. İkinci seçeneği test kağıdına işaretleyen karakterimizin artık daha ulvi bir görevi vardır: bu zulmün kaynağını bulmak ve kökünü kurutmak için zenci kardeşlerini eğitmek. Oyundaki amacımız da tam olarak bu oluyor.

Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry, Liberation ile kıyaslandığında zencilere yapılan zulümleri daha çok ön plana çıkarttıklarını söyleyebilirim. Etrafınızda her zaman köle pazarında satılan, kafesin içinde kaderine terk edilen, işte bedavaya - karın tokluğuna bile değil - çalıştırılanlar, sahibinin kötülüklerinden kaçmaya çalışan bir sürü zenci ile karşılaşacaksınız. İşin en güzel tarafı da ne kadar sayıda zenciyi özgür bırakırsanız çeşitli ödüller kazanabileceksiniz. Hatta oyunun amacı özgür bırakmak olduğundan ana görevleri açmak için belirlenen sayıda zencinin hür bırakılması istenecektir. Bu da oyunun amacıyla paralel yönde bir istek olunca keyif almaya başlıyorsunuz.

Oyunun dünyası küçük bir harita içerisinde sürüyor. Yine oyunun atalarından da bildiğimiz gibi toplanabilir eşyalar bulunuyor. Para sandıkları ile cebiniz bayram ederken, etrafa serpiştirilmiş ve kullanabileceğiniz daha üst düzey silahlar bulunabiliyor. Gemi batıkları ile de hazine avına çıkabiliyorsunuz. Kim bilir gemi batığında eski bir dost ile karşılaşabilirsiniz.

Adéwalé, Edward Kenway gibi iki kılıç kullanmıyor, bunun yerine taş gibi bir pala kullanmayı tercih ediyor. Düşmanın kafasına indirdiğinizde yarıldığını hissedebiliyor, beyin pekmezini akıtabiliyorsunuz. Silah olarak da tercihimiz 16. ve 17. yüzyıllarda kullanılan alaybozan adındaki bir tüfek oluyor. Bu öyle bir silah ki, insanı alayınız gelsin moduna sokabiliyor ve bir düzine adamı aynı anda atalarıyla buluşturabiliyor. Sadece takıldığım nokta Adéwalé'in kıçına takılan pala olmuştur. Tamam, karizmatik gözüküyor olabilir ama adamın kıçına pala kılıfı mı konur lan?!

Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry, dönemine göre grafikleri ile göz doldururken müzikler yönünden vasat kalıyor. Zencilerin söylediği mamuye mamama ile yeale yamesiso nanana şarkıları haricinde ötekiler beş para etmez. Hele geminiz savaşırken konulan müzikleri duyana kadar bekleyin derim. Sezar'ın hakkı Sezar'a diyecek ve bana hak vereceksiniz. Karakterin  arada sırada da olsa Edward ile anılarını arkadaşlarıyla paylaşması ise hüzün dolu anları beraberinde getiriyor. Özün sözü Assassin's Creed Liberation ile kıyaslandığında kat kat iyi olan bir ara yemek ile karşı karşıyayız. Artık bana da bu saatten sonra sizlere afiyet olsun demek düşüyor.
Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry Türkçe Altyazılı Fragmanı:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uWj5DQXoH60",1586863155,1586863327,True,26,1,0.696193516254425049,3,True,False,False,False,,,

65776024,"{'steamid': '76561198318261281', 'num_games_owned': 121, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 451, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 451, 'last_played': 1581019131}",czech,"Freedom Cry je DLC k hře AC: Black Flag , které se vývojáři z nesmyslných důvodů rozhodli vydat jako samostanou hru a vůbec tomu neodpovídá. Ve hře hrajete za Adewaleho , kterého známe z Black Flagu a který se také přidal k assasínům.Ale hra vůbec není o assasínech spíš o osvobozování černých otroků z područí otrokářů.Příběh Vám zabere tak 3 hodiny čistého času a je asi nejhorší částí hry. Všechny sekvence se spouští u jedné NPC paní a úkoly jsou jen typu jdi zabíj vrat se jdi osvobod vrat se , abyste na konci zabili  guvernéra o kterém ani nevíme kdo to je pořádně ani nevíme proč protože ho stejně nahradí někdo jiný/horší. Hra má jenom jeden větší ostrov a pak zbytek jsou jen malé ostrůvky okopírované z AC:4 kde je třeba jen jedna truhla. Je tu i vylepšení lodi , kterých je o hodně mín než v AC:4 a lodní bitvy tu jsou ale jsou zase stejné a ani ty suroviny z těch lodí nepotřebujete. Z vedlejších aktivit je tu třeba osobozování plantáží kde máte jen zabít určitý počet otrokářů a plantáž je osvobozena , stejně pak zjistíte že plantáž má nového majitele a můžete ji osvobodit znova. Hra je opět přespamovaná nepřáteli , jelikož tady máte jen jeden větší ostrov tak všichni enemy jsou tam a je to opravdu otravné. To se ani nebavím o vzhledu mapy který je o hodně horší něž v předešlých dílech a o množství bugu. Takže:
+plantáže - stejně je pak ale musíte zas osvobodit znova
+ mužete si za horší cenu než black flag vyzkoušet věci z AC:4
-vzled mapy , ostrůvky
-hlavní příběh nezáživný všechno se pouští u jedné paní
-nezáživné lodní bitvy , osvobozování maroonu
-cena
-bugy
-vedlejší aktivity

Závěr : To si děláte prdel tohle jako samostatnou hru nikdy. Za cenu drahší něž black flag. Hodnocení jako samostatná hra 1/10. JAKO DLC 3/10",1585135243,1585135314,False,0,1,0.476190477609634399,0,True,False,False,False,,,

65632775,"{'steamid': '76561198180890729', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 583, 'last_played': 1688815363}",czech,"Chtěli byste DLC podobné zaklínači, jenž by samo o sobě mohlo být pokládáno za samostatnou hru? Pak jste bohužel na špatném místě. Freedom Cry slouží pouze jako jednohubka. Celé DLC působí jako Twinkie: navenek vypadá dobře, ale jakmile se do něj zakousnete, čeká na vás pouze nafouknutá a uměle nastovovaná hmota. Hra sice přináší pár inovací, většinu z nich však v podstatě nepoužijete. Příběh nestojí za nic a proto doporučuji pouze pokud vás bavil gameplay u Black Flag a chtěli byste se dozvědět něco o pokračování Adewaleho příběhu.",1584974612,1584974612,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

64468276,"{'steamid': '76561198119319611', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1583263287}",english,"This game is a disgrace to the AC franchise and to Adewale's character. The AI is horrible which makes the game's ridiculously easy. It's very repetitive because every mission is the same: follow some dude or blow up 1 ship. You can explore a few small areas, but they are all the same. I felt nothing for the characters, Ade was very basic and boring and that's not how I remember him. He deserved better than this pathetic excuse for a game. It took around 5 hours to complete, but that's only because you have to do certain repetitive things over and over before the game allows you to continue with the next mission. That certain thing should feel important when you do it, but it didn't, simply because it didn't change anything at all. The plot is also very basic, when it shouldn't be since it's about an important problem from Ade's past. Yet, everything about this game was tedious and flat. The only time it made me feel something was one mission around the end, other than that, I was simply bored. The only good thing is that it looks nice. It's not worth the money or the time.",1583264841,1583524074,False,2,0,0.497228145599365234,0,True,False,False,False,,,

63352587,"{'steamid': '76561198026481132', 'num_games_owned': 2165, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 526, 'last_played': 1581448441}",english,"Despite the game being very short and very few things to explore, I enjoyed the new weapons Ade has to bring to the table. I would have probably finished the game under 2 hours if I focused only on the story, but I wanted to max out whatever I could do to finish it.

63074635,"{'steamid': '76561198146693902', 'num_games_owned': 364, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1581018385}",czech,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry je DLC do hry Assassin's Creed IV: Black flag a musím říct že po dohrání na 100% jsem neuvěřitelně zklamaný. DLC vám povypráví Adéwalého příběh po událostech v AS4. Tento příběh je podle mě naprostá sr*čka, omlouvám se za vyjádření, ale jinak to ani říct nejde.Hlavní příběh je nezaujímaví a vedlejší questy v tomto DLC nejsou. Jde pouze o malou mapu s několika aktivitami které jste už zkoušely a dělali v AC4, nehledě na to že některé ostrovy jsou naprosto totožné se základní hrou, to tedy znamená že při prozkoumávání těchto ctrl c ctrl v ostrovů nemáte

žádnou radost, ještě když ze základní hry víte kde je jaká truhla. Jediné z čeho jsem měl ze začátku radost byly plantáže, které byly pěkně udělané, i když měla každá plantáž totožné budovy a budova s rozhlednou kde děláte synchronizaci je vždy stejný mlýn. I tyto plantáže vás nakonec zklamaly, protože abyste dohrály hru na 100% musíte se na některé vracet několikrát a několikrát je také osvobozovat, což je velmi unavující, nudné a také nelogické, když má plantáž každých 20 minut nového majitele. Klidně jich mohli udělat více, věřím že by to nebyl takový problém.
Klady:
+ Plantáže, které nakonec také nebyly úplně nejlepší. Píši to ke kladům jen proto, abych datadisk nemusel hodnotit známkou 1/10.
+ Vtipný název - po dohrání ho už chápu: Freedom jakože už jsem volný a tento datadisk už nikdy nemusím zapnout. A cry jakože se mi chce z těch pár hodin u hry brečet.
Zápory:
- Velmi špatný příběh. Skoro každá mise, nebo vzpomínka chcete-li se spouští u jedné paní, která vám vždy něco řekne a vy potom jdete něco udělat, a zase repete.

- Mapa - většina ostrovů je buď velmi malá nebo jak už jsem zmiňoval jen zkopírovaná ze základní hry, skoro žádná originalita. Také jsou zde ostrovy u kterých si řeknete že jsou opravdu velké, a že to bude parádní prozkoumávání, ale nakonec, když se k nim přiblížíte tak zjistíte, že jde jen o skálu, po které nemůžete lést ani chodit a jediné místo kde se
můžete pohybovat je 10-ti metrová pláž.
- Na této malé mapě je asi celá Francouzská armáda nebo já jako nevím, proč jsou nepřátelé každých 10 metrů.
- Loď - jde o jinou loď než v základní hře ale i přesto je na 100 % stejná

- cena - viděl jsem tady psát některé lidi, že tento AC je pro lidi, kteří se nechtějí pouštět do zbytečně velké základní hry, já si dovoluji nesouhlasit, hlavně proto, že lidi co nehrály AC4 nemusí pochopit Adéwalého příběh a navíc cena tohoto DLC je téměř stejná jako základní hra. Poměr cena/kvalita je velmi špatná.
- Vzhledy nepřátel - jde v podstatě o stejné nepřátele jako v pořád zmiňované základní hře, jenom jsou jinak nazváni a mají jinak nabarvenou uniformu.
- Herní doba je velmi krátká, kdybych hru nedohrál na 100% (hrozné utrpení) tak bych měl dohráno za 2-3 hodiny.
- Záporáka celého datadisku, (guvernér), o kterém slyšíte každou cutscénu, vidíte až na konci hry kdy ho zabijeme na 1 hit = žádný obtížný boss fight a ani nebylo vůbec těžké se k němu dostat.
- Grafika deště - chápu že jde o starou hru, ale pokaždé když vidím déšť tak se mi chce hodit šavli.
- Nesmyslná 100% synchronizace - některé mise vám přidají 5% synchronizace a poslední mise vám hodí skoro 30%.
- Nemožnost změnit si vzhled - toto je taková maličkost ale mohlo to v datadisku být
Vyhodnocení:

Já už nemám co dodat. Ubisoft celkem dobrou hru zkopíroval, trochu upravil a dal ji na prodej. Doufám že už nic podobného od Ubisoftu neuvidím. Ve hře nevidím skoro žádný kladný bod, a proto dávám [b]2/10 bodů[/b] - hodně špatná hra/DLC.
Dodatek:

Toto DLC doporučuji jen lidem, kteří se snaží mít kompletně dohrané všechny AC, kdybych nebyl jeden z nich nikdy bych si toto DLC nekoupil.",1581024262,1581024262,False,11,23,0.623271465301513672,4,True,False,False,False,,,

62886231,"{'steamid': '76561199013517615', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1710562380}",english,"Crisp gameplay mechanics. 62854800,"{'steamid': '76561198393810912', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 556, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 556, 'last_played': 1580641428}",schinese,还行,1580647138,1580647138,True,1,0,0.52173912525177002,0,True,False,False,False,,,

62823457,"{'steamid': '76561197993777878', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 518, 'last_played': 1580617993}",brazilian,"É um bom Assassin's Creed e tem uma história única, seguir os passos de Adewale, que diferente do Edward (que lutava só por dinheiro) nesse jogo lutamos pela liberdade, atacamos navios negreiros, plantações de cana e participamos do início da revolta dos escravos no Haiti.
Pros:
- Toda a jogabilidade de Assassin's Creed IV
- Customizações no navio de Adewale assim como no IV
- Customizações de armas para Adewale
- Missões fáceis, a história apesar de linear caminha muito bem
- Ótima dublagem
Contras:
- 5 horas de história, podendo chegar a 10 horas se for completar os objetivos secundários (consegui 8 horas e 95% de progresso).
- O jogo é um pouco pesado, é a segunda vez que zero ele e ele continua caindo os frames sem parar, é impossível jogar com 60 fps travados nesse jogo (na qualidade alta).
- O mapa é bem pequeno e faltou mais criatividade, para um spin off vendido separadamente poderia ter sido mais bem trabalhado.
- Os marinheiros não cantam, e as canções dos escravos mereciam mais destaque nesse jogo.

Zerei Freedom Cry pela segunda vez e o jogo continua bom, interessante e divertido, porém acho que vou dispensar uma terceira e uma quarta vez, ele é realmente bem limitado e pequeno, mas não deixa de ser muito bom, caso já tenha zerado o Assassin's Creed IV é quase obrigatório jogar esse se quiser uma extensão da história pós-Edward, mas não espere nada além de algumas horas de história e um mapa pra matar a saudade.

60615337,"{'steamid': '76561198136893525', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 714, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 714, 'last_played': 1577383811}",english,A short but sweet expansion pack with nice variety for the base game of AC: 4 Black Flag where you experience fellow pirate and Assassin Adéwalé's adventures after his mission goes awry from a storm that messes up his plans to recover a Templar Parcel only to return washed ashore confronting his past once again fighting for freedom. New stuff includes a Blunderbuss and his Machete to differ your playstyle as Adéwalé is more of a CQB fighter with several new mission types that revolve around rescuing slaves in a decent sized map of Saint Domingue with the usual gameplay variety from the base game for the sea and inland areas all wrapped in AC's signature historical intrigue. A bit steep on the price and quite short to complete but well worth it on sale as it also looks great and runs smooth as well having an interesting soundtrack that has some very Haitian tracks in it. Oh and lastly no modern day segments to disconnect you from the great story for the whole game and doesn't need the base game to run as its a standalone.,1577387102,1583223652,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

58368744,"{'steamid': '76561197997518664', 'num_games_owned': 2644, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 11505, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11505, 'last_played': 1564617846}",russian,"Установил игру. Запустил, попробовал. И сразу же был поражён расизмом в игре про освобождение негров-рабов негром-пиратом, который тоже с рождения был рабом.

Главный герой этого дополнения - негр Адевале, дружбан и верный соратник белого Эдварда, главного героя основной игры. Негр родился в 1692 и на год старше Эдварда. Действие основной игры происходит в 1715-1721 годах, в период расцвета сил молодых героев. Все молодые и красивые. В конце сюжета показывают Эдварда в английском театре, со взрослыми детьми. Он седой, на лице морщины - он уже явно не молод, многого добился и выглядит солидно. Из соответствующей статьи в игровой БД можно узнать, что Эдвард был убит тамплиерами в 1735 году.

И вот начинается дополнение. 1735 год. Накачанный, гладкий и блестящий Адевале бороздит моря в качестве капитана-пирата и берёт корабли на абордаж. Он выглядит молодым в свои 43, здоров (даже ещё здоровее, чем был в 29) и полон сил, и как всегда лыс, что лишь добавляет ему молодости и блеска. Контраст яркий! Эдвард бухал с юных лет, жил полной жизнью, бездельничал, а Адевале вкалывал на плантации, пока не сбежал с напавшими на неё грабителями. В итоге белый герой к 42 годам уже успел состариться и погибнуть, а его товарищ-негр в самом расцвете сил продолжает жить активной жизнью.
Если это не заявление о пользе рабства для негров, как залога здорового образа жизни и, как следствие, долгой молодости, то я даже не знаю, как это ещё расценивать. Я крайне возмущён.
По игровому процессу всё соответствует основной игре. Средней величины DLC.

Нововведения хромают - стоит освободить рабов, отвернуться и отбежать на 10 метров - как на том же месте появляются новые рабы, которых снова можно спасать. Подробный респаун точек спасения рушит всю атмосферу.

Сюжет на уровне либерально-романтического бреда всей серии. Адевале под предлогом борьбы с рабством создаёт ""спасаемым"" рабам кучу проблем и губит их пачками. Вопрос, конечно, философский, борьба требует жертв, но тут он не стоит с ними бок о бок и не ведёт за собой. Он не слушает указаний лидеров сопротивления, творит херню по своему усмотрению и сваливает за горизонт. То есть, он бычит на белых, сбегает ""по делам"", а другие потом за это массово огребают. Герой!",1574928424,1574928424,True,2,3,0.517302334308624268,0,False,False,False,False,,,

57557883,"{'steamid': '76561198017298780', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 267, 'playtime_forever': 1452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1574550043}",polish,"Assassin’s Creed: Freedom Cry to samodzielny dodatek do jedenastej odsłony tej fantastycznej serii o skrytobójcach (jeśli liczymy również spin-offy) – twórcą dodatku jest oczywiście Ubisoft Montreal, a wydawcą pozostaje Ubisoft Entertainment. Dodatek zagościł pod koniec 2013 roku na PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One oraz PC.

Graficznie tytuł prezentuje się identycznie co oryginał, czyli Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag – krótko opisując, wciąż wygląda fantastycznie, robi ogromne wrażenie na graczu i posiada niesamowite tekstury w bardzo wysokiej rozdzielczości. Trzeba dodać, że gra posiada również dobrze stworzone modele postaci, broni, budynków i nie tylko.

Optymalizacja jest naprawdę bardzo dobra – RTX 2070 z procesorem 9 generacji na najwyższych ustawieniach graficznych w rozdzielczości 1920x1080 (FHD) gwarantuje 55-60kl/s. Co nie zdarzało się wcześniej w podstawowej wersji gry, dzięki czemu eksploracja i Free-Running są teraz o wiele płynniejsze, oraz przyjemniejsze – definitywnie na plus poprawa tego w tej samodzielnej wersji, jaką jest Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry.

Za ścieżkę dźwiękową odpowiada nie kompozytor Brian Tyler, jak to miało miejsce w Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag, ale tym razem jest to kompozytor imieniem Olivier Deriviere. Szczerze powiedziawszy, niczym jego utwory nie zachwycają gracza – są puste oraz bez duszy, jedyne te wplecione motywy plemienne nadają jakiegoś klimatu, ale tak to totalna porażka według mnie, niczym z jakieś gry na urządzenia przenośne.

W grze wcielamy się w dawnego kompana Kapitana Kenway’a, czyli w znanego już nam asasyna Adéwalé, który to na zlecenie Bractwa Asasynów miał zabić Admirała Templariuszy oraz odzyskać pewną paczkę, jednak po otoczeniu go przez francuską flotę rozbija się na San Domingo, a naszym celem stanie się niesienie pomocy zniewolonym Maronom – wszystko to rozgrywa się trzynaście lat po wydarzeniach z oryginału, czyli w 1735 roku i trwa aż do 1737, wątek fabularny jest bardzo krótki (4-5 godzin) jednakże pełen niesamowitej akcji oraz ciekawych misji przepełnionych uniesieniami, oraz smutkiem. Nawet przez chwilę nie czuć znużenia formułą co jest zdecydowanie dużym plusem po monotonnych misjach śledczych z Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag.

Sterując asasynem, będziemy żeglować okrętem ponownie po Wyspach Karaibskich, z ważniejszych miejsc, jakie zwiedzimy to Port-au-Prince oraz okoliczne wyspy. Rozgrywka jest prowadzona w inny sposób, gdyż tym razem nie zasiadamy do Animusa, a od razu jesteśmy świadkami zdarzeń głównego bohatera w tym wypadku Adéwalé – by wykonać nasz cel, czyli wyzwolić Maronów spod władzy Gubernatora przyjdzie nam wykonać dziewięć różniących się od siebie zadań i żadne nie jest podobne do drugiego, co dla mnie jest ogromnym plusem.

Do walki jako asasyn dostaniemy dużo uzbrojenia, gdyż dostajemy ukryte ostrze, maczetę, strzałki z liną, bomby dymne, petardy, garłacz oraz dmuchawkę – sama walka jest taka sama jak w głównej odsłonie serii, czyli wykonując kontry czy rozbrajanie oglądamy fantastyczne animacje wykończeniowe, które można ze sobą łączyć w serie zabójstw i wygląda to, jak prawdziwy taniec śmierci. Dodatkowo ponownie sterując naszym statkiem, będziemy mogli walczyć z innymi okrętami za pomocą dział burtowych czy pościgowych, folgierzy, moździerzy oraz wybuchowych beczek – okręty można zatapiać albo abordażować co jest naprawdę fantastycznym rozwiązaniem.

Poza wątkiem głównym jest parę rzeczy do zrobienia mianowicie odnalezienie wszystkich punktów synchronizacji, skrzyń ze skarbami, odkrycie paru sekretów, możemy też wyzwalać plantacje oraz ratować niewolników czy też przejmować statki kupieckie, by ulepszyć nasz okręt.

Kwintesencją jest oczywiście Wspinaczka oraz Free-Running i wszystko to jest naprawdę bardzo dobre, gdyż wszystkie ruchy oraz animacje, a także pływanie okrętem jest takie same jak w oryginale, czyli po prostu wyśmienite i nie ma się do czego tutaj przyczepić.

Podsumowując, Assassin’s Creed: Freedom Cry to świetna oraz krótka przygoda. Znajdziemy tu fantastyczną grafikę, bardzo dobrą optymalizację, średnią ścieżką dźwiękową, pełny emocji wątek fabularny, a także ciekawe postacie – moja ocena tego krótkiego, aczkolwiek przyjemnego dodatku to mocne 7/10.",1574295509,1643313145,True,2,2,0.547325074672698975,0,True,False,False,False,,,

57238202,"{'steamid': '76561198060454527', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1571689805}",polish,Trudno powiedzieć o tym dodatku coś nowego wszystko zostało już powiedziane krótka fabuła grywalność identyczna warto kupić jedynie kiedy będzie na promocji inaczej nie ma sensu + jest taki że nie wymaga posiadania części Blag Flag którą przeszedłem wcześniej z pirackiej wersji.,1573850106,1573850106,False,1,0,0.495495468378067017,0,True,False,False,False,,,

56816325,"{'steamid': '76561198315483653', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1635485226}",english,"I haven't really been able to play this game as the lag is horrible. I play on a laptop that wasn't made for gaming, so I understand that most games lag on my PC. But this.....this is utter nonsense. I walk at a snails space and run at a slightly slower walk speed. The frame rate is 0 to none and I can't complete any tasks because the reaction time is non-existing. One second I'm perfectly fine and the next I'm almost dead from an attack that wasn't even initiated. The only point that I'm not lagging is when I am in or near water. Which is confusing. The game lags so badly at every point except when I am near the high quality graphics of water. I own other games of the same franchise which do not lag as badly as this one, and they were released after this one, and are thus of a higher graphics quality. Out of all of those, this one is the one that lags? I don't get it. But, aside from that, I do actually recommend this game. The story line seems really good, and I like the diversity and the historical accuracy. I feel like this could have became part of the series, and not been a stand alone. Although I understand why it is.
If I could actually play it, that would be even better.",1573283678,1573283678,True,0,1,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

55524394,"{'steamid': '76561198262659118', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 672, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1661944339}",english, [h1] Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry Rating: 7.5/10 [b]Half Shield[/b][/h1],1570628688,1570628688,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

55463892,"{'steamid': '76561198052481458', 'num_games_owned': 82, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1600968740}",italian,"Ammetto di essere stato veramente combattuto sullo spolliciare in alto o in basso e quindi consigliarlo o meno.

La storia, per quanto corta sia (l'ho finito in 2,6 ore di gioco) mi è piaciuta. Lottare per gli schiavi, potendoli liberare in diversi modi, sia in mare che in terra è molto gratificante, e molti come me che hanno giocato Black Flag, saranno rimasti colpiti dal carattere di Adewale,  poterlo impersonare è stato quindi un piacere.
Il costo.

I movimenti qui, sembrano molto più fluidi che in Black Flag, nuova storia, quindi nuova scenografia e battute da scrivere, nuove isole, nuovi personaggi da doppiare, insomma di sicuro avranno messo in moto un bel po di gente sotto compenso. Però, a oggi, nel 2019, è venduto al prezzo di 15E, Black Flag e Rogue ne costano 20. Il primo l'ho giocato per 58 ore di divertimento immersivo, in una mappa grande 10 volte tanto, il secondo l'ho già comprato e lo giocherò finita questa recensione, ma ora ho un po di paura. In oltre, a parte l'ovvia connessione con Black Flag nell'impersonare Adewale, nessun riferimento ad altri AC o alla storia del presente.
I Bug.

E poi i bug.... Ma perchè?. Io in Black Flag non li ho avuti. Casse di rifornimenti per mare, segnalate nella mappa, ma che in realtà non ci sono, cadaveri che saltellano qua e la, la cerbottana che a volte non spara, lo stesso Ade che soffre di convulsioni muovendosi in più direzioni alla velocità della luce.

E in ultimo ma il più fastidioso, sebbene nella mappa vengono indicati due nemici vicini, vi capiterà di vederne solo uno, sia con l'occhio dell'aquila che senza. Una volta assassinato quello che vedete, puff!, spunta il secondo e non si sa da dove. Non ho capito se sono sovrapposti e si dividono nell'assassinarne uno, o se appaia dal terreno, sta di fatto che vi salta la copertura.

Per essere chiaro, i bug non sono fissi o perenni, arrivano d'improvviso cosi come spariscono, quello del nemico che compare con un ""puff!"" l'ho avuto solo 2 volte, quello con le casse fantasma per mare, solo 1 volta, ma in relazione a sole 2 ore di gioco, vi sembrerà vi abbiano accompagnato per molto più tempo.
Conclusione.

Venduto come DLC e al giusto prezzo, l'avrei consigliato, ma a queste condizioni proprio non me la sento. Detto ciò fatevi due conti, se vi è piaciuto Black Flag e il personaggio di Ade, ve lo consiglio, ma aspettate che sia in offerta, solo per il principio che certi bug, in un DLC di un gioco che non da' problemi, non si dovrebbero pagare.
P.s.

Per quelli intenzionati a commentare che il costo è giustificato dal fatto che non è un DLC, ma un gioco a se stante, perchè lanciabile senza aver installato Black Flag, risparmiatevi, perchè anche il meno sveglio capirebbe che è stata una semplice manovra commerciale per alzarne il prezzo.",1570296396,1570296949,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

55369931,"{'steamid': '76561197963501205', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1569881375}",english,Unstable piece of flaming garbage hard froze my PC 4 minutes into the game.,1569881840,1569881857,False,0,0,0.433070838451385498,0,True,False,False,False,,,

55359298,"{'steamid': '76561197970408752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 1227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 711, 'last_played': 1571519970}",english,"I hate to be writing another negative review but I cannot tell a lie.  I bought this game in the sale along with Syndicate.  I gave that game a thumbs down but this one is worse.

First of all I have played for just one day and am supposedly more than half way through the game.  I expect a good 100 hours out of an Assassin's creed game and this one will be over in less than 40.

Secondly most of the action occurs at sea.  Sure there were some sea sections in Origins but they were reasonably well done. Here you get to take on huge galleons with a tiny little ship.  I guess I'm just pretty rubbish at naval tactics but its pot luck if I win or not.  Adewale is also rubbish at fighting.  I had very little trouble with battles in Syndicate but here I die much more often.

Thirdly there are no side missions to speak of.  There is only the main story.  There are some slave rescuing missions but these are a boring grind.  I did it for several hours to get to 300 slaves rescued so  I could upgrade my machete.  That should make the game easier I thought. But no, this game like many others fell into the poverty trap that the more you upgrade the harder the opponents become so that while you think you are moving forward all the time you are going backwards.
Fourthly, there is no actual stealth mode.  WTF? why make an assassin's creed game that does not have an assassin as its main character.  Miss-selling anyone?

Other annoyances are many: your ship can get stuck in the rocks never to get out again.  I got one bad guy to kill a key holder only to find the keyholder's body disappeared and I could not retrieve the key any more. The back button stops the ship but press it too long and you end up no longer at the helm, not much fun when you are in the middle of a battle.  The list of stupidities are too long to list here.

Overall its a quickly turned out game to capitalise on the success of the Assassin's creed genre; no wonder its always on sale.  Its worth the price of a beer, which is probably what I paid for it but if you want a real game then Origin's is a much better example.",1569878939,1569878939,False,0,1,0.355142384767532349,0,True,False,False,False,,,

55132829,"{'steamid': '76561198362311599', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1568723432}",russian,"Отличный аддон к Black Flag. 54935357,"{'steamid': '76561198045301435', 'num_games_owned': 2017, 'num_reviews': 697, 'playtime_forever': 429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 429, 'last_played': 1567437146}",english,"This has to be one of my favorite stories, albeit, one of the shortest ones, of the AC franchise. The chance to spread freedom amongst those enslaved is a special kind of reward. I also appreciate the characters are quite believable. Honestly, the only real reason that I don't give this title a 10/10 is because of a few issues.

The main issue that I had here was that this was one of the buggiest AC titles I've played, and for anyone that has played multiple AC titles, they know that that is saying a lot. The combat music would frequently cut in and out with no real reason. The player would frequently get stuck in objects. Combat detection was horrible, and I would frequently find myself sheathing my weapon instead of attacking for no real reason. Then I also had quests that couldn't be totally fulfilled because of NPCs just either not spawning or disappearing randomly.
Overall, I would give this game a 7/10. It's an absolute must play, but be forewarned... it's really buggy.",1567437470,1567437470,True,1,0,0.431623905897140503,0,True,False,False,False,,,

54580692,"{'steamid': '76561198974794517', 'num_games_owned': 8, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1647199410}",romanian,Nu mi sa dat cd key-ul si nu stiu unde il gasesc am mai platit si 5.99€,1565606905,1565606905,True,2,1,0.52173912525177002,1,True,False,False,False,,,

54576526,"{'steamid': '76561198053618940', 'num_games_owned': 1023, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 390, 'last_played': 1565505238}",english,"I have 100% synchronization in both ac4 and this game and ac4 is my favorite AC to date.
Very little progression, you start off as a god at naval combat and can take on the strongest ships in the spanish/french navy as soon as you get your own ship
Buggy as fuck, animations constantly glitch out and parkour is very frustrating due to how unpolished it is, adewale seems to do what ever he wants half the time
Missions are dull and boring as shit, in this ASSASSIN'S CREED game you actually only have one mission where you have to assassinate someone, and that's the very last mission of the game

Map design is absolute shit, the missions and optional objectives encourage stealth yet the map is built with only low rooftops that enemies can see you on along with there being a shit ton of enemies spammed everywhere, liked the stealth in ac4, didnt bother unless i had to in this game

Slave liberation mechanic would've been really cool if it wasnt constantly thrust in your face as the game refuses to shut the fuck up about it despite it being obselete after liberating only a few slave ships (which is made even easier with the lack of progression)
Story is the only interesting part about it, adewale is a likeable character and the story has some interesting beats but is held back by the gameplay
Unless you really want to experience the decent story of this game, just play ac4 instead",1565578352,1565578352,False,3,1,0.523995399475097656,0,True,False,False,False,,,

Leaves two big black bars on your screen. Would probably have liked the game if this was not the case. Refunded,1565539057,1565539057,False,0,0,0.45267486572265625,0,True,False,False,False,,,

54503191,"{'steamid': '76561198048865581', 'num_games_owned': 2546, 'num_reviews': 242, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1565190967}",english,"Depends on what you're looking for, Freedom Cry can either be a perfect bite-sized content dump or a total waste of money.
It took me around 3.5 hours to finish the entire thing with very minor momentary sidesteps into opening chests and synchronizing viewpoints.

The game has 9 missions, mostly with some action sequences, which for me was a breath of fresh air since AC4 almost always had extremely boring missions. Just running and following, while here you have action and sometimes even an open route of doing the mission, which is always welcome. However, don't expect freedom on the level of Watch Dogs 2. In the end you'll do the mission in almost the same way. It's just that you have the choice of picking entry points and what else the level design allows.

The story's just so boring and pointless. It's very low stakes and extremely hollow. It tries to have dramatic story beats, but the sound design and mission design kind of kill whatever the story tries to raise.

Visually, this is AC4 level of graphics, hence why the requirements are the same. However, framerates are around 10% lower (on my GTX 1060 6GB, Ryzen 1400, 16GB 2400MHz RAM). Interiors (the only building you're in) is extremely bare however and remind me more of AC: Liberation HD, with empty room, artificial lighting and the awkwardly placed tables and chairs. Even AC2 had more attention put into it. Considering how half your missions are initiated there, you'd expect some type of quality there.

The sound's pretty scuffed. It's so bad that any citizen/enemy NPC that's more than 20m away will sound extremely echo-y. Not to mention, lowering sound settings seems to completely screw things up. Voice volume at 2/10 will make literally all dialogue sound like extremely distant echoes. Not just quiet, but actual distant echoes with echo effects and all that jazz. There's barely any actual music in this game. In fact, when I lowered my music volume to 2/10, it literally never played, so 50% of my gametime, I heard no melodies. Yet SFX sounds at 2/10 are still pretty loud and obnoxious.
This is amateurish shit. Sound design issues like these don't even occur in beginner Unity games.

The music itself had a goal of having slave worker songs of the time, I'm guessing. So often you'll just hear acapella performance of a single man softly singing in French. I understand the goal, but it's jarring to hear when you snap people's necks.

Adewale's just so boring as well. He has no personality and all he has is ""I follow the creed"" and ""slaves bad"". In the end he has a pretentious talk like ""I've learned so much and I'm old now"", like he accomplished a lot or something. Dude, the entire story took place in the course of a week, at best. This wasn't even a chapter in your life.

Last and not least, the bugs. My lord, they're noticeable. Let's leave out all the audio bugs and instead, let's for example talk about how a piece of paper was glued to my hand for multiple hours or how I kept leaning on a wall, when moving away from it or how I literally just lost my main sword, which at first was invisible, but then was completely removed from my inventory for the rest of the game. I thought it might've been a story thing, but it can't be, since the character uses that weapon so many times in cutscenes. Even with the last boss, you can see him hold it. How can these things even occur?

Overall, Freedom Cry's a mess. But it's also an Assassin's Creed game after Revelations that seems to actually care about your time and doesn't bullshit around too much. There's stuff to do on the side as well, so I think that 100%ing the game could actually take you 10 hours in total or even a bit more. So if you really want to unlock ""Dart pouch II"", then you can easily do that for a while.
I recommend it because I like it personally. But for many it could totally be a thumbs down.",1565193069,1565193081,True,4,0,0.589041054248809814,0,True,False,False,False,,,

53740141,"{'steamid': '76561198312209916', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1562381434}",schinese,打开游戏玩了十分钟，我就准备关掉给差评。提醒想买这个游戏的首先要玩过黑旗，然后要等打折再买。为什么这样，进去主界面就知道了，完完全全是黑旗dlc拿出来卖的，进去就是海战，无新手教程，打军舰加三艘船，试想一个没玩过黑旗的萌新进去会怎么样。作为一个单买的游戏，自由呐喊是绝对不合格的。完全copy来的界面菜单，完全copy来的战斗系统，以及进去没有任何指引就进行战斗，育碧你良心不会痛吗？噶韭菜可不可以认真点。傻逼才原价买这个黑旗dlc。想起黑旗满地图破岛和收集要素就心累，以后抽空再玩这个吧。,1562381778,1562381778,False,43,2,0.69725346565246582,0,True,False,False,False,,,

53521669,"{'steamid': '76561198218534871', 'num_games_owned': 649, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1561832877}",russian,"[u] Я конечно не удивлен что такую штуку провернули юбисофт, но сказать, что я охуел все равно что ничего не сказать. Поймите меня правильно как комплект к season pass’у это бы воспринималось отлично, но так как она продается отдельно, да и вдумайтесь просто! Она стоит столько же сколько и Assassin’s Creed Revelations, и Assassin’s Creed Brotherhood!!! Даже несмотря на свою седину эти игры выше ее на несколько голов. Давайте разберем эту САМОСТОЯТЕЛЬНУЮ игру, которая по факту является частью season pass’а игры Assassin's Creed IV: Чёрный флаг. [/u]
[h1] - Продолжительность игры или скорее ее скоротечность [/h1]

[b] Я прошел игру на 100% за 6 часов при этом я не спидранил, перепроходил некоторые миссии и исследовал «открытый мир». Игра суперкороткая (в основном сюжете всего 9 миссий) и не успевает толком рассказать ничего. [/b]
[h1] - История не о чём [/h1]

[b] Сюжет рассказывает нам о похождениях Адевале на должности полноценного ассасина после событий Assassin's Creed IV. У меня сил хватает сказать только то, что история довольно средняя, если сравнивать с Assassin's Creed IV так как: борьба за освобождение чернокожих бессмысленна так, как только где-то через 100 лет чернокожих освободят без Адевале, о самом Адевале как о персонаже мы узнаем не шибко больше чем в Assassin's Creed IV. [/b]

[b] Изначально он вызывает интерес так как это первый чернокожий протагонист в серии, а также он был ранее известен в Assassin's Creed IV. Мне также понравился его костюм, но увы в этой игре он стал менее притягательным. Наделили его банальными штампами типичных героев и пропал тот интересный персонаж. А его анимация добиваний врагов, например, будет напоминать Коннора и Авелину (ведь между топором Коннора, мясницким ножом Авелины и Мачете Адевале довольно много общего и программистам из юбисофт парится не надо). [/b]
[h1] - Отсутствие дополнительных квестов [/h1]
[h1] - Маленький мир [/h1]
[b] Если оценивать с картой из Assassin's Creed IV, то это где-то 1/7. Это при том что игра приблизительно стоит на 100 рублей меньше Assassin's Creed IV. [/b]

column2: - Есть тут нововведение в типе врагов называются «надзиратели» [/h1]

column1: [b] Cледят они за чернокожими и наш Адевале естественно рядом с ним ходить не может. В принципе интересная идея только увидите вы ее за всю игру минут на 20 если не меньше так как все они находятся в 1 локации. Но хорошо, что хоть что-то новое добавили в эту игру.  [/b]

[b] Теперь все улучшения сумок, оружия, скидки и т.д. происходят за счет освобожденных рабов которых вы должны освобождать с плантации и в 1 (более-менее полноценной) локации. Что с точки зрения геймплея напоминает то как вы в Assassin's Creed IV: Чёрный флаг разграбляли склады в море и набирали команду на своих двоих. Так же пока вы не соберете определённое количество освобожденных рабов вы не сможете продолжать миссии из основного сюжета что вообще сделано (чекайте цитату великого мыслителя) [/b]
[quote=Я] откровенно дэбильно [/quote]
[u] Оценка [/u]
[h1] Сносный-душный проходняк [/h1]",1562249949,1562250192,False,33,2,0.716895580291748047,5,True,False,False,False,,,

Я покупал в каком-то году всех ассасинов по очень хорошей новогодней скидке. Это дополнение просто не заметил. 50865961,"{'steamid': '76561198035826989', 'num_games_owned': 650, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1558885743}",english,"No!
NO!
Very much, no!
Want to play Windowed mode? Have two monitors? This is not the game for you.
Windowed mode doesn't exist, so that's a bad start.
Two monitors? Well, don't have the other one open on a window, it's bloody distracting, because you have to scroll your weapons and it's going to be scrolling that other window like mad!
The Gameplay:
It starts you off in the middle of bugger knows where. With some irksome naval combat. Not played black flag in a while? Well, no tutorial for you, so go play some Black Flag first.
There's checkpoints in the most inconvenient locations. You have to sail through a bloody storm to a location that moves several times while you're sailing to it, and in random directions.
Some tit on your boat keeps shouting something every single time you shoot the enemy, this gets annoying.
Land, no spoilers here, I hate the game, I'm not recommending it, but I won't spoil anything.
You have to find some guy, that's all it says, you'll find yourself doing things while looking for the guy. All this will be undone if that guy sees you. Does it bother telling you that? No.
Seriously. This game is just severely out dated. Clunky, and lacks a certain atmosphere. It feels very quiet and looks very bad.

It might be just that it has aged badly, but in all honesty, Black Flag is still okay to play, this isn't. I recommend giving it a miss, less you can get it cheap.",1558886153,1558886153,False,2,0,0.456023812294006348,0,True,False,False,False,,,

50837285,"{'steamid': '76561198156400852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 242, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1604327625}",english,"Pretty good addition to the Assassins Creed franchise, as it keeps with the whole naval/pirate theme except it adds a sense of responsibility as it's your job to save slaves from plantations, trade ships, and abuse. 50313191,"{'steamid': '76561198059588553', 'num_games_owned': 212, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1515666798}",russian,"Прохождение на 100% за 4 с половиной часа,за такую сумму брать не стоит,сюжет не особо увлекательный.и к тому же задания однообразные",1556182545,1556182545,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

50294630,"{'steamid': '76561197966316336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1556081177}",english,"AC 4 Black Flag is one of the greatest games ever made, IMO, and I was eager to get to play more of it with this DLC. I enjoyed Black Flag so much that I put off playing this DLC for a long time until I had the time to immerse myself in it to savour it the most.
Unfortunately, this DLC isn't of the same caliber as the main game, and is mostly just a series of doing the same basic, tedious tasks for 4 - 7 hours, depending on how quickly you play it.

This DLC sums up as grinding by liberating slaves, and the small island you spend the most time on is claustrophobically packed with slaves to free to the point that it's entirely unnatural feeling: There are slaves. Free them. Do it again. And again. And again. You already freed hundreds of slaves? No worries, they'll respawn quickly so that you can free the same slaves again, and again, and again.

So, if your interest is going through the experience of seeing and freeing slaves, which I think was the whole point of this DLC, then this game offers that. If you want a creative story, interesting characters, adventure, exploration, something to discover, then skip it and maybe play the main game again or AC Rogue.",1556082261,1556082261,False,0,0,0.361422836780548096,0,True,False,False,False,,,

50233870,"{'steamid': '76561198215377463', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 535, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1537887500}",schinese,一款作为黑旗和rouge之间的剧情过渡型作品，我觉得质量较次。论剧情还单纯是一个DLC的量，但是相当丰富了刺客的剧情。可以冲着剧情买，但也仅此了,1555771495,1555771640,False,2,0,0.481508314609527588,0,True,False,False,False,,,

50163373,"{'steamid': '76561198156231352', 'num_games_owned': 2487, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 611, 'last_played': 1555107263}",ukrainian,"[b] Свобода, рівність і братерство ?  [/b]

Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry це доповнення до Assassin’s Creed® IV Black Flag, яке стало самостійною грою. Тут нас очікує нова порція пригод, сюжетна лінія і звісно відкритий світ. Історія розкаже нам про асасіна Адевале, який служив квартирмейстром на судні Едварда Кенуя. Від тих часів минуло уже багато років, але попри це, боротьба з тампільєрами триває. Наш герой в ході битви втрачає свій корабель і потрапляє в Порт-о-Пренс. Тут він зустрічає те, від чого втікав все життя, а саме рабство, плантації і колонізаторів. Сюжетна лінія складається з дев'яти місій, в яких Адевале приєднюється до маронів ( втікачі-раби, що створювали свої поселення або вели кочівний спосіб життя ) і воює з місцевим губернатором, щоб звільнити рабів. Сам сюжет прохідний, лише декілька моментів в грі мені сподобалися і я можу поставити за них хороший бал, а решта типово для серії, а в деяких моментах, навіть слабкувато.

Геймплей залишився таким самим, як в оригінальній грі. З часом ми самі отримаємо свій корабель і тепер можемо покорити водну стихію. Насправді  у нас не дуже і такий великий відкритий світ. Карта включає в себе декілька островів, плантацій і закинуті форти, ну і куди без полювання ? Ще можна знайти декілька унікальних предметів, костюмів і апгрейдів корабля. Довго цим світом насолоджуватися не вийде, бо за годин чотири, ми відкриємо всі доступні покращення, знайдемо всі скарби, а після завершення сюжетної лінії, робити тут нічого. Що мене найбільше засмутило - рабський грінд. Що я маю на увазі ? Для розблокування місій або покращень, ми маємо звільняти рабів, при чому у великій кількості. Для цього можна бігати містом і влаштувати колонізаторам теплий прийом, але це штучно розтягує ігровий час. При атаці на плантацію або корабель з невільниками можна звільнити декілька десятків людей, але їх респаун буде тривати довгий час. Ще одним нововведенням є зброя Адевале - мачете і мушкетон, а також нові анімації бою. Музичне оформлення на висоті, що б хто не казав, але Ubisoft завжди стараються на славу в цьому плані.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1709946797

Вроді це все, окрім того, що цінник на цю гру рівний ціннику Assassin's Creed® Revelations. Тому рекомендувати я можу цей продукт тільки відданому фанату четвертої частини, але він можливо розчарується. Та і годин 4-6 геймплею теж малувато. Чесно кажучи, я очікував більшого , але Freedom Cry не стрибнула вище своєї голови. Негативний відгук ставлю не через те, що гра погана, а тому, що за це хочуть грошей, як за повноцінну частину, а геймплейю тут як кіт наплакав. Дякую за увагу.

49657550,"{'steamid': '76561197960526657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 604, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 586, 'last_played': 1553065756}",english,"I loved going from Black Flag to Freedom Cry -- very seamless transition with same gameplay but less bugs. 49580957,"{'steamid': '76561198167018919', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1626372360}",russian,"!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!ВНИМАНИЕ СПОЙЛЕРЫ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
МНЕНИЕ:

Игра Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry изначально была создана как дополнение к игре Assassin's Creed 4: Черный Флаг, но после была выпущена как самостоятельная игра, так же как и Assassin's Creed: Liberation. Но в отличие от Liberation, Freedom Cry осталась, как и дополнение. Вообще Freedom Cry как самостоятельная игра получилась намного лучше чем Liberation. Графика и геймплей игры такая же как, и в Assassin's Creed 4, по сути эта та же четвёртая часть, но с другим персонажем. Локация игры это взятый маленький кусочек из Assassin's Creed 4 с одним городом и несколькими островами. Что касается сюжета он, как всегда, хорош, но в этот раз мы не будем бороться с тамплиерами и искать частицы идема, а бороться с рабовладельцами и освобождать чернокожих рабов. Игра конечно же создана как дополнение, и в ней нет большого количества оружия и костюмов, тем не менее в игре есть чем заняться. К большому сожалению в игре практически нет отсылок к четвёртой части кроме одной. Если судить об Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry как о самостоятельной игре, то она плоха, а если как о дополнение, то очень хорошие.
СЮЖЕТ ИГРЫ:

Сюжет игры начинается через тринадцать лет после окончания Assassin's Creed IV: Черный Флаг. Всё это время ""Адевале"" - Ассассин-пират, служил Братству Ассассинов. За это время он стал капитаном корабля ""Виктуар"". В 1735 году Адевале дали задание устранить французского адмирала-тамплиера, а также забрать у него посылку, содержащие ""Шкатулку Предтеч"". Адевале смог найти корабль на котором плыл адмирал и на ""Виктуаре"" взять его на абордаж. Он убивает адмирала-тамплиера и забирает шкатулку. Посылка предназначалась некой ""Бастьенне Жозеф"". Вскоре после этого ""Виктуар"" окружил французский флот, и Адевале дал команду бежать через приближающийся шторм. Затем Адевале приказал команде покинуть корабль, а сам пошел на шторм. В результате его выкинуло за борт, а ""Виктуар"" был разрушен и пошел ко дну. Некоторое время спустя Адевале пришел в себя на берегу около города Порт-о-Пренс. Именно здесь Адевале сталкивается с работорговлей, которая была все более и более распространена во французских колониях. Затем Адевале находит Бастьену Жозеф. Она рассказывает ассассину, что помогает рабам, в том числе иногда с помощью тамплиеров, и, чтобы подтвердить свои слова, она просит его найти некоего ""Огюстена Дьёфора"" - лидера восстания маронов. Адевале находит Огюстена Дьёфора попутно убивая всех надзирателей. Дьёфор предлагает Адевале новое оружие (мушкетон) и убежище в обмен на помощь в освобождении рабов, которых ассассин сможет освободить, до того, как вернется к Братству Ассассинов. Далее Адевале захватывает невольничий корабль - ""Эксперто Креде"", чтобы освобождать рабов в Карибском море. Выйдя в Карибское море, Адевале освобождает рабов и маронов на плантациях, а также захватывает невольничьи корабли, где также держали рабов и маронов. Однажды во время погружения на дно, Адевале обнаруживает обломки корабля ""Галка"", где он когда-то служил квартирмейстером у капитана ""Эдварда Кенуэя"" (после отъезда Эдварда в Англию ""Галку"" потопили вместе с ее новым капитаном). Далее Адевале узнаёт, что губернатор ""Маркиз Пьер де Файе"" - тамплиер, нанял ученого ""Луи Годэна"" - французского астронома, чтобы тот помог улучшить навигацию карт. После с помощью Бастьены Адевали получает данные о навигации, которые в будущим помогут Братству Ассасинов. В 1737 году Адевале определяет местонахождение ""Порт-о-Пренса Пьера де Файе"" - французского аристократа и губернатора, который виновен в смерти многих маронов и рабов. Он находит его и убивает, но перед смертью заставил его помучиться. После смерти Пьера де Файе, Адевале вынужден покинуть Порт-о-Пренс, так как ему угрожает опасность, а следовательно и маронам. Перед отъездом Адевале прощается с Огюстеном Дьёфоре, а также зашел к Бастьенне Жозеф и наконец то отдал ей ""Шкатулка Предтеч"", которую забрал у адмирала-тамплиера два года назад. Там они дали друг другу понять, что их отношения стали не просто дружескими. Адевале решил, что должен посвятить свои силы и умения тем, кто борется за свободу, используя Кредо ассассинов как убеждение, чтобы защитить их наряду с теми, кто поможет им. Во время своего пребывания в Порт-о-Пренс в 1737 году, Адевале провел ночь с Бастьенной Жозеф. После чего она забеременела и в конечном итоге родила ему сына. Все это время Адевале продолжал служить Ордену Ассассинов и на одном из заданий познакомился с другим ассассином ""Лайамом О'Брайеном"", который проникся большим уважением к бывшему рабу и пирату. После смерти ""А-Табая"" в 1745 году Адевале стал Наставником Братства Ассассинов в Вест-Индии. В 1752 году по предложению своего сына ""Бабатунде Жозеф"", он посетил ""Ахиллеса Дэвенпорта"", наставника Братства Ассассинов в Колониальной Америке и последнего ученика А-Табая. Позднее в 1758 году, ""Эксперто Креде"" выследил корабль тамплиеров ""Морриган"" в Ривер Вэлли. После продолжительного боя, ""Морриган"" нанес серьезные повреждения ""Эксперто Креде"". Подготавливаясь к нападению, Адевале противостоял сыну своего друга Эдварда Кенуэя - Хэйтему Кенуэю, который являлся Великим Магистром Ордена Тамплиеров в Америке, вместе с Хэйтемом был и другой тамплиер ""Шэй Кормак"". Адевале сказал Хэйтему, что его отец был ассассином и ему было бы стыдно за своего сына, за то, что он тамплиер. И после непродолжительной схватки Шэй убивает Адевале.",1552686127,1553115263,True,10,0,0.587697148323059082,0,True,False,False,False,,,

49452357,"{'steamid': '76561198123296441', 'num_games_owned': 268, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 283, 'last_played': 1552122306}",brazilian,"Eu já joguei muito Assassin's Creed, começando no II, lá em 2009, voltando pro primeiro, e indo até o Rogue (minha vida de consoles parou na 7ª geração). Não toquei muito nos spin offs, tirando o Discovery, lá no Nintendo DS, e é com essa parcela de experiência que eu tenho com a franquia que eu posso afirmar: Freedom Cry é o pior AC que eu já joguei e também uma das piores expansões que eu já vi. Primeiro que, por 30 reais (sem promoção), o jogo mal oferece conteúdo o bastante pra justificar 40% desse preço.

Ele tem 10 missões novas, um personagem novo (cujas animações são quase todas reaproveitadas do Edward, assim como fizeram com o Shay no Rogue), algumas atividades extras novas, um outro barco, que é basicamente a mesma coisa que o Gralha, e... só. Com menos de 5 horas de jogo eu alcancei 95% de porcentagem de conclusão, o jogo também não tem lá muito conteúdo de endgame.

Adê só possui um traje, sem variações, o que de cara tira muita da graça que os jogos da série tinham pra mim. Os únicos colecionáveis que você pode encontrar são baús, que não são lá muito atrativos quando nas primeiras 2 horas você acumula mais grana do que iria gastar zerando o jogo 10 vezes, e duas ou três armas novas, que não servem pra muita coisa considerando que o jogo é extremamente fácil e que as armas iniciais dão conta de tudo sem muita confusão.

De verdade, a única coisa levemente interessante na mudança de protagonista e cenário são os equipamentos novos, e em relação ao que a gente tinha disponível no IV, Adewalé só recebe 3 novos, um machete, que substitui a espada de Edward com um set de animações novas (finalmente), um Bacamarte, que causa dano em área, mas só consegue carregar uma bala por vez e é horrível de mirar, o que o torna efetivamente inútil, e bombinhas pra chamar a atenção de guardas, substitutas das clássicas moedas.

Eu senti muita falta das pistolinhas do Edward ou de qualquer opção explosiva no arsenal. No fim das contas, pra mim foi como se Adê fosse um personagem muito mais restritivo do que o Edward, o que é piorado pelo fato de que o mapa é compreensivelmente muito menor que o do IV, e, por consequência, as áreas também tendem a ser minúsculas.

Elas são densamente povoadas de inimigos e zonas vermelhas de combate. Nunca foi mais risível tentar dizer que Assassin's Creed é um jogo de stealth quanto é em Freedom Cry. Foram incontáveis as vezes que eu tive que fazer malabarismos no analógico pra me esconder atrás de um pixel de madeira milagroso que me faria sumir da mira inimiga.

Os mesmos problemas de movimento do 4 persistem aqui. Ações como subir e descer coisas podem ser extremamente frustrantes se você quer ser específico com elas, isso porque Ade, assim como Edward e, mais tarde, Shay, tem esse vício de colar como super bonder nos objetos assim que você faz o menor esforcinho na direção dele.

Em suma, jogar Freedom Cry não foi uma experiência agradável. Todo o gameplay me deixou muito a desejar, incluindo também as batalhas navais, que aparecem na expansão com incríveis 0 novidades, a não ser um novo tipo de embarcação inimiga (péssima) e só.

Eu acho que a única coisa que eu vou levar comigo desse jogo pro futuro é a maneira estranha como ele gamifica a escravidão. A história do bagulho já aborda o tema em si com toda a sutileza de um discurso do Spike Lee, e todo o melodrama de uma novela das 9, só que o fato de que os upgrades do personagem estão diretamente relacionados à quantidade de escravos libertados adiciona essa nova camada bizarra a experiência, onde você passa a querer encontrar cada vez mais pessoas escravizadas sofrendo nas ruas ou nos navios do jogo pra conseguir desbloquear uma bolsa de munição maior ou uma espadinha maneira. Sei que provavelmente não foi a intenção dos realizadores, mas é um tanto desumanizador.",1552123311,1552124189,False,5,0,0.498011738061904907,0,True,False,False,False,,,

49349014,"{'steamid': '76561197962215378', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1547954130}",brazilian,Jogasso top mesmo,1551674065,1551674065,True,2,0,0.545454561710357666,0,False,False,False,False,,,

49055185,"{'steamid': '76561198025599208', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1550417386}",english,"(only recorded as 5 minutes because I played the DLC through the AC4 dashboard)

There is a fairly minor but very irritating bug in the AC4 bundle version of this game - there's no audio files for some of Ade's weapons. It woke break the game but its very distracting.
