48921121,"{'steamid': '76561198345531417', 'num_games_owned': 544, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 609, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 609, 'last_played': 1549873586}",schinese,之前早在黑旗的dlc里就玩过一遍，这次重玩纯粹是因为当时大砍刀没有音效的bug，导致游戏体验不好，砍人像砍塑料，加上想回味一下黑人唱的歌。不过这次体验依旧不佳，人物动作别扭，爬墙体验糟糕；坎伯兰的一个宝箱让我找了半天；龙骑枪居然要主线100%后才给？我主线做完的时候，全搜集全支线已经做完了，我拿这把枪来干什么？这个“开放世界”又没有玩过之后可以留念的地方。总的来说，作为dlc倒是及格的，不过单独拿出来卖就得打个折扣。,1549874093,1549874093,False,3,0,0.526615440845489502,0,True,False,False,False,,,

48762010,"{'steamid': '76561198172524167', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 473, 'last_played': 1561836632}",brazilian,"Apesar da história do jogo ser curta, ela é muito rica, realmente imersiva quanto ao nosso passado sombrio como sociedade, onde os escravos eram tratados como mercadorias, sendo por vezes torturados e mortos, alguns nem conheceram a vida de verdade, o ser livre... Se for parar pra pensar, apesar de acontecer no caribe do século XVIII, esse AC mostra um momento da história do Brasil, na era Imperial e pré imperial, quando falamos do como era explorada a mão de obra escrava e um pouco do seu contexto, como era organizada a sociedade da época. Acredito que esse AC valeu cada centavo, o jogo foi curto, mas a história realmente me fascinou.",1549319182,1549319182,True,1,0,0.523809552192687988,0,True,False,False,False,,,

48619959,"{'steamid': '76561198872121464', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1445, 'last_played': 1549717390}",schinese,感觉太短了，剧情没有深刻突出自由呐喊的主题，而太子港的地图显得小了些，此作本可以更加丰富的,1548731671,1548731671,False,2,0,0.505327224731445313,0,True,False,False,False,,,

48583166,"{'steamid': '76561198845314779', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1047, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 734, 'last_played': 1602936545}",schinese,the  game itself includes plenty of positive things.It goes without saying that it is one of the funniest game that I have ever played!,1548576719,1548576719,True,1,0,0.505327224731445313,0,True,False,False,False,,,

48467831,"{'steamid': '76561198007688772', 'num_games_owned': 1260, 'num_reviews': 648, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1548103419}",czech,"Jde o samostatně hratelné DLC pro AC: Black Flag, o kterém nemůžu říct pozitivního nic. Ubisoft má za to, že nám stačí posypat mapy truhlami a neustále se opakujícími generickými misemi a budeme spokojení. Hlavních misí je jen devět, krom jedné výjimky (předposlední mise) nestojí vůbec za řeč a dohrajete je sotva za tři hodiny. Vedlejší aktivity jsou extrémně repetitivní, v podstatě vždy jde o to někam přijít, pozabíjet stráže a osvobodit otroky. Příběh tvoří připitomělá pohádka o svatých otrocích a pekelných otrokářích, kde všichni včetně hlavní postavy postrádají jakoukoliv hloubku. A nic víc ve hře není.

Freedom Cry nesnese srovnání nejen s hlavními hrami, ani například ani se skvělým DLC The Tyranny of King Washington pro AC3 - ani délkou, ani kvalitou obsahu. Je to ztráta času, zapomeňte.",1548104221,1580560212,False,1,0,0.497925341129302979,0,True,False,False,False,,,

48200603,"{'steamid': '76561198202613939', 'num_games_owned': 458, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 668, 'last_played': 1547011623}",english,"You'd have to really like AC: Black Flag for this to be a good game. It is pretty short, the side quests all feel empty/contentless, and the combat is quite clunky. Other than the 30 ship plunder Uplay achievement, there is pretty much no reason to engage in ship combat. The style is identical to Black Flag, but the gameplay felt less polished overall. I don't know why this is being sold as a stand alone, everything about it screams short DLC. Other than the very short story, it brings nothing new to the table while taking away quite a lot of content from Black Flag. I bought this for $6 on sale, its regular sale price - it should be about $4.
Also, on behalf of all bitter enders, there is a special place in Hell for developers that make their credits loop.",1547012129,1547013907,False,2,0,0.540636062622070313,0,True,False,False,False,,,

48172505,"{'steamid': '76561198264963257', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 503, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 503, 'last_played': 1546878559}",koreana,"어쌔신크리드 1부터 시작해서 전체 제품 정주행 중인 사람이다.
크로니클 시리즈 , 오리진, 오디세이 이 제품들 제외하고 전체를 구매를 해서 게임을 즐기는 중이다.
Uplay세일중에 3, 리버레이션, 4를 샀기에 그거에 대한 평가는 유플에서 적긴 했다만....
프리덤 크라이와 유니티, 로그, 신디케이트는 스팀에서 샀기 때문에 여기서 평가서를 다 작성할꺼니까,
일단 프리덤 크라이부터 평가를 하자면 다음과 같다.
-희대에 초특급 망작 쓰레기급의 스탠드얼론을 표방하고 나온 쓰레기 DLC

진짜 주옥 같은 작품이다. 3때부터 디렉터에 문제가 있나 싶을 정도로, 스토리 구성력이 떨어지기 시작했는데, 그래도 4는 스토리는 좀 모잘랐을지 모르지만 게임성 하나, 그리고 어쌔신에 초점을 맞추지 않고, 켄웨이 한사람에 초점을 맞추면서 꽤나 섬세한 감정선 터치가 돋보였기에 게임으로서 충분히 제 값을 했다고 생각했다. 3과 같은 경우도 마찬가지로 어찌되었던 부족한 스토리를 포세이큰이라는 헤이덤의 일기 형식으로 풀어 내면서 정말 게임 스토리로 부족한 부분을 상당부분 보충하면서 마무리 지었다.

일단 게임의 길이가 스탠드얼론 표방하고 나온 DLC중에서 희대의 졸작이라도 해도 좋을 만큼 적다. 매우적다. 에지오사가가 DLC치고는 꽤 길게 나왔기 때문에 스탠드 얼론 표방하고 나온 것은 충분히 이해할 수 있으나, 이 제품은 스탠드얼론 표방하고 나오는 것 자체가 스탠드얼론 게임에 대한 모욕 레벨이다.(심지어 3DLC인 워싱턴 왕의 폭정이었던가... 1, 2, 3편 합본보다도 짧다.) 진짜 골수팬들 어떻게든 한번 호주머니 털어보자고 만들었나 싶다. 이걸 8천원 가량.... 주고 사는게 솔찍히 상식선에서 생각했을 때, 너무 터무늬 없다. 한 3천원 정도 값어치라 생각한다.

그리고, 스토리 자체도 너무 터무늬 없는 스토리를 표방하고 나왔다. 잭도우에서 켄웨이의 조타수 역을 하던 인물이었던 아데웰이 켄웨이가 영국으로 넘어간 이후에 한 행적중 1개를 다룬 내용으로 당시의 흑인 노예에 대한 내용을 다루고 있다. 이게 말로 하면 이렇게 한두줄짜리 설명인데, 주제가 흑인 노예에 대한 이야기라는 점에서 무게가 일단 너무 무겁다. 짧게 다룰래야 다룰 수 없는 내용을 기본으로 하고 있는 판국에 설상가상으로 주인공인 아데웰 마저도 흑인 노예 출신으로 사건에 대한 접근을 너무 무겁게 만들어 놓고 시작을 해버린다. 그럼에도 불구하고 접근 방식은 너무나 안일하다고 해야 할까... 사건에 대한 모든 진행이 거의 아데웰의 '무쌍'진행형식에 의존해버리는 스토리가 되어있다. [암살자로서 정보를 모으고 작전을 짜고, 행동에 옮기고.] 라는 진행형식이 아니라, [정보는 모으지만 아데웰의 무쌍이 있으면 해결 되겠지.]에 귀결되는 내용이다.
솔찍히 말해서 노예 문제는 미국을 남북전쟁으로 까지 이끌었던 꽤나 민감하지만 재미있는 소재이다. 그런 소재를 가지고 중학생이 수업시간에 공부하기 싫어서 긁적거려본 수준의 스토리로 만들면 누가 거기에 공감하고 같이 즐길수 있을까 싶다. 그래서 소재선택부터가 일단 짧은 DLC에 어울리지 않는 에러의 시작이다.

중간중간에 아데웰이 말하는 것 보면 켄웨이의 영국행 이후의 사건을 다루고 싶습니다 라는 뉘앙스가 듬뿍 풍기는 말을 아데웰이 하긴 한다. 정말 그게 의도였다면, 애당초에 노예해방이 아니라 켄웨이가 사라진 후 해적들의 이야기를 아데웰의 입장에서 회상하면서 그 흔적을 쫒는 형태에서 남긴 다른 떡밥을 회수하는 내용이 훨씬 유익하고 작은 DLC로서도 적합했지 않을까 싶다.

일단 스토리 부분은 아예 폭망이다. 아무리 봐도 좋은 부분이라고는 1도 없다. 스토리 생각하고 사는 사람은 절대로 없어야 할 것이다. 스토리만 폭망이면 다행인데, 각종 버그(배는 없는데 배위치에 스폰이 되서 낙하중에 배가 스폰되면서 배 안에 갖혀버리는 ㅈ같은 상황이라던가, 올라타기 버그로 인해서 공중에 걸어다니는 NPC를 발견하게 된다던가...)도 여전히 존재하며, 한 술 더떠서 빠른 리스폰과 함께, 시아 판정이 어마어마하게 엉망이 되면서 전투한번 걸리면 재수 없는 경우 마을 1/4정도 되는 범위의 경비가 다 뛰어오는 상황을 목격할 수도 있다. 물론 플레이어케릭터는 무적이긴 하다. 어지간해서는 게임오버 걸릴 일도 없다. 그렇지만 막말로 시도 때도 없이 걸리는 전투판정을 보면서 즐거운 플레이가 가능하겠는가? 즐거운 플레이는 개나 주는게 맞을 레벨이다. 이럴때는 그나마 스토리가 짧아서 참 다행이다 싶은 마음이 들 정도이다.

드럽게 말이 길었는데, 정말 이 작품만큼은 어쌔신 크리드에서 단연코 구매하지 않아도 될 작품이다. 평점을 매긴다면, 인트로 동영상 신경써서 새로 만든점, OST 분위기에 맞게 새로 구성한점. 아데웰의 모션을 새로 구성한점에 대한 노력점수를 다 더해서 10점 만점에 2점 준다.(1점은 어쨌든 제품을 완성했고, 1점은 새로 만든 부분은 분명히 있다는 것이다.) 내가 줄수 있는 점수중에서 가장 최하점이고, 그만큼의 값밖에 안나오는 제품을 그 돈주고 사는건 솔찍히 절대 아니라고 자신할 수 있다.
유니티도 평가가 어지간히 안좋은 것으로 알고 있는데, 이것도 이모양이면 유니티는 얼마나 개판일까가 새삼 걱정되기 시작할 정도라고 본다.",1546881494,1546944028,False,2,0,0.47999998927116394,1,True,False,False,False,,,

47578458,"{'steamid': '76561198183056047', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1544993940}",polish,"Kolejna gra, nowy assasin. Tym razem to Adewale, były sternik Edwarda, króry wstąpił do Bractwa. Rzecz dzieje się 15 lat po Blac Flag.
Jest to krótki spin off. Grałam ledwie 6 h. Pewnie można wycisnąć jeszcze godzinkę, ale zdecydowanie nie grając zaraz po Black Flag.
Żegluje się nadal przyjemnie, chociaż przeszkadzało mi trochę, że załoga nie śpiewa ;). Serio.
Eksploracji jest niewiele. Niektóre wyspy odwiedza się po jedną skrzynię. Większość lokacji jest łatwo dostępna.

Akcja polega z grubsza na wyzwalaniu niewolników. To ich liczba jest miarą postępu gry i służy do odblokowywania ulepszeń. Mamy szereg aktywności pozwalających uwalniać pojedyncze osoby (kupowanie na aukcjach, wyciąganie z więzienia, ratowanie zbiegów) oraz większe grupy (wyzwalanie plantacji i okrętów). Dwie ostatnie aktywności są ciekawe chociaż morderczo powtarzalne.

Prawie w ogóle nie używałam petard i broni palnej, strzałek tylko sporadycznie, liny ze strzałką w ogóle. Dużo się da załatwić zwyczajnie wpadając między wrogów i siekąc, albo załatwiając ich z ukrycia.

Najbardziej brakowało mi tu Abstergo. Niby jest w planszach tytułowych, niby możemy przypuszczać, że to kolejna gra powstała z materiału zebranego w Animusie, ale nie wiemy napewno. Żadnej groźby, żadnej tajemnicy, żadnych przekrętów współczesnych Templariuszy.  Chyba że coś przegapiłam.

46508167,"{'steamid': '76561198058159844', 'num_games_owned': 1055, 'num_reviews': 276, 'playtime_forever': 1480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1480, 'last_played': 1542789628}",english,"The very first mission of [i]Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag[/i]’s story DLC [i]Freedom Cry[/i] is not only its finest, it’s also an excellent summary of what made the original game good. We’re tasked with retrieving a package from a Templar admiral aboard his ship. To do this we either board the ship, kill the admiral, and take the package or sink the ship and then dive into the wreckage and retrieve the goods. Giving the player options is what the franchise is supposedly all about, so it’s a shame that the rest of it fails to live up to any of what made [i]Black Flag[/i] fun.

The naval aspect of the game (or as I call it, the fun aspect) has been gutted, with ship upgrades, locations in the world, and variety of activities stripped down to a bare few. Most of [i]Freedom Cry[/i]’s gameplay revolves around freeing slaves from plantations, slave ships, and various other slave-related locations. These activities are identical to [i]Black Flag[/i]’s equivalents for recruiting new crew members. Raiding a plantation is almost identical to raiding warehouses in the base game, except instead of pickpocketing a key to gain access to the warehouse, we have to kill a prerequisite amount of guards to allow the slaves to escape. Stealth is still encouraged, as overseers will start slaughtering slaves if you raise the alarm, reducing the rewards you get for success.

Which leads me into a minor quibble that seems fundamentally bizarre. For a game that’s all about the moral injustice of slavery, [i]Freedom Cry[/i] turns all the slaves into a number even after you’ve rescued them. Doing poorly in any side activity leads to slaves dying, which means less rewards for you. The only time it really touches on the horrors of slavery in more than a token way is a mission towards the end in which you have to free as many slaves from a sinking slave ship as possible. The plot turns the lead up to the Haitian Revolution from a seething pit of atrocities and injustice to the franchise’s signature “let’s rebel against the evil people because they’re evil in a Saturday-morning cartoon villain kind of way”. Never has this franchise simultaneously mishandled both the actual gameplay and the historical context in such a spectacular fashion.

This is a shame, because Adéwalé - your quartermaster in [i]Black Flag[/i] and the lead character of [i]Freedom Cry[/i] - was a genuinely good character in the base game. He was a strong, principled man who juxtaposed well with the selfish aims of piracy and the other characters who practiced it. [i]Freedom Cry[/i] seemed to promise some sort of expansion of his character, but without the foil that was Kenway (and by extension the entire theme of piracy), he’s turned into the same dogmatic, bland hero-type that Ubisoft always comes up with. The way his story wraps up in [i]Rogue[/i] is kind of nice, but Ubisoft’s writers don’t understand that recapturing the appeal of the Ezio arc of [i]II[/i], [i]Brotherhood[/i], and [i]Revelations[/i] requires more than just having multiple appearances; you have to play to the characters’ strengths and how they reflect the era they live in. But, as usual, both the story and the game itself turned out to be a massive disappointment.",1542946302,1542946302,False,8,1,0.561728060245513916,3,True,False,False,False,,,

46314150,"{'steamid': '76561198082231892', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1543236679}",english,"10/10

Black Flag was the last good thing in the AC Franchise. Glad it's DLC doesn't disappoint. Adewale is an extremely respectable character who deserved some spotlight, and Freedom Cry is perfect. It gives just the right amount of importance to him. Not too much, not too little. Takes him out of the shadow of Captain Edward Kenway yet doesn't overshadow Kenway's awesomeness. This is called proper character development. Perfectly balanced. As all things should be.

Hopefully Ubi will stop making more AC games. End it for God's sake. Stop milking the AC cow, it's on the brink of death.",1542895340,1670329496,True,0,2,0.47442549467086792,0,False,True,False,False,,,

46305463,"{'steamid': '76561198029972608', 'num_games_owned': 654, 'num_reviews': 406, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 479, 'last_played': 1543002112}",english,"[b]PROS:[/b]
+ decent story
+ pretty visuals and environment
+ nice soundtrack
+ more strength based combat
[b]CONS:[/b]
- uPlay
- couple of ship/NPC spawn glitches
- many unskippable cutscenes
- really short story
- repetitive slave-freeing missions
[b]Special review section for Ubisoft games:[/b]
[u]Should you play?[/u] YES, IN AC4
[u]Should you BUY???[/u] NOPE
[b]Comment:[/b]

We get to experience a bit of life of Adéwalé (our quartermaster for most of AC IV Black Flag) and his fight against slavery. I was hoping for a real expansion where we would get to know Adéwalé from his beginnings, how he got the scars and ended up on the ship where he met Edward Kenway. Then a shift to some missions while Kenway did his stuff. And AFTER that sequences of what became of Adéwalé. Here you just get the last part and even that is really vague in story telling. The campaign is rather short and consists mostly of just freeing slaves in rather repetitive scenarios that just respawn in the same place (runaway, injured, punishment, auctions, jail, plantation, slaver ship). Still, I liked getting to know at least a bit more about him. The gameplay feels more brutal as he is strength based which translates into impactful hits with the machete or the blunderbuss (which is basically a big shotgun). If they fully fleshed it out as an expansion (like AC Liberation HD or AC Rogue) we could have gotten more story and action. And it would feel different because Adéwalé seems less stealthy and more tanky. You kind of see the wasted potential. Coupled with some weird AI glitches you see how rushed this game was. For example slave auctions I can murder the auctioneer and often the other slavers just watch and wait until I kill them too. If you have AC IV Black Flag this content is available as DLC. There is no need for this standalone version, it doesn't have enough content to call it an expansion. AC IV Black Flag is a really great game that ships with this as DLC so buy it there through Season Pass for the best value-for-money ratio.
[b]P.S.:[/b] To activate, the CD-key Steam shows you, go to uPlay and then to Activate a key.

[b]If you liked this review you can find more on the [/b][url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28638055-Subjective-Reviews-Corner/][u]Curator page[/u][/url][b] or in my [/b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/srcorner][u]Review Corner[/u][/url][b].[/b]",1542893946,1665486615,False,5,0,0.517045438289642334,0,True,False,False,False,,,

44577716,"{'steamid': '76561198371712856', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 327, 'last_played': 1605162911}",schinese,"2018史诗灾难大片《开学》  朋友都去上学了，没那么多时间一起玩。 而且这个月也游戏荒。
买几个游戏过渡这个月。
阿德瓦勒一生也算不容易了，66岁的时候还被谢伊刺杀了。
节选一段歌词 Beyond的光辉岁月
钟声响起归家的讯号  在他生命里  仿佛带点唏嘘
黑色肌肤给他的意义  是一生奉献 肤色斗争中  年月把拥有变做失去
疲倦的双眼带着期望  今天只有残留的躯壳  迎接光辉岁月
风雨中抱紧自由  一生经过彷徨的挣扎  自信可改变未来
问谁又能做到
可否不分肤色的界限  愿这土地里
不分你我高低  缤纷色彩闪出的美丽  是因它没有

44551057,"{'steamid': '76561198055316201', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 461, 'last_played': 1535987502}",english,"I have one major problem wwith this game but I'll get to it.
Pros:
- Awesome premise
- Sequence 8
- See what happened to the Jackdaw
Cons:
- Extremely repetitive
- Almost non-existant soundtrack
- No sea shanties (Thought that would've been a no-brainer)
- Sailing simply feels worse and sluggish
- 1/2 the ""locations"" are literal 20m stretches of sand with 1 chest
- Glitches and bugs on numerous occasions
- Combat engine is a joke or simply unfinished
- Adewale's Character

My biggest issue with this game is they took Adewale in Black Flag, an amazing charcter in his own right and ground all his unique traits into dust. His only motivation to help the people is essentially because they're slaves and ""It's what he should do."" with the game subtly suggesting ""What is wrong with you if that isn't enough motivation? Do you like slavery?"" which in itself should be enough motivation, but because of the repetition, it just doesn't feel like enough.

A sequence that stands out for me is in Black Flag, is in sequence 11, Adewale wakes kenway up after his nightmares with a bit of wit and busting his balls for being an idiot. Throughout all of Black Flag Adewale is painted as a stoic realist but with a wit and character that's more than meets the eye and in this game all of that is gone. He's just doing this because it's the right thing to do and all his humour and charcter has just disappeared.

I understand that the situation is grim and Ubisoft could have explained that over the years his character changed due to the world around him but there's just no explanation. It's simply, ""he's like this now, deal with it."" It feels like they couldn't be asked and just made the character into a broad, easily digestible protagonist with none of the charm that came across in Black Flag.
I love Adeale's charcter (in Black Flag at least) and look forward to the game that allows me to play as that character, but this, just isn't it.

,1535988812,1535988812,False,4,0,0.519711136817932129,0,True,False,False,False,,,
44349449,{'steamid': '76561198351786204', 'num_games_owned': 270, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1483167035}",schinese,"唯一的黑人刺客！
华丽的场景 本作缺憾平淡无味的任务
探索内容极其有限 《刺客信条：自由呐喊》就仿佛是一整部浓缩为五个小时游戏流程的《刺客信条》，这既有好处，也有坏处。
可惜的是，“自由呐喊”摒弃了《刺客信条4：黑旗》中对系列所做的改进内容。因此，对平淡的任务和令人讽刺的缺少自由度的“自由呐喊“感到有些失望。
不过除此之外，阿德瓦勒的故事可以从内心深处打动玩家，“自由呐喊”所描写的故事是整个游戏界此前鲜有涉足的领域，而抛开了刺客与圣殿骑士的神秘纠葛也让这部作品的剧情展现出了独特的活力。",1535113786,1535113786,True,4,1,0.542821168899536133,0,True,False,False,False,,,

44311587,"{'steamid': '76561198376833818', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1554207044}",schinese,本来玩过黑旗就想再买个dlc过过海战的瘾，但是这部dlc体验效果极差完全无法和黑旗相提并论，想体验海战的还是玩黑旗吧，这部实在烂透了。,1534941427,1534941427,False,0,0,0.456431567668914795,0,True,False,False,False,,,

44156429,"{'steamid': '76561198014652555', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1534299293}",english,"3 hours of core content at the most, maybe another 3 hours if you try doing all the extra checklist activities. Only mechanical differences are you have one shotgun rather than up to 4 pistols, and most of your upgrades (which are not necessary) require freeing slaves in various ways. I like the new idea of freeing slaves for this lil adventure. Trying to take down the ships escorting slave ships without damaging the slave ship itself is a fun challenge (but only once, then is routine).

However, the normal price is $15. That is far, far too much for how little is here, imo. Perhaps pick it up when it's on sale for $5 or less, but never more.",1534302721,1534302721,False,1,0,0.472711622714996338,0,True,False,False,False,,,

44148690,"{'steamid': '76561198070823459', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1534270679}",hungarian,Király levezető a Black Flag után.,1534270765,1534270765,True,1,0,0.523809552192687988,0,False,False,False,False,,,

44125476,"{'steamid': '76561198338655392', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 558, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1533128891}",schinese,"不推荐一般玩家购入这款游戏，刺客狂热粉和加一党可以考虑
原因：诡异的动作（很多动作都可以看出完全就是把爱德华的模型改成了阿德瓦勒，比如说破坏警钟（为什么要说诡异？爱德华破坏警钟时是用海盗剑，可是阿德瓦勒直接就是空气切割了......））
谜一样的剧情（作为爱德华在刺客上的前辈，你在海地传输的刺客思想就是不要怂就是莽？还是不计后果的那种？）
总而言之，这部刺客信条完全改变了阿德瓦勒在黑旗中给我留下的印象，从阿基里斯那样的刺客大师变成康ygtfv那样的莽夫

44118945,"{'steamid': '76561198360218344', 'num_games_owned': 473, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1554188832}",schinese,游戏中任务完全是拖时间，任务很简单,1534166514,1534166514,False,1,1,0.476961076259613037,0,True,False,False,False,,,

44008980,"{'steamid': '76561198006622998', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 911, 'last_played': 1622031169}",french,"Honnêtement, n'hésitez pas à l'acheter. (Jouez bien évidemment à Assassin's Creed Black Flag avant de jouer à Freedom Cry vous comprendez un peu mieux l'histoire) Ne faites pas la même connerie que moi. J'ai voulu acheter ce stand alone il était en promo et je voulais aussi avoir un apperçue car je ne m'étais pas intéressé tant que ça à cette Saga. Et honnêtement, après l'avoir terminé et avoir pris mon pied dessus, j'ai directement acheté Black Flag, qui en a été de même. Et il ne m'a en aucun cas déplu aussi. Franchement, pour moi, Assassin's Creed Black Flag et cette ""suite"" est la meilleure de toute la série. Ce jeu est juste magnifique, l'histoire prenante, personnages attachants. Je ne m'en suis pas lassé une seule seconde. Ça va être dur pour moi de retrouver un aussi bon jeu au temps des pirates.
Honnêtement, foncez.
Peut-être Odyssei qui va sortir, je verrai :p",1533767459,1533767459,True,3,0,0.563492059707641602,0,True,False,False,False,,,

43519519,{'steamid': '76561198309149695', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 125, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1531554211}",brazilian,"Nessa jornada incrivel agora controlamos adéwalé, quem jogou black flag vai lembrar dele

sendo o (contra mestre) de edward kennyway de escravo a assassino adewalé em uma missão em alto mar, acaba tentando uma fuga pela tempestade, fazendo ele perder o navio e indo parar numa ilha carente onde o povo permanece escravo, determinado em sua missao adewalé tem como objetivo também libertar todos seus irmaos sendo um dia escravo como foi, ele entende a dor, salvando des de fugitivos, presos ate os em leilões criando uma rebelião. O game tem um errinhou ou outro nada grave, voce se comunica com os npcs com cançoes como

os escravos faziam na quela epoca, ta show, os detalhes da chuva as gotas pegando na pele e escorrendo esta lindo como sempre. e para quem jogou o creed liberation nao se preocupe que esse esta muito melhor! nao se compara, recomendo.",1531554665,1531554738,True,3,0,0.566929101943969727,0,True,False,False,False,,,

43474564,"{'steamid': '76561198037982785', 'num_games_owned': 320, 'num_reviews': 250, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1531355832}",spanish,"Freedom Cry es un DLC para el AC Black Flags aunque te lo vendan como independiente. Y poco que añadir, igual en jugabilidad y motor gráfico, con muy poco añadido pero una historia que sí me gustó por la brutalidad de algunas escenas y por la música que me encantó. Meten el tema de las plantaciones y la esclavitud que es muy interesante y a la vez oscuro en la historia de la humanidad como el comercio triangular que establecieron los europeos.

Lo recomiendo si eres fan de la saga pero en rebajas, como yo me lo pillé, que está caro para las 6-7 horas que ofrece (100% sincronización y coleccionables). Como algo negativo, pues que tiene los mismos fallos en el parkour que hacen que a veces el personaje no responda bien y también me encontré con que te llovían enemigos sin aparecer en el mapa y sin sentido.

,1531356348,1531356348,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,
43472883,{'steamid': '76561198817493404', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 668, 'last_played': 1540066062}",russian,"игра не является полноценной игрой, хотя имеет хороший сюжет, впоследствие и развязку. здесь рассказывается о героях из  четвертой части. сам я в нее пока не играл, но исходя из записок и сцен - все нужное рассказано просто и подробно. игра является длс к четверке, но я преобрел ее по скидону, да и поеbatь. по графенскому все хорошо, боевка на уровне.",1531347519,1540072680,True,1,1,0.498257845640182495,0,False,False,False,False,,,

43429925,"{'steamid': '76561198062539160', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 414, 'last_played': 1531242018}",schinese,自由呐喊是黑旗的DLC或叫资料片，非常短，可以单独运行，不需要本体，同款风格、同款引擎，讲的是肯威走后大约15年后他的寒鸦号军需官阿德的故事，在黑旗里1720年阿德就已经加入刺客，肯威走的时候是1722年10月，这次是阿德在1735年的太子港海域附近为解放奴隶奋斗，开始的船有点像寒鸦号，但不是，后面有一处沉船处阿德透漏因为不明原因在至少在1735年之前寒鸦号在伊斯帕尼奥拉岛的外海被击沉，但具体位置不知道，最后阿德还是把船首像捞上来了。。后面阿德开的信行者号火力也不错，升级很快，解放很多奴隶就行，毕竟作品小不可能放很多东西，不像本体需要资源太多了。本作地图也小了很多，只有一屏大，相对的陆地城市面积就大很多了，搜集要素也多了解放奴隶，解放数量解锁一些装备，技能，支援等，武器都给限定死了，刀只能用大砍刀，枪用范围攻击的火枪，这个还是比较爽，一下打一片，就是装填太慢，战斗时、开船时、鹰眼同步时会有土著歌，这点还是比较好的，很有氛围。还有就是加入了以前的指挥小弟攻击的指令，不会引起大范围警报。激烈的反抗会引来激烈的报复，但阿德还是始终为了自由奋斗，里面的妓院老板娘还是很聪明的，只要要一边维持平衡，一遍积蓄力量，但殖民者还是本性难移，斗争要持续否则也没有盼头。剧情就是解决大概3个事件，流程3-4小时左右，全收集6-7小时左右，就太短了。,1531165265,1531320603,True,9,0,0.6330413818359375,0,True,False,False,False,,,

43311413,"{'steamid': '76561198171000362', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 398, 'last_played': 1530493254}",spanish,"Muy buen spin off de la franquicia de AC. Realmente una pena que el juego sea corto ya que, como todo contexto histórico, tiene como para abarcar muchisimo mas.
Buen personaje. Mejor historia... y muy cruda por cierto. La secuencia del barco esclavista, utilizando expresiones españolas, me hizo flipar.

Recomendable para seguidores de assassins y para aquellos que nunca lo habian jugado (como yo), está a chirolas por las rebajas de verano.",1530755176,1530755176,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

43292064,"{'steamid': '76561198058784212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1529667591}",czech,"Je to furt dokola, nastavovaná kaše, která přestává chutnat.  Změnili obličeje přidali pár věcí, a znova vás čekají lodní bitvy.
Řekl bych, že nepřekonatelným dílem zůstane Assasin Origin, kde si aspon pohráli s bossama a s otrevřeným světem.
Na závěr nejhorší DLC co jsem hrál. Ostuda.",1530696383,1532355744,False,3,2,0.476266860961914063,0,True,False,False,False,,,

43290073,"{'steamid': '76561198146960340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1458463325}",koreana,"흑쌔신 크리드입니다. 스토리는 노예해방이 끝입니다. 스토리 좋아하시면 하지마세요.

43222106,"{'steamid': '76561198090812247', 'num_games_owned': 421, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1530392107}",koreana,"세일해서 7500원에 샀다지만..무기 개방이나 배 부품개방만 딱 하고 스토리 했는데 6시간도 안되서 스토리 끝. 중간부터는 나팔총으로 산탄쏘는 맛에 했다,

43142019,"{'steamid': '76561197972470578', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 926, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 926, 'last_played': 1530227461}",french,"Une version demo de Black flag : 10h de jeux (mini map, qulques missions).
bref une demo : si c'est kdo alors ça vaut le coup.",1530228590,1530228590,False,2,0,0.500797808170318604,0,True,False,False,False,,,

43058606,"{'steamid': '76561198375029180', 'num_games_owned': 1496, 'num_reviews': 919, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1529987081}",brazilian,"Apesar deu ter gostado bastante do Black Flag e deste jogo ser na verdade praticamente uma DLC para o jogo principal, ainda assim não acho que valha mais do que 5 reais, pois ele tem uma duração muito curta e se passa em um mapa muito pequeno e limitado. O contexto é bem interessante, deixa um pouco de lado toda aquela loucura de pirataria e templários e passa a focar em uma pequena trama sobre a escravidão nas ilhas do Caribe. Por conta de toda essa visão histórica dos horrores da escravidão o jogo acaba valendo a pena, prqê vcê consegue sentir um pouco da dor e sofrimento daqueles que eram escravizados, e vcê faz de tudo ao seu alcance para tentar salvá-los dessa tortura mesmo sabendo que uma só pessoa não é capaz de sanar um problema que parece estar presente em toda parte... dá certa agonia ver os ""homens livres"" prendendo seres humanos como quaisquer outros, mas na visão e ideologia lamentável deles considerados escravos, em jaulas apertadas.. bem como vendendo eles como produtos em praças públicas ou até mesmo punindo-os cm ferro quente e pena de morte... todas essas coisas nos fazem refletir do quão maluca é a humanidade, e qntas besteiras fizemos e ainda fazemos até hoje... se ao menos aprendêssemos cm a nossa história mtas atitudes condenáveis que vemos atualmente seriam não somente evitadas, mas também extinguidas. Mas enfim, voltando ao assunto principal, recomendo o jogo pelo seu conteúdo diferenciado e de certo modo realista, cm uma breve aventura em busca de justiça dos oprimidos repleta de ação e, é claro, de assassinatos.",1529992738,1529992738,True,102,3,0.906405329704284668,0,True,False,False,False,,,

42953833,"{'steamid': '76561198332704407', 'num_games_owned': 386, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1529726391}",schinese,剧情是真的短，加上各种收集都没几个小时，放到本体里也就一两章的长度。史低入的还行，如果感觉不值，可以买dlc版的。独立版权当喜加一了。,1529729169,1529729169,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

42943615,"{'steamid': '76561198357943821', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 246, 'last_played': 1529701100}",schinese,"整体流程感觉好短，4.1个小时就把主线剧情通完了。

42916186,"{'steamid': '76561198368016446', 'num_games_owned': 255, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1529561572}",schinese,这一代很短，5个小时左右可以通关，DLC独卖，亏育碧想得出，不过也算完善了阿德瓦勒这个人物吧,1529635555,1529635555,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

42802333,"{'steamid': '76561198158905982', 'num_games_owned': 10694, 'num_reviews': 306, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1529291587}",spanish,"Si de por si te cagaban a corchasos por ser pirata, imaginate si tambien sos negro!
Nos metemos en las transpiradas cachas de un tipo de color ""Adewale"" que que quiere
liberar a su raza que es obviamente esclavisada para poder ser estudiada por los blancos
asi sacar provecho y mejorar sus vidas.
Este debe ser el primer DLC copado de la saga que vale la pena comprar, este pata sucia ademas
de ser el gameplay igual al del IV,  le mete cositas copadas al barco, un machete con el que se
faja a todo el mundo y una escopeta que te deja como un colador.
Nos la pasaremos navegando y liberando Negros de personas que solo quieren hacer su vida mas facil!
No se puede pedir mas, capaz un DLC donde podamos matar negros y no a los nuestros.

42545616,"{'steamid': '76561198155785016', 'num_games_owned': 286, 'num_reviews': 125, 'playtime_forever': 687, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1570588569}",english,"เป็นอีกหนึ่งตัวเอกผิวสีที่ทำออกมาได้สนุกและน่าติดตามมากกับเนื้อเรื่องย่อยของ AC4 ตัวเอกนี้ชื่อว่า Adewale เคยถูกจับไปเป็นทาสแรงงานมาตั้งแต่เด็กๆและถูกเลี้ยงมาแบบทาสแต่เมื่อโตขึ้นก็ได้หลบหนีมาฯ เป็นตัวละครที่เล่นแล้วรู้สึกได้อารมณ์ของตัวละครมาก และแน่นอนว่าภาคนี้ก็ถูกอ่างอิงมาจากประวัติศาสตร์จริงเหมือนทุกๆภาค เราจะต้องปลดปล่อยทาสที่ถูกจับอยู่เพื่อให้เป็นอิสระและรวบรวมภักพวกอีกครั้งเพื่อเดินทางต่อไป เป็นเนื้อเรื่องย่อที่สนุกมากและคุ้มมากแต่ข้อเสียไม่เยอะแต่อาจจะใหญ่หน่อยเพราะว่า Map มันแคบกว่าภาคหลักเป็นหลายเท่าเรยอ่ะ ซื้อ Stand Alone ยังใงก็ไม่คุ้มไปซื้อ Season Pass ของภาคหลักดีกว่าเพราะว่าภาค Stand Alone กับ DLC ใน Black Flag มันแยก Save กันด้วยจริงๆ ผมกันดันซื้อ Stand Alone มาแล้วดันเล่นจบไป 100% แล้วด้วย แล้วเพิ่งถอย AC4 Black Flag Gold Edition มาหลังจากที่เล่นจบภาคนั้นไม่นาน แย่จริงๆแต่ถ้าใครอยากจะเก็บทุกภาคทุกอย่างใง ไม่ว่ากันเอาไว้ประดับคลังเพิ่มจำนวนเกมก็ดี และ Gameplay เหมือนเดิมไม่มีอะไรเปลี่ยนแปลงทุกอย่างเหมือนเดิมแค่มีอาวุธใหม่เล็กน้อย
ข้อดี
-Story ยอดเยี่ยม
-Gampelay สนุกลื่นไหล
-Graphics สวยมากรายละเอียดดีเหมือนทุกภาค
-ถ่ายทอดอารมณ์ของการเป็นอิสระจากการเปฌนทาสออกมาได้ดี
-ให้อารมณ์ร่วม
ข้อเสีย
-Map แคบ
-ฉากแคบมาก
-ภารกิจเสริมน้อยและซ้ำซากไปมาก
-จบเกมแล้วไม่มีอะไรทำนอกจากจะลบเกมทิ้ง
-เกมไม่น่าสนใจและดังดูดพอที่จะให้เล่นซ้ำรอบสอง
ให้คะแนนที่

42500942,{'steamid': '76561197982168359', 'num_games_owned': 466, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1516573272}",english,fun i wish there was more of a story though,1528165839,1528165839,True,2,1,0.520229876041412354,0,True,False,False,False,,,

42488244,"{'steamid': '76561198325261156', 'num_games_owned': 90, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1527849808}",english,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry was an ok game.

It is a filler for the previous Assassin's Creed - Black Flag where you play as one of the characters. Story wasn't as interesting as the Black Flags and not as long either. Finished the story within 3 hours of gameplay.

Everything is pretty much the same as the previous game was except you'll have new item to use which are fire crackers. Otherwise you'll have a ship and can do ship battles and so on. Another thing that was different was the way you can upgrade your gear. To do so you will have to save slaves. The more slaves you have saved the better gear you'll own.

I experienced few graphical glitches here and there - such as going in the building and it started raining in side while it was sunny outdoors or when jumped off ship on the bridge random water splash appeared around me. Nothing too serious tho.
You could simply skip this game and move on to the next one - but if you don't really mind it being short then go for it.

42473311,"{'steamid': '76561198027746824', 'num_games_owned': 46, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 763, 'last_played': 1527892059}",brazilian,"muito boa expanção, muito bom jogo, roda liso, minimos bugs, recomendo a quem quiser comprar.",1528042779,1528042779,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

42471598,"{'steamid': '76561198117906156', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 547, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 547, 'last_played': 1528036241}",russian,"(Не знаю как начинать обзор, поэтому сразу к делу)

Я считаю, что в игре про Ассассинов должно быть что-то про Ассассинов. Здесь же мало что к ним относится за исключением какой-то тяги главного героя к ним и его двух клинков с капюшоном. Я проходил эту игру не с тем же духом что и любую игру из серии Assassin's Creed, а с тем впечатлением, что я играю в DLC, которое попытались выдать за полноценную игру (Что собственно так и есть). Однако хочу заметить, что похождение Адевале пусть и мало можно отнести к ""Ассассинским"", но я могу сказать точно, что игра мне безусловно понравилась, а главного героя я запихиваю в копилку своих любимых персонажей серии игр Assassin's Creed.

Геймплей в игре достаточно интересный, пусть и освобождение рабов на суше по-началу и кажутся достаточно интересными, через минут 30 потихоньку начинает надоедать. К игре прикрутили ещё одну валюту (буд-то в Black Flag одной нам было мало для покупки всяких плюшек к кораблю), однако геймплей это не сильно тяготит. Труднее игра становится в сражении на кораблях (на море, а не при абордаже. Проблемы со сражением при абордаже какими были ублюдскими так и остались), когда вам предстоит освободить корабль забитый рабами, игра становится тяжелее, так-как корабль с рабами охраняет около 3-ёх кораблей за раз, и я вам очень советую для начала как можно лучше прокачать свой корабль, прежде чем идти в бой с этими ""Голиафами морского поля"".

ИТОГ: Я остался доволен игрой, пусть в ней также находятся некоторые незначительные баги (например с пропавшим на одной из локации сундуком). Однако в связи с тем, что игра быстро проходится (10 часов), то я не считаю что игра стоит таких огромных денег, надеюсь что цену в будущем всё же снизят, хотя, это мало вероятно.
Всем спасибо, кто дочитал мой обзор до конца ;)",1528037090,1528105647,True,2,1,0.520134210586547852,0,False,False,False,False,,,

42459722,"{'steamid': '76561198083097958', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 371, 'playtime_forever': 514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 514, 'last_played': 1528032047}",japanese,"結論言うと、面白いです。
4の内容を厳選して短編にまとめたようなスタンド・アローンＤＬＣです。
4から連続だと流石に簡易すぎて飽きますが、時間を空けて久しぶりにと言った場合は十二分に楽しめるデキです。
サクッとこれからプレイしてみて4をプレイするのも有りと思います。
逆にこちらからプレイして本編に入ると追加要素が多い感じになるので良いかもしれないですね。
最新作の盾でしっかり防御、しっかり攻撃の剣闘士スタイルのオリジンもオススメですが、船での海戦有りで、ステルスとカウンター主体の過去作最高傑作とも思える4のＤＬＣなので、簡易版という意味で多少の難はありますが、十二分に楽しめるとは思います。

42441631,"{'steamid': '76561198171509635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 169, 'last_played': 1527927084}",schinese,开修改器体验剧情2.8个小时通关,1527927190,1527927190,True,6,1,0.553802788257598877,0,True,False,False,False,,,

42388034,"{'steamid': '76561198112797338', 'num_games_owned': 640, 'num_reviews': 276, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1527699151}",polish,"[b]Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry[/b] czyli dodatek do [b]Black Flaga[/b] opowiadający o poczynaniach Adéwalé 15 lat po opuszczeniu Kawki, wydany również jako samodzielny dodatek niepotrzebujący podstawowej wersji gry.
[h1] NOWOŚCI [/h1]
Dodatek wprowadza wiele nowości do gry, czego założeniem jest opowiedzenie, a raczej zarysowanie życia Adéwalé — byłego kwatermistrza Kawki. Co dostaniemy?
[list]
[*] Przyjemną opowieść, która wciąga na kilka godzin.
[*] Nowy, nieukazany dotychczas kawałek mapy.
[*] Ogrom nowych postaci — od przeciwników, po sprzymierzeńców.
[*] Wiele nowych broni, czy też ulepszeń naszego rynsztoku.
[/list]
[h1] FABUŁA [/h1]
[i]Śpijcie spokojnie, zestawienie bez większych spoilerów![/i]

Po opuszczeniu Kawki — okrętu Edwarda Kenwaya, Adéwalé dołączył do bractwa asasynów i trenował przez 15 lat, stając się wyszkolonym zabójcą. Pewnego razu morze wyrzuciło go na Saint-Domingue - wyspę, na której niewolnictwo to chleb powszechny. Mężczyzna bez broni oraz załogi musi zdobyć statek i uformować własną załogę, aby pomóc niewolników. Tym samym zostaje wciągnięty w pewien konflikt, który przypomina mu o przeszłości, o której wolałby zapomnieć...
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1396078036

Adéwalé mimo swojego koloru skóry jest niestety bohaterem dość bladym i mało charakterystycznym, chociaż bardzo chciałby być odbieranym inaczej. Jednym z głównych celów przyświecających bohaterowi jest walka z wiatrakami, bo tym w istocie jest skazana na porażkę potyczka z systemem niewolnictwa. Zakładając jednak, że liczy się każdy uratowany żywot, Adéwalé rzuca się na pomoc przy każdej okazji. I to właśnie rzeka, po której płynie dodatek. Ma się wrażenie, że twórcy chcieli zrobić drugie Liberation, aczkolwiek wyszło lepiej, mimo swoistych wad. Tutaj bowiem nie ma szarości i monotonności — ciągle pniemy się do przodu, pokonując coraz trudniejsze wyzwania.
[h1] UDŹWIĘKOWIENIE/MUZYKA [/h1]

Udźwiękowienie [b]Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry[/b] nie jest najlepszą stroną produkcji. Nie usłyszymy już szant umilających nasze morskie przygody, a także mieszkańcy okolicznych wysepek nie śpiewają sobie radośnie. Czasami w tle usłyszymy jakiś utwór z podstawki, a czasami w ucho wpadnie coś nowego — typowe niewolnicze piosenki mające pobudzić do pracy.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1396078345
[h1] PODSUMOWANIE [/h1]

[b]Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry[/b] jest dobrym dodatkiem, ale nie będzie idealnym wyborem do rozegrania zaraz po podstawce. Pływanie po dość ograniczonym terenie dalej jest satysfakcjonujące, rozbudowywanie statku przynosi frajdę, a dobrze wymierzona salwa z armat daje zabójczo piękne efekty. Jednak bohaterowie niezależni nie posiadają takiej charyzmy jak piraci z wersji podstawowej. Szkoda scenariusza, który wydaje się mocno wybrakowany względem ogólnego, budowanego w trakcie rozgrywki klimatu.

Dodatek wydaje się być przeznaczony tylko dla wielkich fanów serii i ludzi, którym brakuje wrażeń. Cena nie jest adekwatna do tego, co dostajemy, co za tym idzie - [b]Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry[/b] warto kupować tylko na przecenach.

[quote=Szynka013]Jeżeli moja recenzja pomogła Ci przy podjęciu decyzji nad zakupem, będę wdzięczny, jeśli zaobserwujesz moją [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33046115-Fridge-Friends/]stronę kuratora Steam[/url], co na pewno zmotywuje mnie do dalszej pracy.[/quote]",1527701050,1529704880,False,16,0,0.632816195487976074,3,True,False,False,False,,,

42320910,"{'steamid': '76561198391694501', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1527295920}",english,"Starting off, I would definitely recommend playing this game with a controller. It is possible to play with mouse and keyboard, but I found myself having to remap keys and it was just less hassle and more comfortable for me to play on a controller. I would highly recommend this game to anyone thinking about buying it. I greatly enjoyed the familiar flow of the game mechanics from Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag, which is very intuitive and easy to grasp the concept of. I felt these characteristics were most visible in the areas of combat and parkour, as the mechanics and handling were quite simple and manage to make the gameplay flow easily and comfortably as I played. The storylines were decent and I felt as though the entire storyline came to a bit of a rough but respectable conclusion. This may have something to do with my thinking that the game would have been longer than it was, seeing as how I managed to knock out the main storyline (plus a few minor activities) in about 6 hours. Which leads me to some of the downsides. The game itself, in my opinion, had so much more potential to tell more of Adawale's backstory or add more missions with Adawale, leaving much to be desired. Moving on to the weapons system, or lack there of, seeing as how your choice of meelee weapons is only your hidden blades, fists, and a Rusty Machete to start out the game with. To unlock the only other weapon in the game (the Steel Forged Machete), you must liberate a certain amount of slaves, as you have to do to unlock other upgrades/gear. I felt as though the liberation numbers for the weapons are a bit to high, guiding the player to start out the game with a mediocre machete and then near the very end of the game all of a sudden get this way cooler, better machete, making it feel a little late to the party. But again, this could be attributed to the fact that the whole game started as DLC and then turned into a standalone game, so I guess I can't hate on the game too much for that. But overall, I felt that the game itself was a solid work with plenty of activities/sidequests to look forward to after completing the main storyline, and I would highly encourage anyone who is looking to aquire this game to do just that.",1527452101,1527452101,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

41989062,"{'steamid': '76561198085367707', 'num_games_owned': 779, 'num_reviews': 372, 'playtime_forever': 727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 727, 'last_played': 1523413657}",brazilian,"Assassin's Creed Freedon Cry mantém a boa jogabilidade do jogo base, mas apresenta um protagonista bem mais interessante e com objetivos alinhados com o espírito original da franquia. O título é um Standalone, ou seja, uma expansão que não precisa do jogo original para ser jogada, mas, em se tratando de uma DLC, é natural que traga conteúdo mais modesto.

Apesar de curta, a história é boa e se passa alguns anos após os acontecimentos de Black Flag, quando o navio de Adewalé (o antigo contramestre do Kenway) naufraga e ele acaba ficando preso em Porto Príncipe.

Ocorre que, enquanto buscava uma maneira de sair da cidade, Adewalé se envolve na luta para quebrar as correntes da escravidão, passando então a ajudar os membros da resistência, formada por escravos fugidos ou libertos de toda a região.

Apesar de ser um tema sensível, a crueldade da escravidão é bem retratada durante a campanha e também na ambientação do jogo, já que, a todo o momento, é possível presenciar pessoas negr4s sendo vendidas em leilões, trabalhadores humilhados por baixo rendimento no serviço, ou até sendo açoitados por qualquer que seja o motivo.

Há vários momentos do jogo, em que precisaremos libertar escravos para que eles se juntem a nossa causa, mas mesmo que não fosse o caso, você se sente praticamente obrigado a salvar alguém que esteja sendo chicoteado em praça pública. São várias as formas de libertação, seja individualmente, salvando alguém preso em uma jaula, ou ainda em grandes grupos de uma vez, interceptando navios negreiros.

O chato é que mesmo nos momentos finais, após já ter libertados todos os escravos para a resistência, eles continuam aos montes pela cidade como se fossem infinitos e toda a sua luta contra a escravidão não tivesse servido de nada. O ideal seria que as forças escravistas perdessem terreno com o avanço da campanha, o que não acontece.

Para além do cenário de fundo, o jogo não possui mudanças em relação ao jogo base. Aliás, nota-se que até a movimentação do Adewalé é idêntica à do Kenway, a despeito de seus diferentes tipos físicos, sendo que apenas armas é que foram trocadas, vez que as espadas deram lugar a um imenso facão.

O mapa foi bastante reduzido, e embora ainda conte com uma grande área a ser navegada, não há nada de realmente interessante lá para ser descoberto. Até os fortes que encontramos nas encostas das praias não precisam ser explorados, vez que já foram destruídos pelo Gralha durante a campanha do jogo principal, restando apenas descer do navio para saquear o baú que sempre estará à beirada da praia.

Porto Príncipe é interessante, mas é apenas um pequeno vilarejo. Temos um navio para aprimorar, mas não na mesma escala, e assim por diante. Todos estes fatores nos contam que Freedon Cry é essencialmente uma versão simplificada do mesmo jogo apresentado no lançamento do jogo base, o que não é necessariamente ruim.

Resumidamente, Freedon Cry é sem dúvidas uma bela expansão, que apesar de não trazer nada de novo em termos de jogabilidade, tem uma excelente narrativa, que é inclusive bem mais interessante que a do título principal. É certamente um prato cheio para os fãs da série. MUITO BOM (8/10).",1526090850,1609804343,True,12,0,0.676803767681121826,1,True,False,False,False,,,

41337084,"{'steamid': '76561198080768780', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1570, 'last_played': 1521757579}",russian,"Хорошо игра.Мне понравилась,только сюжет очень простой и хороших дополнительных заданий очень мало",1523096567,1523096567,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

41290575,"{'steamid': '76561198019219205', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 810, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 775, 'last_played': 1522894243}",english,"I had not heard very good things about this game, which is the reason why I waited so long to add it to my collection. When the right price came along, I took a chance because, hey, it's still an Assassin's Creed game!

After playing through the game, fairly quickly I might add, I am sorry to say that the game was everything the negative reviews said it was. Yes, it is very short, but I also realize it was originally designed to be a DLC pack for Black Flag, so I'm willing to overlook that one. However, the game gets extremely repetitive in a very short time. It's basically going from one liberation mini-game to another. Once I maxed out the number of liberated slaves to get all of the add-ons, there really was no point in liberating any more slaves and I found myself looking the other way when I came across another liberation mini-game.

Second, if you have played Black Flag or Rogue and have any amount of skill in the naval missions, you will quickly dominate on the seas in this game and max out your ship very early on. As you can imagine, it makes the naval battles incredibly easy and a lot less fun.

If you are looking to complete your Assassin's Creed collection and can get this game for the right price, you may still consider buying it. The story is still entertaining, despite how short it is. But, for the reasons I already discussed, I could not recommend buying this game.",1522894845,1522894845,False,12,1,0.610773444175720215,0,True,False,False,False,,,

41093888,"{'steamid': '76561198063115240', 'num_games_owned': 2836, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 3125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3125, 'last_played': 1497738272}",english,"Another Assassin's Creed game, here we're following up with Adewale's story after he decided to join the Assassins in Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag.
Graphics are great, same as Black Flag, soundtrack is also good. But the story is uninteresting to say the least. Also, there's no major progress in the present day story.
We understand that Adewale is on a mission for the Assassins Order but he decides to postpone that in order to end the slavery with machetes and blunderbusses.
This whole game feels like one big assassination mission. Find your target, try to make him vulnerable, assassinate him. But don't forget the side quests and those collectibles.
I wouldn't recommend this game  unless you're a big fan of the Assassin's Creed series.",1522183570,1584139258,False,24,22,0.544768631458282471,2,True,False,False,False,,,

40670309,"{'steamid': '76561198151402237', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 655, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1521943152}",brazilian,"O game é muito bom, porém a definição dele é longe de ser um jogo da franquia Assassins Creed padrão, pois além de uma história muito a parte das questões que envolvem a guerra de assassinos versos templários, o game em si é muito curto, tendo em vista cerca de duas horas de gameplay principal e mais três a quatro horas de objetivos secundário.

A jogabilidade e estilo da gameplay é definida como uma simples expansão do assassin's creed IV black flag, tendo exatamente o mesmo padrão de ataques terrestres e marítimos e estilo de movimentação dos npc's, porém com uma facilidade de vitória muito maior que faz parecer estar jogando no super facil.

Em questão gráfica mantém o padrão da franquia seguindo o mesmo padrão de texturas e caracterização da franquia que evolui basicamente pouco entre um jogo e outro, porém traz uma sensação de profundidade melhorada que traz uma maior imersão durante a gameplay.",1520561535,1520561535,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

40561604,"{'steamid': '76561198070443947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1520167474}",russian,"Это 4х часовая игра за 900 рублей, которая по идее должна быть дополнением к Black Flag, но из неоткуда стала Standalone.Благо куплена была по скидке в 80%, но все равно, заданиe осовободить 150 рабов вообще уморительное.На острове стоят 5 рабов, ты их освобождаешь и в ответ получаешь ""спасибо"" и +2 раба вместо 5, вывода тут два, либо юбисофт просто не доработали этот момент, либо некоторые рабы склонны съябывать сами по себе.Откровенно говоря не рекомендую покупать за полную цену, ждите распродажу и берите за +- 100 рублей.",1520167968,1520168195,False,4,0,0.523607373237609863,0,True,False,False,False,,,

39749007,"{'steamid': '76561198225721028', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 790, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1517934637}",russian,"Настолько забагованная часть, что играть невозможно.",1517411152,1517411152,False,1,0,0.52173912525177002,0,True,False,False,False,,,

39652632,"{'steamid': '76561198302961913', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1517054210}",schinese,"华丽的场景，缺憾平淡无味的任务，探索内容极其有限 。就仿佛是一整部浓缩为10个小时游戏流程的刺客信条，这既有好处，也有坏处。
可惜的是，“自由呐喊”摒弃了《刺客信条4：黑旗》中对系列所做的改进内容。因此，对平淡的任务和令人讽刺的缺少自由度的“自由呐喊“感到有些失望。
不过除此之外，阿德瓦勒的故事可以从内心深处打动人，DLC所描写的故事是整个游戏界此前鲜有涉足的领域，而抛开了刺客与圣殿骑士的神秘纠葛也让这部作品的剧情展现出了独特的活力。

39404576,"{'steamid': '76561197987250837', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1533152039}",russian,"Довольно интересное ответвление от основной ветви повествования Black Flag, тем кому не хватало жестокости в основных частях - welcome",1516159438,1516159438,True,1,1,0.5,1,True,False,False,False,,,

39368888,"{'steamid': '76561198351660768', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1509559162}",spanish,esta bien pero es corto,1516034650,1516034650,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

39211754,"{'steamid': '76561198292173306', 'num_games_owned': 321, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 48231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1662494855}",russian,"Поток дифирамбов в адрес Assassin’s Creed IV был поистине безудержным (достаточно вспомнить нашу рецензию), и тем печальнее сознавать, что на его пути теперь стоит запруда – Freedom Cry, первое масштабное дополнение к оригинальной игре.

Капитан Кенуэй сошёл с центрального сюжетного поста, и на его место тотчас заступил немногословный старпом Адевале, ранее зачастую выручавший незадачливого пирата. Недостаток остроумия и красноречия чернокожий верзила компенсирует брутальностью, а сабли и пистолеты ему заменяют мачете и внушительный мушкетон.

Рядом с Эдвардом, который в качестве главного героя смотрелся как нельзя более органично, Адевале выглядит пришельцем из какого-нибудь малобюджетного боевика, где он с той же мрачной миной нарезал плохих парней. В лысого терминатора заложена только одна программа – освобождать рабов. Программа не предусматривает сомнений, метаний, размышлений и вообще всего того, чем славятся «сложные» персонажи.

В роли плохих парней выступают французские плантаторы, чей досуг выглядит следующим образом: ловить рабов, конвоировать рабов, хлестать рабов, сторожить ра… Скучно им в Порт-о-Принсе, очень скучно. Хандру этих чёртовых садистов и закоренелых эксплуататоров призван развеять наш герой – посредством тесака и заряда дроби",1515517379,1515517379,True,1,0,0.503759443759918213,0,False,False,False,False,,,

39189449,"{'steamid': '76561198054082414', 'num_games_owned': 499, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 475, 'last_played': 1449023382}",english,I don't like Assasin's Creed but I bought this during a sale and thought why not. It was actually really fun. But since its a standalone dlc it's not that long. Still a Assasin's Creed game that was good to me is something I can reccommend.,1515439148,1515439148,True,2,0,0.516026318073272705,2,True,False,False,False,,,

39179165,"{'steamid': '76561198007299088', 'num_games_owned': 315, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1515400290}",german,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry ist, wie viele schon sagen, Black Flag im Kleinformat. Die guten Spielmechaniken, sowie die gute Grafik wurden übernommen, auch der Protagonist (der wie ich finde ziemlich nervtötend ist) ist aus Blag Flag bekannt. Wenn man aber mal von Mechanik und Grafik absieht, ist es meiner Meinung nach das schlechteste Assassin's Creed bis jetzt. Die Handlung ist überhaupt nicht spannend, man wird zu langweiligen Nebenmissionen gezwungen, um die Hauptstory weiter spielen zu können, die nur ~10 Missionen lang ist und sich locker in fünf Stunden durchspielen lässt. Zum Glück. Die einzig gute Neuerung ist die Donnerbüchse, die eine schöne Abwechslung zu den anderen Waffen bietet. Das wars aber auch schon.

Insgesamt lässt sich sagen, dass dieses Spiel nichts bietet, was es spielenswert machen könnte. Wenn man es sich wirklich mal anschauen will, dann bitte nur im Sale kaufen.",1515411686,1515411720,False,4,0,0.522816181182861328,1,True,False,False,False,,,

39109804,"{'steamid': '76561198187835859', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 788, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 672, 'last_played': 1551469827}",english,"Save yourself sometime and don't buy this. I'm not usually harsh on a game but this one time I have to be because:
1) It's exactly like black flag
2) It's buggy unlike black flag
3) It has an antagonist you don't really care about
and finally
4) if you have money to buy this, buy Black flag instead.

Look, the amount of enemies is bullshit. Sure, when you are not doing a mission it is quite fun (on a high specs PC because a low specs PC will lag   H E A P S  ) killing dudes in large battles. You couldn't accomplish that in black flag. However, during a mission IT IS LITERALLY IMPOSSIBLE TO STAY HIDDEN. I HAD TO REDO ALL THE MISSIONS AT LEAST 5 TIMES TO NOT DIE.
But if you really want this, do yourself and buy it as DLC, not the standalone. It also doesn't come with a tutorial, so people coming from console like I did, beware.
Edit:
I just want to add two things because I feel like I went a little hard on this game.
1) The world is beautiful. I managed to get several screenshots of the moon rising over a island while I was taking a ship which was amazing.

2) The tight nature of the map, which I already stated I don't like because missions, can also make things quite satisfying and/or even more breath taking. I boarded a ship in the middle of a british/spanish battle full of brigs, man'o'wars and frigets and my god I almost died looking at the battle around me.

However, I still don't recommend this game. A few breath taking and amazing moments cannot compensate with how frustrating the game actually is.",1515224101,1515434531,False,5,1,0.522163629531860352,1,True,False,False,False,,,

38796667,"{'steamid': '76561198115669348', 'num_games_owned': 580, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1520752516}",russian,"Годное длс, жаль разве что короткое :)",1514498721,1514498721,True,5,1,0.572561860084533691,0,False,False,False,False,,,

38791888,"{'steamid': '76561198190380543', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 603, 'playtime_forever': 582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 582, 'last_played': 1514489966}",english,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry offers a trimmed down experience of what Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag offers. While its core mechanics are the same, exploration and progression are way more limited. It serves mainly as a way to tell a short story with Adéwalé, one major NPC in Black Flag. And while it isn't great, the focus on slavery is refreshing and interesting. One particular mission managed to shock me a bit, which is a good accomplishment. As an epilogue to Black Flag, it's actually decent.

Then why am i giving a negative rating? Price. There's 2 major problems in my view: 1 - If you haven't played Black Flag before, you can get that full game for just a little more, which has way, way more content; 2 - If you have finished Black Flag and want more of the same experience, you can get Freedom Cry as DLC for less money. Also, for just a little more, you can get Assassin's Creed Rogue, which is a full game that also uses the same mechanics as Black Flag, but in a different setting. Both of these options offer way more value. That's why i don't recommend to get Freedom Cry as a standalone game. It's overpriced.",1514489446,1514489446,False,19,1,0.66520613431930542,0,True,False,False,False,,,

38750194,"{'steamid': '76561198075150126', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1550353365}",brazilian,jogo top viu,1514402525,1514402525,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

38659747,"{'steamid': '76561198312911734', 'num_games_owned': 1242, 'num_reviews': 292, 'playtime_forever': 261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1514210913}",schinese,"[h1]8/10 他是个传奇，倒在另一个传奇的脚下，也不失这传奇之名。[/h1]
（仅）主线通关感言
我对刺客信条系列的游玩过程是反向来的，让我认识黑叔叔的，不是源自黑旗，而是反叛。
我很惊喜黑叔叔居然有过这样的人生，为了黑人的自由不懈奋斗。
但是这一作中同样发现了他性格上的缺点，冲动，不择手段，可能就是谢伊与他为敌，与兄弟会为敌的原因吧。。。
[strike]黑叔叔应该是刺客信条这部作品中，最没有存在感，最平凡的刺客之一了吧！[/strike]

38587609,"{'steamid': '76561198128425811', 'num_games_owned': 382, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1514050086}",french,"Ce premier DLC solo d'Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag s'avère satisfaisant. 38350828,"{'steamid': '76561197994281375', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 442, 'last_played': 1513432483}",english,"4 out of 10
The good:
1. The game is short.
2. It is the first Assasins Creed game where you get to do stuff that actualy benefit people - free slaves.
The bad:

3. The game would have been better as a DLC for AC Black Flag.  I continuously compared it to Black Flag and Freedom Cry unfrotunately falls well short.  The graphics are far inferior to Black Flag - it does not have the same high defenition textures.  This game also lacks the excellent singing music from Black Flag.
4. Freedom Cry does nothing for the AC mordern storyline.

5. The actions you need to take are poorly explained.  Do not even think of playing Freedom Cry if you have not played Black Flag first.",1513432864,1513432864,False,3,1,0.370338648557662964,2,True,False,False,False,,,

38157847,"{'steamid': '76561198053337002', 'num_games_owned': 204, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 585, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 577, 'last_played': 1681824382}",english,"Worse Blag Flag. 36995933,"{'steamid': '76561198142571930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1511427943}",spanish,"Una versión mini del Assassins Creed Black Flag, originalmente un DLC de este, separado en una versión individual que no necesita el juego original; la cual esta algo mas optimizada y se siente mas refrescante que el Black Flag al no ser los movimientos reciclados y que las armas principales tanto cuerpo a cuerpo como a distancia sean distintas y esto le de un set de movimientos distinto al personaje.

Los eventos en el mapa tienen una finalidad que es la de desbloquear mejoras para el personaje y el barco, el explorar el mapa te da recompensas inmediatas como es armas nuevas, los cofres dan mas dinero que en su predecesor lo cual es de agradecer y hay menos coleccionables que en el Black Flag lo cual tambien se agradece.

No merece la pena por el precio que tiene tanto como DLC como juego separado ya que de historia tendra alrededor de 2-3 horas, pero si lo encuentras en oferta entonces si que merece la pena ya que es mas dinamico que su predecesor.",1511429674,1511429674,True,9,0,0.632925510406494141,0,True,False,False,False,,,

36496379,"{'steamid': '76561198403725234', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1783, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1768, 'last_played': 1511348807}",thai,เป็นเกมส์ที่เล่นสุกอีกเกมส์ครับ,1510595658,1510595658,True,0,0,0,0,False,False,False,False,,,

36451763,"{'steamid': '76561198074645620', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1510426342}",russian,"[h1]ПОЧЕМУ ЭТО DLC ПРОДАЮТ КАК ОТДЕЛЬНУЮ ИГРУ?[/h1]

Если бы [b]Freedom Cry[/b] не продавался под видом отдельной игры, я бы не купил это DLC. По сравнению с историей, возможностями и персонажами [b]Black Flag[/b] оно воспринимается как жалкий сухой огрызок.

Как персонаж, Адевале и в ""Черном флаге"" был не особо интересен, если не считать его перепалок с Кенуэйем. Здесь же вся картонность его сущности раскрывается полностью. Такими же свойствами обладают и все персонажи на нашем сюжетном пути.

По концепции и сюжету ""игры"" вы должны освобождать рабов и благодаря этому пополнять армию повстанцев, дабы совершить бунт и освободить всех невольников разом. На этом все. Ничего нового, по сути, DLC не педлагает - освобождать рабов на плантациях и рынках интересно только в первые разы, а новое оружие (мушкетон, мачете, петарды) сути происходящего не меняет.
Сам же сюжет - плоский, как лист бумаги. Ничего запоминающегося в нем нет, равно как и во всем дополнении.
[b]Итог таков[/b]: [u]не тратьте свои деньги и время на эту ""игру""[/u]. Она ни стоит вашего внимания.",1510429153,1510429462,False,12,1,0.602786839008331299,0,True,False,False,False,,,

36371831,"{'steamid': '76561198282893494', 'num_games_owned': 1146, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1510133949}",russian,"Хронологически, события дополнения разворачиваются спустя 15 лет после финала основной игры. Главным героем дополнения стал Адевале, бывший раб, корсар, затем квартирмейстер Эдварда Кенуэйя, а затем уже и убежденный ассассин. Покинув борт коробля Эдварда, Адэ сам сделался капитаном и последние годы самолично топит тамплиерские суда на благо ордена Белых капюшонов. И как раз одно из рутинных заданий Братства забрасывает его в окрестности Порт-о-Пренса, где он лишается корабля с командой, и оказывается втянут в локальную войну за освобождение рабов, в рамках которой ему, то есть тебе, предстоит громить плантации, убивать надсмотрщиков, разорять аукционы и нападать в море на невольнические суда. И, в общем, да, если говорить коротко - это вся суть игрового процесса, который в Крике Свободы растянут на 9 не очень длинных сюжетных заданий, приправленных крохотным кусочком морского опен ворлда.

Конечно, глупо было бы ожидать от небольшого, в сравнение с оригинальной игрой, загружаемого дополнения,того же уровня раскрытия героев и, какой-никакой, сюжетной драматургии. Но на поверку, Адэ оказался не менее интересным персонажем, чем капитан Кенуэй, не заслуживающим при этом целой отдельной игры, но прекрасно отрабатывающим свои деньги в рамках дополнения. Он крепок, тверд в своих убеждениях, безгранично предан братству ассассинов и, разумеется, совершает поступки во имя высшего блага, зачастую пренебрегая своими интересами.

С другой стороны, мотив борьбы за свободу, который должен двигать сюжет вперед, раскрылся чуть менее, чем никак. Вот вроде бы ты только начал громить небольшой флот тамплиеров на море, и вот ты уже наблюдаешь за медленно ползущими по экрану титрами, краем глаза поглядывая на часы. То есть, вроде есть и персонажи, которые говорят нужные вещи, и притеснение во всей своей красе, разумеется порезанное возрастным рейтингом, но проникнуться не получается никак.

В общем, должен сказать, что несмотря на довольно куцый морской опен ворлд, по которому мы передвигаемся на абсолютной копии ""Галки"", к которой можно даже соответствующую фигурку приделать, предварительно за ней сплавав, и большой фокус на сухопутных миссиях, которые происходят в одном единственном городке, и пятерке абсолютно одинаковых плантаций, дополнение мне, скорее понравилось. Оно определенно лучше, чем жалкий обрезок геймплея за Авелину, который почему-то прозвали эксклюзивным контентом для PC и PlayStation, и оно куда больше развязывает тебе руки и открывает какой-никакой, но простор для реиграбельности. Я, правда, психанул и открыл все ачивки, поэтому лично мне туда возвращаться вообще не хочется. Но как лекарство от долгой тоски по Карибам, если вы, конечно, прошли игру еще в октябре-ноябре, я Freedom Cry определенно могу посоветовать. Ну а если вы, так же как и я, вот только что закончили основную игру, то ради бога, есть же еще куча игр, на которые стоит потратить время, пока есть несколько свободных вечеров. Лучше поверните голову к ним.",1510134153,1510134153,True,8,0,0.590968191623687744,0,True,False,False,False,,,

35559835,"{'steamid': '76561198129904681', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 814, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 802, 'last_played': 1538366343}",spanish,"Compré este primero antes de finalmente adquirir el IV puesto ese último lo había pasado en PS4 y en esa ocasión no tuve la oportunidad de adquirir este DLC, así que era practico el poderlo adquirir como contenido standalone.

35529364,"{'steamid': '76561197969481463', 'num_games_owned': 2019, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 572, 'last_played': 1507329922}",english,"Buy only if you've already played Assassin's Creed IV and want a little more. And then I still would only recommend this on sale. It's very short. I was able to 100% this game in about 12 hrs. I probably could have done the main story missions in half that. In my time playing I did crash twice, but the checkpoint system is very generous, I was able to start up again during the mission after my last checkpoint only seconds before the crash happened.

Anyways, this is a nugget sized piece of Black Flag, only with a slave freeing side activity. You get a small area to sail around in and get into ship battles. Little islands to find chests in. There is harpooning but only for materials to sell. Instead of fortresses, you've got plantations where you have to kill guards to free slaves. There is 1 main city where you can go around freeing slaves being punished, incarcerated in cages, being transported, or just lying in the ground hurt. The combat is basically the same as part 4.

The story is OK, nothing great but neither are most AC games. I played AC IV back when it first came out on the 360 and really enjoyed it so going back to it for a little bit was very fun. Buy Assassin's Creed IV instead if you have a choice, otherwise this is a fine little extra.",1507330780,1507330780,True,26,3,0.770829916000366211,0,True,False,False,False,,,

35476267,"{'steamid': '76561198145061846', 'num_games_owned': 265, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 854, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 534, 'last_played': 1656133280}",schinese,"非常没有诚意的DLC
被单拆出来卖就算了，游戏内容还非常的少，仅9小时就100%剧情同步+全收集全升级完成（其中还包括了我一直在海上瞎瘠薄逛看风景的时间）
自带官繁中，论游戏素质，真的只能给个中偏差评
但毕竟是刺客粉，这个DLC补全了阿德的故事，展现了一代黑人刺客大师的成名之战，姑且给个好评吧。。。
从小便为黑奴的阿德瓦勒，填充内心最多的便是对自由、解放的向往，他比谁都清楚黑奴体制下的血腥、黑暗，这也促使他将毕生精力投入到刺客事业当中，投入到黑奴解放战争中
游戏中还出现了沉没的寒鸦号，着实让人感慨：一代海洋霸主，最后依然摆脱不了魂归大海的命运
+精湛的剧情，角色塑造出色
黑人刺客大师阿德瓦勒与马龙的成员对抗殖民主义与资本主义，解放黑人的战争，剧情虽短但精彩
+海战
延续了黑旗的海战系统，依然让人沉迷
+优秀的音乐
被游戏耽误的音乐公司
-糟糕透顶的优化
优化比本体黑旗还差，掉帧现象严重
-跑酷落点判定差劲
系列硬伤
-极少的游戏内容，超短的主线
没有支线剧情，只有隔段时间会刷新的随机任务；没有新内容，只加入了一个没什么卵用的鞭炮，除此之外把四把手枪改成了单喷；剧情精彩但是短的要命，只有⑨个序列
-赶工、应付痕迹明显
许多音效嵌入都没做好，除了主角外NPC的动作就像独立游戏
总体而言是个让人不满的DLC，非常不建议原价入
此外运行好像也有点问题？Win10每次打开游戏都会黑屏然后未响应一段时间后才开始运行",1507136819,1507136819,True,30,4,0.74292987585067749,0,True,False,False,False,,,

34796867,"{'steamid': '76561198115506232', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1452330184}",russian,"Не очень,но за 40 хривень сойдёт.",1504799040,1504799040,False,0,2,0.427350431680679321,0,True,False,False,False,,,

34767077,"{'steamid': '76561198108652055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1504657995}",english,"One of the worst AAA titles Ive ever played. First off, the story is boring. The gameplay is boring. All of your actions feel like your hand is being held. They shouldve just sent the devs over to push the buttons for me. And even though every single action is being prompted to you, they do nothing to tell you how or why you should use certain features.

I reinstalled to revisit this game. I had it form the beginning. I played for 30 mins and never went back. So, I thought maybe I was being unfair. Im not. And the only reason why this has good reviews is because the cinematics are fine and there is a loyal fanbase that only upvotes things because it is AC. Thats it. I've had a long and detailed discsussion about this with a few of them. In the end - after a long long time of denying their bias - they finally just said ""well I like AC so I can look past the fact its almost totally flawed"". To date not a  single one  has been able to make a Pro vs Con list where the cons are less numerous than the positive points.
Also, uPlay FTH (for the headache)!",1504658349,1504658349,False,12,2,0.355258464813232422,9,True,False,False,False,,,

34606545,"{'steamid': '76561198331854913', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1285, 'last_played': 1527544722}",german,"+ Seeschlachten machen nach wie vor Laune
+ ein paar neue Gadgets und neue Spielmechanik der Sklavenbefreiung
- nur mehr vom selben
- Story völlig belanglos, hab sie nach 2 Wochen schon wieder komplett verdrängt
- nur ein cooler Abschnitt in einer Hauptmission, sonst sind die Missionen Einheitsbrei
- Entern besiegter Schiffe durch schlechte Kameraführung ein Krampf (wie im Hauptspiel)
Alles in allem ist es ein unnötiger DLC, der vom Thema her, der Sklaverei, eigentlich interessant ist. Dessen Umsetzung storymäßig aber einfach nur schwach und langweilig ist.
Man bekommt max. 10h (wenn man alles macht und sich auch sonst Zeit lässt) nochmal fast genau dasselbe, wie im Hauptspiel.

34440311,"{'steamid': '76561198250155694', 'num_games_owned': 510, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 539, 'last_played': 1645207109}",russian,"[h1] Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry [/h1]
Или как Юбисофт сама себя убивает и заодно издевается над фанатами.
Это мой первый ассассин именно в Стиме, но когда я его покупал, он у меня не пошел, поэтому вполне могу оценить игру(если конечно 7-часовой контент можно назвать игрой) сейчас.
[h1] Сюжет [/h1]

Название игры оправдывает себя. Мы занимаемся освобождением рабов. И честно, это возможно единственный ассассин, где сообственно ассассин занимается благой целью. В первой части мы убивали всяких тамплиеров, но одновременно эти тамплиеры являлись деятелями прогресса. Во второй мы, конечно убивали довольно таки злых людей. но злые они потому что были злодеями и хотели УХАХАХАХА ПРАВИТЬ МИРОМ. В Братстве мы мстили за Монтериджони и освобождали Рим от влияния Борджиа. В Откровениях антагонист просто не о чём. В третьей, понятно, там Хэйтем, и он неоднозначный персонаж, его идеи были интересны и могли бы быть благом для всех. Но как минимум, цели у Коннора благородные были, борьба за свободу, защита своих родичей и т.д. В четвертой все Bruh, и только во Крике свободе мы занимаемся тем, чего мы ждем от ассассинов. Адевале освобождает рабов, убивает рабовладельцев и его могу назвать даже очень хорошим протагонистом, где-то на равне с Коннором, они даже похожи в чем-то. И, кстати, будь игры серии жестче, делай бы игру Рокстар, Порт-о-Пренс превратился бы в кровавую баню, Адевале очень жестоко убивает своих врагов.
[h1] Открытый... мир?[/h1]

Что это такое? Понятно конечно, что игра маленькая, но извините, посещать часть острова ради одного сундука на этом же острове это сильно. Могли бы перья, шанти, или же карты сокровищ засунуть в игру. Что касается единственного города в игре, Порт-о-Пренс даже не ощущается как город, что жаль. Сама карта очень маленькая, хорошо было бы, будь она качественная, но когда ради сундука нужно спрыгивать с корабля, чтобы открыть этот сундук на 1/10 острова, я не могу назвать карту качественной. Скорее карта сделана для сюжета, но он не блещет каким-то оригинальным замыслом или неожиданными поворотами. Лучше бы линейным с возможностью песочности игру сделали, как в Chronicles.
[h1]ДЛС или ОТДЕЛЬНАЯ ИГРА[/h1]

Может, кто-то не знает, но Freedom Cry является одновременно ДЛС для четвертого ассассина. Никак кроме жадности Юбисофт, я не могу назвать это. Я в свое время купил игру, когда не знал об этом, хорошо что на стоила тогда дешево. Еще странно, что игра весит 10 гб, в то время, когда очень большой Assassin's Creed 3 весит где-то 17 гб.
[h1] Почему они не сделали это?[/h1]

Пришла мысль, что игру можно было бы сделать не ДЛС четверки, а ориджином Изгоя. Как в третьей части можно было сделать, когда сначала играешь за Хэйтема, потом за Коннора. И если что переключатся между героями. Так бы и Изгой был бы более полноценным и игру бы возможно лучше оценили, и карту Крика Свободы можно было бы заполнить, да и еще пару квестов добавить. Юбисофт, как так-то?
[h1] ИТОГ[/h1]
Крик свободы могла бы быть более масштабной, будь Юбисофт более просчётливее, наверное. Адевале очень интересный персонаж, и жаль, что его недооценивают.
Сама игра на [b]5,5/10[/b], проблема не в том что она некачественная, а в том что она была бы нужнее как часть Изгоя.
[h1]Обзоры на остальные части Assassin's Creed[/h1]

33617985,"{'steamid': '76561198007623275', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1500066897}",french,"Il s'agit d'un épisode calqué sur AC IV Black Flag, avec exactement le même maniement des navires. Cependant, le héros, ex compagnon de Kenway dans AC IV, est moins bien doté que lui (une machette peu efficace et un tromblon à courte portée) et sa résistance n'atteint pas celle de Kenway. La particularité est qu'il lui faut sauver des esclaves en nombre suffisant pour débloquer des améliorations.

La carte est plus petite et les missions moins nombreuses qu'AC IV, mais le tout est plaisant si l'on veut prolonger l'expérience de AC IV Black Flag, dans un scénario évidemment anti-esclavagiste et très manichéen.",1500331646,1500331646,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,
