33403791,"{'steamid': '76561198360572103', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1499027478}",swedish,j,1499606117,1499606117,False,0,0,0.423432022333145142,0,True,True,False,False,,,

33339848,"{'steamid': '76561198013325883', 'num_games_owned': 1018, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 913, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 913, 'last_played': 1499391421}",english,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry is a great addition to the franchise. It rises where Black Flag falls. Story.  It's still a very very short story but there are touching storyline, characters you care,  and the game just feels like you are actually in the slavery era, and the amazing music, side quests and atmosphere strengthens this situation. Adewale is a strong main character. We saw him in Black Flag, but we never knew the characters backstory, or the connection to Assassin's. The map is also really big , especially in a short game like this, there are lots of secrets to discover, treasures to find. And awesome side activities like diving or harpooning big sea animals still here, and still fun as hell. Liberating slaves are fun. But gets boring and repititve really fast. The great mix of stealth and blunt combat is great, machete is also very satisfactory weapon. Ship and Adewale upgrades gradually increases the gametime for completionists like me. Its overall great fun for all Assassins Creed lovers.
[h1] Pros:	[/h1]
+ Great graphics and atmosphere
+ Lots of side activities and unlockables
+ Big map, lots of places to travel
+ Great and fitting soundtracks
+ Very good story
+ Great combat, personally the best in the series
+ Lots of weapons, side weapons and fun items
[h1] Cons:	[/h1]
- Abysmally short story
- No alternate outfits
- Lots of bugs

31300973,"{'steamid': '76561198248426008', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1493634808}",schinese,"刺客信条系列第一位可操作的黑叔叔刺客，原价88但是却是Dlc改的游戏，育碧真有你的哈哈哈。
[b] 【游戏内容】 [/b]
救不完的黑人奴隶和砍不尽的入侵者，手持霸气的开山刀仿佛让我们看到了那个男人的背影。自由呐喊就是一部缩略版的黑旗，以解放黑人为大背景，删减了攻打堡垒、藏宝图和丛林探险等部分，增加了反抗部队、劫持奴隶船和拯救黑奴等新内容。
但终归是由Dlc强行改成独立游戏，所以游戏内容上还是略为不足，看到隔壁巫师3的石之心血与酒，我就笑笑不说话。随机任务内容又少重复度还高，我感觉救过的奴隶比全岛上的人还多，今天救了这个明天他又被抓了，你在逗我吗？
关于龙骑枪和玛雅刀(大概是这个名字吧)，玛雅刀是在某个岛上捡到的，龙骑枪好像是百分百同步给的。
[b] 【剧情概括】 [/b]
主角阿德瓦勒曾经是爱德华的大副，接受刺客之道后投身于解放事业，阿德瓦勒的鹰眼是后天训练出来的，一没血统二没天赋的他，最终却凭借自身的努力成为一代传奇刺客。而一生都在为解放黑人追求自由而奋斗的他，最后却死在了后辈谢伊手里，真是英雄迟暮啊。
在水下捡到寒鸦号船首的那一刻，实在是百感交集。肯威家族在外名扬四海所向披靡，却遭卑鄙小人暗算。昔日在海上威风八面、传奇无比的寒鸦号，满载着热血男儿的血与泪、爱与恨，最终也随之沉默于冰冷的海水之中。真是物是人非事事休，愿他们来世也能共乘一条船在大海上继续乘风破浪一往无前。
如何评价爱德华 · 肯威 ？

Recensione[url=http://fabereview.blogspot.it/2017/02/assassins-creed-liberation-hd.html] Assassin's Creed Liberation HD[/url]
Recensione[url=http://fabereview.blogspot.it/2017/04/assassins-creed-iv-black-flag.html] Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag[/url]
Questo DLC.... non è proprio malvagio
Certo porta parecchie pecche se confrontato al gioco base, ma tutto sommato è sulla norma.
[h1]PRO[/h1]
[b]Protagonista[/b]: Uno dei pregi che ho apprezzato tanto di questo dlc stand-alone è il nostro Protagonista: Adéwalé.
Esatto il nostromo del gioco base che accompagna sempre il nostro Edward è il protagonista di questo DLC, e sinceramente tiene un carisma che mi è piaciuto tanto.

Durante il gioco ci son state diverse decisioni da lui prese che mi sono piaciute un sacco. Non intendo il classico ""Salva gli schiavi dall'uomo bianco"", pure quello c'è, ma sono ben altre le azioni che mi son piaciute.
[h1]NEUTRO[/h1]
[b]Trama[/b]: La trama ha qualche similitudine con quella di ""Assassin's creed Liberation"", ossia salvare gli schiavi.
Avevo giudicato la trama negativa li, più che altro per come veniva raccontata, con tanti buchi narrativi, scene che sembravano tagliate, e situazioni svolte in maniere inverosimili.

Qua invece è molto Ben raccontata, con un personaggio secondario che ho apprezzato parecchio, e con situazioni che hanno delle consequenze più verosimili (esattamente come doveva essere Assassin's creed Liberation""). Purtroppo c'è da dire che a livello narrativo rimane sempre scarso, e di 3 ore di gioco solo qualche sequenza mi è piaciuta particolarmente
[b]Spingarda[/b]: Una delle poche novità rispetto al gioco di base è quest'arma.
Un fucile a pallettoni dove è possibile uccidere numerosi avversari vicini.
Perchè la metto nei contro? in molte situazioni sarà uno svantaggio visto che ucciderete pure dei passanti (e quindi verrete di sincronizzati fallendo la missione).
[b]Longevità[/b]: Il dlc in questione dura 3 ore.
Per un dlc diciamo che è sulla norma alla fine, avrei preferito magari qualcosina di più di trama (visto che per via delle attività secondarie avremo 1 ora e mezza di trama) ma alla fine è ""ok"".
[h1]CONTRO[/h1]
[b]Attività secondarie[/b]: Esse sono un altra novità del gioco.
Si tratterà semplicemente di liberare gli schiavi in diversi modi tipo uccidere quelli che li vendono all'asta, quelli che li rincorrono, quelli che li puniscono, una vera strage dei uomini bianchi.
Il problema e che dopo neanche un quarto d'ora vi annoierete già subito, e saranno obbligatorie durante il gioco.
[b]Il machete[/b]: Come arma è veramente debole, ma tanto debole, a pugni forse si riesce a fare più danno.

Ci sono molte sezioni di combattimento dove ho provata ad usarla, e dopo 5 colpi di machete vedevo l'avversario ancora vivo. Fortunatamente avremo la nostra lama celata, che infatti farà più danno rispetto a quel machete che ci hanno piazzato.
[b]Ambientazione[/b]: L'ambientazione di Assassin's Creed IV l'ho adorato tantissimo, e quindi pure qua mi è piaciuta ugualmente, solo che è veramente troppo troppo simile al gioco base.
Mi sarei aspettato qualche zona diversa, invece sarà un copia incolla con dimensione ridotta.
[b]Bug Grafici[/b] a non finire come il gioco di base (durante una sezione di nave un mio marinaio si è catapultato nel cielo più veloce del ""Team Rocket"").
[b]Mancanza di un tutorial nelle battaglie navali[/b]: Seppur meno sfruttate ci sono sempre, e in qualche sezione saranno obbligatorio fare delle battaglie navali.
Il gioco è un dlc stand alone, e uno che non ha mai giocato ad Assassin's Creed IV come fà a capire come attaccare, abbordare, e muoversi in nave?
[h1]CONCLUSIONE[/h1]
Il dlc non è malvagio, ma non lo si può considerare neanche tanto bello.
è un riempitivo abbastanza inutile, la trama non è niente di particolare , e le novità introdotte non mi sono piaciute più di tanto.
Se proprio siete curiosi di vedere una trama di schiavismo sul mondo di Assassin's Creed potrei consigliarvelo, ma sinceramente è un dlc che potete pure evitare.
Per me il DLC è abbastanza neutro",1491314268,1491314746,False,18,0,0.674742162227630615,2,False,False,False,False,,,

30823747,"{'steamid': '76561198096645159', 'num_games_owned': 3406, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1440622890}",russian,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry - отличное дополнение, рассказывающее о новой истории капитана корабля ""Эксперто Креде"" , а так же ассасина Адевале.

Начнем с того, что Адевале - это бывший раб, и бывший квартермейстер который плавал вместе на борту с капитаном Эдвардом Кенуэем, а после  стал ассасином и пиратским капитаном, и сражался за освобождение рабов.

Сюжет очень короткий, но более менее захватывающий, есть много отсылок к Черному флагу и Изгою, так же затрагивает и третью часть, между этим есть не слабая связь. Изначально ""Крик свободы"" был дополнением к ""Черному флагу"", а после уже выпущен отдельной игрой, хотя думаю, что отдельной игрой делать было не обязательно. Плюс только в том, что для игры в Крик свободы не требуется копия ""Черного флага"".

Действие разворачивается около берегов острова Гаити, именно около этого острова потерпел кораблекрушение корабль  Эдварда Кенуэя ""Галка"". После чего Адевале стал капитаном корабля ""Эксперто Креде"", и начинает помогать рабам. В принципе на этом всём и основан сюжет, кроме как освобождения рабов, тут больше ничего не будет. Освобождение плантации, абордаж кораблей с рабами и тд.
Именно это однообразие  угнетает и быстро надоедает!

Геймплей немного отличается от того же ""Черного флага"". Улучшенная система боя, новые анимации и механика, больше крови и  новое основное оружие - это мушкетон, довольно-таки отличное оружие  и мачете, которым можно рубить врагов. Магазины убраны из игры, для приобретения нового оружия, Вам нужно освобождать рабов. Локации в игре не большие, но часов 15 провести можно, но не больше.
Так же есть улучшения корабля ""Эксперто Креде"".
Графика такая же как и в ""Черном флаге"", отличная.
Озвучка у Адевале понравилась больше чем в ""Черном флаге"", там была немного ужасная озвучка. Звуковое сопровождение в игре тоже порадовало.
Тем кому понравился ""Черный флаг"" и ""Изгой"" , данная часть будет по душе, ну а истинным фанатам АС тем более рекомендую к прохождению!
8 освобожденный рабов из 10!

Обзор составлен из моего мнения, если с чем то не согласны, то в комментариях пишите адекватно. У каждого свое мнение!",1490833233,1490833233,True,52,2,0.784499883651733398,0,False,False,False,False,,,

29341434,"{'steamid': '76561198035460923', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1484762390}",portuguese,"5/10 O jogo em si nao é mau de todo a historia é boa mas é demaciado curta, temos muito poucas missoas para fazer e as ""secundarias"" que é abrir os baus libertar os escravos tornam-se rapidamente chatas e passado algum tempo sao postas de lado.

Ao comprarem o jogo estejam preparados para uma experiencia fantastica que da continuidade sao assassins creed 4 e com ela vem as frustrações ja que ele muitas vezes nao sobe uma pedra de meio metro ignora alguns comandos fica travado em sertos locais e depois de entrar no jogo mesmo tendo um i7 com a melhor placa tem queda de fps, mas ja se espera isso de um jogo da Ubisoft no pc ja que eles nao sabes fazer portes bons,",1484762782,1484762782,False,2,0,0.523650884628295898,0,True,False,False,False,,,

29282775,"{'steamid': '76561198164747584', 'num_games_owned': 27, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1134, 'last_played': 1484604642}",brazilian,MUITO BOM,1484512631,1484512631,True,1,0,0.458719462156295776,1,True,False,False,False,,,

29281483,"{'steamid': '76561198125118164', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 676, 'last_played': 1591005228}",english,"Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry is short but worth it nonetheless. Take note that it is originally a DLC for AC4 Black Flag.
The game revolves around Adewale, former first mate of the Assassin Edward Kenway. The game is set many years later from the events in Black Flag.
Adewale's story is about the rise of people enslaved for many generations. It basically embodies the very foundation of what the Assassins stand for: Freedom and love for life.
The graphics and mechanics is identical to Black Flag but there are new weapons and tools that are unique to the game.
In conclusion, I give the game 4/5 in my scale. If you love AC then go and play this gem, it will be one good ride.",1484508733,1484508733,True,1,0,0.522471904754638672,0,True,False,False,False,,,

(Perhaps because I came through all the previous games in this series and I needed some time to recover my interest in such game) Hope the ""6 hours"" provides some idea.",1483817671,1483817671,True,4,0,0.571984469890594482,0,True,False,False,False,,,

29067112,"{'steamid': '76561198049777679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 334, 'last_played': 1485363078}",german,"Habe das Spiel jetzt nach nur 5,6 Stunden auf 100% gebracht und es gibt ein paar Dinge die mich an dem Spiel ziemlich nerven.
Gameplay:

Das Gameplay an sich ist 1:1 wie bei AC4, außer das es ein paar neue Gadgets gibt die man nie wirklich braucht, außer wenn das Spiel einen dazu zwingt. Ansonsten ist das Gameplay aber auch solide, jeder dem AC4 gefallen hat kommt hier sofort zurecht und hat auch teilweise seinen Spaß.
Story:
Es gibt eine Story, die ich aber trotz mehrmaligem spielen der Missionen nicht richtig mitgekriegt/ verstanden habe. Im Endeffekt geht es darum Sklaven zu befreien die dann für einen arbeiten.
Content:

Es gibt zwar eine nette Openworld mit mehreren neuen Inseln und einem etwas größerem Dorf, jedoch wird diese einfach nicht genutzt. Im Storyverlauf ist man immer in dem selben Dorf/ Insel und selbst wenn man das Spiel auf 100% spielt muss man nicht auf die anderen Inseln/ Plantagen.

Was ich auch nicht verstehe ist das die so häufig kritisierten Belauschungsmissionen aus AC3 hier wieder reingebracht wurden obwohl diese wirklich keiner mochte. Während es in AC4 von den besagten Missionen wirklich wenige bis gar keine gab, ist hier jede 3. Mission eine Belauschungsmission.
Wen das Spiel interessiert der kann es sich mal im Sale für 5 € geben aber viel mehr würde ich dafür nicht ausgeben.",1483728355,1483728479,False,14,0,0.661380648612976074,1,True,False,False,False,,,

28195973,"{'steamid': '76561198127106857', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1494194673}",english,"I was impressed, with short gameplay time, I was expecting to feel disatisfied at the end. However there were many gameplay and story aspects that made an incredible impact upon me. However it wasn't perfect, the gameplay seemed to have taken some steps backwards on some improvements made in Black Flag. I'll make a simple pros and cons list, as I'm lazy and don't feel like writing a fully fleshed out essay.
Pros.

When passing by a slave interaction, I felt as if I had to help. I felt truly upset seeing the distreatment of slaves. This may have been great game design on Ubisofts part, or simply my morals. None the less, the distreatment of slaves made me truly angry, and I would only attempt to sneak if it risks the lives of the slaves. If my actions do not have consequence, I would go on a rampage, killing anyone in my way until I liberate the slaves.

Adewale has a certain brutality that you simply don't see in any of the other Assassins, you can only assume that it is due to his past. Him freeing himself, through incredibly brutal methods, smashing his ""masters"" skull in with a rock, as seen in the cinematic trailer. Along with his emotional attatchment to his cause, all grant a certain validation to his brutal methods.

The story is incredibly rich, especially for a DLC. The beginning of the climax nearly brought me to tears, as I could see the anger and sadness in Adewale's eyes, [spoiler] as he failed to save every slave. [/spoiler]
Cons.

While rescuing slaves, I asked myself ""Is my rescuing these slaves really helping everyone else? Or is it just pushing me closer to more character upgrades?"" There were no signs of a rebellion at all. In fact, there never was a true rebellion. The closest to a rebellion was [spoiler] Adewale running in solo to kill De Fayet, [/spoiler] which he needed absolutely no help with.

[spoiler] Adewale goes against the Assassin's beliefs of suffering when he kills De Fayet. It is believed in the Assassin's creed, while never explictly stated in the tenants of the creed, death should be quick and without suffering. As Mario Auditore said: ""Enough, Ezio! Show some respect"" and ""You are not Vieri, do not become him"" in Assassin's Creed 2. While this can be understood, given Adewale's emotional connection to this conflict, it left a disgusted taste in my mouth towards Adewale. As it made Adewale seem incredibly sadistic, and made me lose all respect for Adewale. I was hoping to see some form of punishment towards him from the Creed over this, however we know from Assassin's Creed: Rogue that this is not the case as he is seen as an incredibly respected symbol of the Creed. [/spoiler]

The Blunderbus recieved from the Marrons was rarely used. Its short range and single shot makes it practically useless. Better to use the sleep dart and assassinate them from the ground.",1480900389,1480900434,True,9,0,0.627623558044433594,0,False,False,False,False,,,

25338067,"{'steamid': '76561198073566933', 'num_games_owned': 1416, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1489228116}",russian,"[h1]«Назвался груздём – полезай в кузовок» © пословица[/h1]

[b]Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry[/b] – дополнение к игре Assassin's Creed 4:  Black Flag, которое почему-то решили выпустить отдельной игрой, длительностью примерно 5 часов, в эпоху «Золотого века пиратства», позволяющее сыграть за Адевале.

1735-й, Сан-Доминго, ассасин Адевале признаёт, что поклявшись отказаться от пиратства, признаёт, что оно уже несколько раз помогло кредо. Адевале на своём корабле «Эксперто Кредо» нападает на группу тамплиерских кораблей, похищает важную посылку, спасается в буре, теряет управление и падает за борт. Очнувшись на берегу, он находит мачете и спасает рабыню от жестокости надсмотрщика, окончательно решив посвятить свою жизнь освобождению рабов.

У Адевале нет пистолетов и мечей, но доступны сонные и берсерковские дротики, двойные клинки, дымовые шашки и мачете. В лавке маронов пополняется ассортимент, если помочь сбегающему, уничтожить конвой, открыть клетку с рабами, напасть на плантацию или корабль с невольниками. Причём при освобождении плантации возникает ответственность за убитых рабов. Позже появляются мароны-рекруты. Вернулись глашатаи.
Графика не изменилась со времён Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag.
C музыкой же хуже – не запомнилась.  Нас лишили шанти, безымянный квартирмейстер не дублирует приказы и не подбадривает.
Управление удобно на геймпаде, клавомышь не проверял. Управлять кораблём стало в шторм сложнее. Игра сохраняется по чекпоинтам.

Недостатки: есть охота с гарпуном, но нет в ней надобности, ведь больше нечего крафтить. Абордаж нужен для улучшения «Эксперто Кредо», но свой флот уже не сделать. Центральный стол в каюте капитана поставлен неудачно, можно оказаться на нём. Похоже, у «Эксперто Кредо» оснастка больше, чем у «Галки», иначе как объяснить большую нелюбовь к мелководью. Удивительно, но у Адевале точно такое же Орлиное зрение, что и у Эдварда! На 75% прохождения присутствует непроходимый баг, который, как оказывается, пропадает при уменьшении графики до минимума!

Обрубок замечательной игры, решивший прыгнуть выше собственной головы. [b]Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry[/b], не рекомендую.",1472958976,1472959126,False,18,7,0.611031591892242432,0,True,False,False,False,,,

25080073,"{'steamid': '76561198055631052', 'num_games_owned': 1390, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1471898431}",english,"While a short dlc, the gameplay was as solid as Black Flag. As a result of the short story (only 9 missions) the characters we are introduced to have little to no characterisation which is a shame, as they were some rather interesting characters. I also enjoyed the closure of what happened to the Jackdaw and playing through Adewale's eyes, one of the best characters from Black Flag. Longer cutscenes or more missions to flesh out the character would have turned this from a good dlc to an amazing one.",1471898680,1471898680,True,2,0,0.545454561710357666,0,True,False,False,False,,,

25066577,"{'steamid': '76561198100992838', 'num_games_owned': 747, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 991, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 786, 'last_played': 1471839987}",english,"It is a bite-sized Assassin's Creed, so if you have played one of those you know what you are in for. The protagonist is a straight up bad ass, and the game could have been a bit longer, you'll only get 15h out of it at most, so do the math; if it has a good price ratio for 15h of fun for you, go for it.",1471840325,1471840325,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

25040790,"{'steamid': '76561198017970487', 'num_games_owned': 363, 'num_reviews': 186, 'playtime_forever': 460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 456, 'last_played': 1471727475}",brazilian,"**** AMD user's ****

Para quem tem placa AMD os drivers 16.x fazendo com que tanto o Freedom Cry quando Black Flag travem, precisei fazer downgrade do driver para a versão 15.12, só assim consegui jogar. Como estou rodando no Windows 10 precisei fazer uma alterações no services do sistema afim de não atualizar automaticamente nada para que não atualizasse sem meu consentimento o driver de vídeo.

Achei excelente revisitar depois uns meses em que finalizei o Black Flag, este jogo se passa um pouco depois do Assassin's Creed IV e seguimos com Adewale, 1º imediato do Edward Kenway. Seu foco principal é ajudar na libertação dos escravos e nesse ponto temos os franceses adicionados ao jogo, coisas que não havia no Black Flag (somente espanhóis e ingleses), a história do jogo se baseia um pouco no contexto do Haiti, segundo país das Américas a se tornar independente e irônicamente é também o país mais pobre do continente.

Achei bem legal, apesar de curto e não acrescentar nada na história da crença dos assassinos. Como DLC se sustenta perfeitamente, porém por ter uma versão standalone (não precisa do Black Flag instalado), algumas pessoas se confundem e acham que se tratam de um jogo completo como é o caso Assassin's Creed Liberation.

,1471728235,1471728235,True,5,1,0.602446496486663818,0,True,False,False,False,,,

25013053,"{'steamid': '76561198047072411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 943, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 943, 'last_played': 1427894182}",hungarian,"Az Assassins Creed sorozat évente egy újabb taggal bővül, melyek valljuk be, teljesen megegyeznek. Ha én lennék a fejlesztő, új fába vágnám a fejszém, hogy a játékosközönséget elbűvöljem.
Igazából a játékok környezete változik, azonban az irányítás és a karakterek szinte ugyan azok.
A Freedom Cry önmagában játszható játék, de eredetileg a Black Flag kiegészítőjeként látott napvilágot.

Azért tudom ajánlani ezt a programot, mert végre olyan szereplőt alkottak, aki szintén a tipikus főszereplők összes jellemvonását magán hordozza, de legalább az AC sorozatban még nem találkoztunk hozzá hasonlóval.
Másik fontos elem a gyönyörű környezet - a szigetvilág, a hajózás és merülés leginkább.
A legjobb tulajdonsága a játéknak, hogy RÖVID! Emberi léptékű, nem válik olyan unalmassá, mint a frenchise többi tagja!
A sztori kompakt és szerethető!

Nagyon ajánlom mindenkinek, főleg annak, aki szereti a Karibi térséget, de nem akar 600 órát eltölteni egy játék kimaxolásásval!",1471616076,1471616076,True,4,0,0.581749081611633301,0,True,False,False,False,,,

24986508,"{'steamid': '76561198032547885', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1471496626}",koreana,"[장점]
- 마체테와 나팔총을 이용한 박력있는 전투
- '외전'에 어울리는 짤막하지만 무게감 있는 스토리
[단점]
- 현실파트가 아예 없음.
- 평면적인 캐릭터. 아데웰은 그닥 매력적이지 않다.
주변 캐릭터들도 그렇고 적, 주조연의 캐릭터성이 빈약함.
- 뭣보다, 블랙 플래그에 비해 게임이 심하게 단조롭고
노예 해방시키는 작업 말고는 수집요소도 똑같다.
리플레이 할 이유가 없음.
이 이야기는 어쌔신의 이야기가 아니라 아데웰의 노예 해방 얘기다.
글로는 잘 전달이 되지 않겠지만 게임을 해보면 어쌔신크리드 세계관과는
전혀 무관한 이야기에 가깝다는 걸 알수 있다.
그래서 외전이겠지만, 여하튼 추천하지 않음.",1471497099,1471882261,False,0,0,0.490196079015731812,0,True,False,False,False,,,

24975228,"{'steamid': '76561198037875639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1471518541}",german,no good,1471447273,1471447273,False,0,0,0.403521627187728882,0,True,False,False,False,,,

24844480,"{'steamid': '76561198130932508', 'num_games_owned': 1226, 'num_reviews': 724, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1447740146}",russian,"[h1]Крик свободы[/h1]

Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry - одна игр серии Assassin's Creed, по сути являющаяся дополнением к Assassin's Creed Black Flag. Проходится за примено 5 часов, вместо старого доброго Эдварда мы играем за чернокожего раба Адевале, которого освободили ассассины. Ну и конечно, есть новая сюжетная ветка, но обо всем по порядку:
[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
♥ [u]Есть русский язык.[/u]
♥ [u]Игра.[/u] Это игра прежде всего про ассассина, а значит нас ждет много паркура, убийств, воровства и т.д. (вру, всего на 5-6 часов)
♥ [u]Атмосфера.[/u]
♥ [u]Сюжет.[/u]
♥ [u]Геймплей.[/u]
♥ [u]Графика.[/u]
♥ [u]Связь с другими частями.[/u] Всем любителям серии ассассинов я говорю: ""Стоит брать!"". Поиграв во Freedom Cry, вы узнаете некоторые подробности, которые дополнят сюжет Black Flag и Rogue.
♥ [u]Квесты.[/u]
♥ [u]Достижения в Uplay.[/u]
[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
♦ [u]Freedom Cry - одновренно игра и длс.[/u] Существует 2 продукта в Steam Store.
♦ [u]Время прохождения.[/u] Я понимаю, это DLC, но уж очень быстро проходится. Имхо.
[h1]Итог:[/h1]

[i]Фанатам серии точно стоит приобрести, остальным по желанию, или просто приобрести Black Flag Gold Edition. Как полноценную игру серии я ее не считаю, как впрочем и Liberation, а вот в качестве DLC - годно!
С уважением, Aikiro, [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/steamorators]Ораторы Ste@m[/url].[/i]",1471017980,1471018051,True,30,4,0.708465933799743652,0,True,False,False,False,,,

24683855,"{'steamid': '76561198038236094', 'num_games_owned': 1206, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 1146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 989, 'last_played': 1590315395}",spanish,"[i]El mejor Assassin's Creed ""low cost"" (si es que son pacientes y esperan a las ofertas de Steam) que plasma las características de la franquicia de Ubisoft en un DLC que va bastante bien como juego standalone.[/i]",1470201854,1470201854,True,1,0,0.514285683631896973,0,False,False,False,False,,,

24613290,"{'steamid': '76561198054049425', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 621, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 621, 'last_played': 1468696959}",russian,"[h1]Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry[/h1]
Крупное сюжетное DLC для Assassin's Creed IV, изданное в standalone-версии. Так оно продавалось чуть дешевле, потому и взял. Традиционно раскидаю запчасти этой игры по плюсам и минусам.
Плюсы:
[list]
[*]Продолжительность. Да, перед нами дополнение, которое длится не 1-3 часа, а добрых 10 часов. Очень солидно для современных DLC-реалий.

[*]Новая геймплейная механика. Теперь над надобно освобождать рабов и вербовать рекрутов. Есть примерно десяток новых ивентов. За освобождение определённого числа рабов дают новые награды, что добавляет азарта бороться за свободу.
[*]Новое снаряжение. [strike]Дробовик[/strike] Мушкетон и отвлекающие петарды. Парные мечи заменили на мачете, которому нарисовали солидное количество новых анимаций.
[/list]
Минусы:
[list]
[*]Движок и его баги не поправлены ни на йоту.
[*]Скучный и невыразительный сюжет, наполненный скучными и невыразительными персонажами.
[*]Сломанная в хлам экономика. Деньги здесь попросту не нужны. За 5 часов игры я скопил под 50 тысяч местной валюты, куда их тратить — вообще непонятно.

[*]Для фанатов серии не будет никаких вкусных историй об основной фабуле сюжета. Это игра не про ""Абстерго"", не про темпларов и ассасинов, не про Ису и их майнд-контрольные гаджеты. Это просто краткая история про одинокого преданного ассасина.
[/list]

Вывод: совершенно внезапно оказалось, что Ubisoft могут сделать вполне неплохое DLC. Не лишённое косяков оригинала, но имеющее за собой приличное количество нового контента, что для DLC является первоочередным плюсом и оценивается в первую очередь.
[table]
[tr]
[th]Итог:[/th]
[td]7[/td]
[th]/[/th]
[/tr]
[/table]
Почему так много? Потому что это DLC, его standalonность этого не отменяет.

Что касается рекомендации? Всё сильно зависит от того, как вы относитесь к серии с точки зрения художественной ценности, а как с точки зрения геймплея. А также от того, понравилась вам Black Flag или нет. Я поставлю палец вверх, но решать уже вам, основываясь на ваших предпочтениях.",1469879283,1469879693,True,4,1,0.563492059707641602,0,True,False,False,False,,,

24588658,"{'steamid': '76561198039394097', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 146, 'playtime_forever': 1348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1085, 'last_played': 1554448289}",english,"Of all of the AC games I have played, I do truly applaud this one for breaking the norm for the assassin's gameplay. Shotgun, bigass machete, those are my kinda choices, much moreso than the 10,000th cute little sword I have had forced upon me.

The gameplay is the same as it ever was, but the changes to combat are fun. Maybe not game changing, but fun. Instead of being able to snipe a few baddies with pistols, you can blow the entire squad away with a single blunderbuss blast, and that is satisfying as all heck. However beyond that, the game is just another assassins creed, with the additional ship fun from black flag of course, but otherwise the same.

The story is... unfortunate. Another story with great potential whitewashed by the Extremo-PC team behind these games. The ""Maroons"" that this game depicts purely as these incredibly brave slaves who just wanna be free and live in peace, are nothing like the real life ones, known for literally catching and selling back escapes slaves (1740, Jamaican Maroon Treaty) Or the fact they often used black slaves themselves, in addition to the fact that escaped black slaves could be put to death for not joining the maroons. Forcing the enemy faction to be wholly evil and the allied one to be obviously good, discarding reality for fantasy, makes a game that should be serious and exciting into an idealistic children's novel.

Every ten yards there is a random event with white guy chasing down an escaping slave, going to blast him if ya dont intervene. Yanno, cuz everyone was blasting their expensive slaves on a regular basis. Not like they had slave hunters to bring them back or something like that.

The constant refusal to portray real events and peoples as they happened and as they were is why these stories always seem to be fairytale-esque. Because the enemy is bad and you are wholly good, no character development happens, we learn almost nothing new about Adewale, and the story can be summed up as ""Adewale ended up on an island, then escaped"" without leaving out anything important. The story tries REALLY hard to be meaningful but falls flat. A good breakoff story will have you going ""ah, thats why he did so and so in the other game"" this adds nothing to the main tale and reveals NOTHING about Adewale. A shame too, he is easily one of the characters in the series with the most unused potential.

For the terrible story, I do not think anyone would complain about having more black flag to play. The games combat modifications and the cool side quests about raiding plantations make it fun and a little fresh, with islands to explore and ship battles to enjoy, if you can look past the boring story, it is quite nice.

Also, for god's sake, stop claiming terrible stories are meaningful or special or deep because they MENTION slavery. There is a ton of emotional power, heroic moments, and deep tales to be found in this time period, no doubt, but this game doesn't come close to that, it has about as much deepness as an episode of ""Impotent Rage""

P.S: I love how, because the crew of his ships are always all black, when Adewale captures enemy crews, you see them embracing and they get brought on, only to vanish and be replaced with black sailors. That is some badass voodoo right there.",1469763048,1554430425,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

24489011,"{'steamid': '76561197970519156', 'num_games_owned': 870, 'num_reviews': 186, 'playtime_forever': 406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1469316275}",english,"One of the shortest AC games, but also one of the most powerful. Here, the AC series slips off the veil and goes full-on statement mode. Ade fights against the oppresion of slavery in Port au Prince, Facing the issue head on, if a bit violently. The story is about as long as one chapter of a typical AC game, but you'll murder about four times as many people in that time. Lots and lots of slave-holder's employees need to die here.

Usually I play AC games with a kind of cool detachment, kiling only when needed, and otherwise sticking to the mission and getting shit done. A few times in Freedom Cry, I found myself going out of my way to take out some of these jerks who were particularly nasty to the slaves, and I found myself feeling Ade's anger along with it.

If you were a little miffed that Black Flag basically ignored all the slavery going on around Edward, this one will take a step or two to remedy that.",1469316689,1469316689,True,2,0,0.530726253986358643,0,True,False,False,False,,,

24157251,"{'steamid': '76561198009913908', 'num_games_owned': 279, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1429452757}",english,"Nice continuation of AC IV with a little bit of the same as the base game offers. I would recommend it playing right after Black Flag.",1467898459,1467898459,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

24126419,"{'steamid': '76561198059517386', 'num_games_owned': 730, 'num_reviews': 256, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 264, 'last_played': 1428777986}",russian,"Помнится хорошо, что раньше это было DLC к Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag. Но её становление StandAlone Game я пропустил мимо себя. Благо я её приобрёл как и Assassin's Creed Liberation по скидке и прошёл быстрее, чем AC Liberation. Пора бы высказаться о ней.

Графика. Такая же яркая и насыщенная, как в Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag. Возникает желание отправиться куда-нибудь отдыхать в тёплые страны. Мир красивый и в какой-то степени живой. Персонажи классно изображены.
Озвучка. Как и в 4 части, здесь отличная русская озвучка. Музыка вполне себе хорошая. Не думаю, что Брайан Тайлер писал к дополнению музыку.
Сюжет. Действия разворачиваются после событий Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag. Интересный, но достаточно короткий. Играем за бывшего квартермейстера Эдварда Кеннуэя, Адевале.
Геймплей. Механика такая же, как и в Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag. Паркур, небольшие побочки, плавание на корабле - всё, что делает настоящий пират.

Хорошее дополнение, которое стоит взять по скидке, и которое сможет скрасить пару вечеров. Кому сильно понравилась 4 часть, рекомендую:)",1467781282,1490869646,True,59,3,0.81303107738494873,1,True,False,False,False,,,

23973422,"{'steamid': '76561198095929521', 'num_games_owned': 610, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 491, 'last_played': 1516118125}",english,"I think Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry is one of the best standalone DLC ever made recently. The story is quite short but the replayability is very good, at least of a stealth game. There is not a vast variety of activities in the game, but every one of them can be replayed.  The best one is Plantation Liberation, takes place around the huge map. There are only a few of them, so you end up liberating the same place over and over again. But, at least there are some activities for you to do in a stealth-able game. Buying this when on sale is a good idea and messing around in the game is quite entertaining.",1467342946,1467342946,True,1,0,0.490445852279663086,0,False,False,False,False,,,

23860263,"{'steamid': '76561198061514868', 'num_games_owned': 1598, 'num_reviews': 244, 'playtime_forever': 1113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 644, 'last_played': 1508683852}",russian,"[B]КУПИЛ ПИСТОЛЬ У МЕСТНОГО БAРЫГИ
ЗАEБИСЬ СТРЕЛЯЕТ, ПОРАЖАЕТ ЛЮБОГО С ДЕСЯТИ ШАГОВ""
ПОРОХ ОТСЫРЕЛ, ЗАМОК НЕ РАБОТАЕТ, СПУСКОВОЙ КРЮЧОК ЗАЕЛО, МУШКА НЕ СПИЛЕНА
ШОМПОЛ ЛОМАЕТСЯ ОБ ГРЯЗЬ[/B]
[b]Грабим и убиваем на сей раз не просто так.[/b]

Главный герой DLC к Assassin's Creed IV, впоследствии ставшего самостоятельной игрой, - ассасин Адевале. Человек с жестким нравом и ясной и точной целью. Будучи сам беглым рабом, он не уехал в США, чтобы стать сутенером. Напротив, Адевале прикладывает все усилия, чтобы положить конец несправедливости в отношении темнокожих в колониальной Америке времен начала 18 века. Освобождая рабов с плантаций, где сам некогда 'работал' и захватывая рабовладельческие суда, он неумолимо движется к намеченной цели.

В плане геймплея это все тот же Assassin's Creed IV с морскими баталиями, опциональным стелсом и карибскими островами. Стоит упомянуть небольшие косметические изменения: на замену парным мечам Эдварда пришло здоровенное хардкорное мачете, резать которым можно не только тростник. А так же выражающий одним своим видом всю боль и ненависть к этому несправедливому миру мушкетон. Новые анимации и игровые локации для освоения прилагаются. Время от времени, путешествуя на личном корабле Адевале - Эксперто Креде, можно услышать от матросов рабские песни о том, как жить тяжело, что вносит свою толику атмосферности в игру.

Сюжетная ветка расскажет весьма короткую и не слишком интересную историю заговора против все тех же ненавистных главному герою белых господ. Как довесок хорошей идее воспринимается неплохо, а так же хорошо дополняет сюжет Assassin's Creed IV.

К сожалению, DLC не дотягивает до полноценной игры, даже если его продают по соответствующей цене и надолго вы здесь не задержитесь, ибо контента в Freedom Cry совсем мало: десяток островов, тройка плантаций и парочка мест для охоты на крупную рыбку. Кастомизация персонажа и его судна также не в пример оригиналу: пара разных парусов, 4 вида мачете и остального понемногу.
Все это полностью открывается и осваивается часов за 5, хотя я провел здесь все 10.

В заключении скажу, что на моей памяти это единственная игра (из серии Assassin's Creed уж точно), где я отчетливо понимал, что убиваю ради внятной и действительно весомой цели, а не просто потому, что так кому-то захотелось.",1467031130,1467031130,True,22,7,0.682682514190673828,0,True,False,False,False,,,

23792300,"{'steamid': '76561198267802645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1467651310}",french,"c de la merde il marche meme pas

23718109,{'steamid': '76561198050851038', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 984, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 984, 'last_played': 1464398612}",english,"[h1]Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry[/h1]

Freedom Cry is a very good reason to return to the Black Flag world (if you needed one) to learn more about the Jackdaw's ex-quartermaster, Adéwalé, 15 years later—with a more serious contextual approach and interesting new gameplay elements.
[b]Pros:[/b]
[list]
[*]Adéwalé is a very convincing protagonist and a badass Assassin;
[*]Great story with an increased focus on the theme of slavery;
[*]Knowing that lives are at stake adds a sense of tension to plantation missions;
[*]Interesting reward-based system for acquiring additional gear;
[*]Locking main quests pending side quest progression is a good way to contextualise the latter;
[*]Lifeboats on each remote island make exploration easier;
[*]Good soundtrack.
[/list]
[b]Neutral:[/b]
[list]
[*]No present day storyline.
[/list]
[b]Cons:[/b]
[list]
[*]Over too soon;
[*]Random liberation events' red zones can get in the way of main missions.

23554891,"{'steamid': '76561198030844709', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1034, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1034, 'last_played': 1465965636}",english,"[u]Overall:[/u]
Freedom Cry is a great DLC and I recommend it to those who both enjoy Black Flag and appreciate Adewale. If all you care about is Edward, then maybe stay away from this.
[u]What I liked:[/u]

+ Adewale is a fantastic character to play as. He also seems to be perhaps the most sensible Assassin that you get to play as, having a better understanding of the Creed and how decisions should reflect it...although maybe it's just more noticeable because he's contrasted with Edward, who doesn't really get it for a very long time.

+ I actually enjoyed being ""limited"" to the blunderbuss and machete as main weapons. The machete fits perfectly with Ade anyway, but the blunderbuss was a nice touch, even though I preferred the version that was better at range than spread.

+ I am very glad that you are able to simply sail around to take down ships and raid plantations as in the main game, so even if the story doesn't appeal to you, you can still have an enjoyable time wreaking havoc, freeing slaves, and upgrading the Experto Crede.
[u]What I disliked:[/u]
- The relative shortness of this DLC (which is understandable, so I don't count it as a negative).

- Aside from finishing the storyline fairly quickly, the liberation goals seemed to be set very low. I finished those before the story was over, so now that I've finished the story, there's not much to keep me playing, aside from trying to get 100% synchronization (which isn't too difficult when you don't have to complete all of the constraints in one playthrough).

- The fact that several of Ade's objectives, albeit optional, were geared toward being stealthy and/or non-violent, which I don't really feel suits his character. Especially in the setting, as a rather heavily-geared black man should stand out a lot more than someone like Edward would. While that can be used as justification for having Ade have more of a stealth emphasis, I would have liked for the game to have him just embrace that issue and put himself out there, daring people to challenge him.
- No sea shanties. At all. Disappointing.",1465923246,1465923331,True,18,3,0.72932887077331543,0,True,False,False,False,,,

22434303,"{'steamid': '76561197981294625', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1460746009}",english,"I played Freedom Cry about 2 years after finishing the main game, Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag.
It is an excellent DLC for what I think is one the best installment of all Assassin's Creed Series.
Just the fact that you get to sail again is great (although, sadly, there are no sea shanties).
But there is also a lenghty campaign story and lots of sidequests to keep you interested for about 10-12h, or less if you do not care for 100% completion.
I recommend this game if you have already played Black Flag.
If not, please play the main game first as it is definitely worth it, even if you do not like Assassin's Creed.
Yes, it is that good.",1460746243,1472814175,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

21063459,"{'steamid': '76561198087344509', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1442680854}",german,"Very nice, if u liked black flag, you got to play this as well!",1454971729,1454971729,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

21051268,"{'steamid': '76561198117650571', 'num_games_owned': 955, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 619, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 619, 'last_played': 1445018430}",russian,"[h1]Что же представлят Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry?[/h1] [i]Небольшое доплнение к Assassin's Creed Black Flag, графика такая же, добавился сюжет и всё, и да у нас будет свой корабль. Не знаю, когда разработчики переделали из доплнения в игру, то цена без скидки была большой, да и со скидкой стоит не мало. Обзоров на эту часть я посмотрел и увидел, что мало, в эту часть не все играли и не хотят..

В этой части мы будем играть за бывшего раба - Адевале, его главная цель освобождать рабов от плантаций, и т.д. В Assassin's Creed Black Flag, если кто проходил сюжетную линию, то знаете, что Адевале помощник на борту у Эдварда Кенуэя. Есть четыре вида освобождения рабов. Сюжет тут простой Адевале хочет добиться свободы для коллонии. Сюжет скучен и не интересен, никаких неожиданных поворотов, ничего нету такого... Озвучка Адевале понравилось больше чем в у Эдварда Кенуэя, как по мне так классный голос. Магазин убрали из игры, теперь чтобы получить оружие нужно освобождать рабов.
Есть интересные достижения в Uplay, они разные, то освободить 500 рабов, освободить 1 раба, и много-много интересненького, сам я выполнил не все.

Игра проходится быстро, советую провести в ней ну максимум часов 15, т.к делать в ней больше нечего, я открыл все сундуки, даже смотрел видео, где человек показывал пасхалки в этой игре и я сам находил места и бывал там.[/i]

20941035,"{'steamid': '76561198002390546', 'num_games_owned': 1083, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 848, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 848, 'last_played': 1413090969}",english,"You play as one of the more notable crewmembers of Edward Kenway's ship, the Jackdaw, famous from the game Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag. Adewale is a black former slave from the old English-French-American triangle-trades where the blacks were used as slave to pick cotton, and different plants for plantage owners. Your main goal in this game is to free other (black) slaves.

Like 70% of the gameplay is to free slaves, and a bit is the old piracy from AC:IV where you steer another pirate ship just like in AC:IV but with Adewale as the captain onboard. It's some real fun if you didn't have enough of AC:IV. And myself, I miss AC:IV after finishing it because I feel that something more besides the campaign mode would be much appreciated. Like all non-standalone AC's, there's a bad multiplayer mode and I feel that this game fill up my needs for the piracy-part sequel I've always wanted.. And yes I know there's lots of piracy-ship games for onlineplay, but nothing with the graphics of the amazing AnvilNext gameengine. I do recommend this game if you're a fan of Assassin's Creed but likes the piracy-ship part of AC:IV more than the newer games like I for example.",1454541762,1454541762,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

20718590,"{'steamid': '76561198061702251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1440383988}",english,"Freedom Cry tells the story of Edward's crewmaster (is that the word?), Adewale. I really liked Assasin's Creed Black Flag so I bought Freedom Cry when it's on sale.

20671349,"{'steamid': '76561198262117367', 'num_games_owned': 431, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1466210941}",schinese,不错的刺客外传，流程比较短， 四处能看见爷爷的身影 BGM依旧优秀 就是有一个问题， 育婊咱能不能出完繁体汉化然后设置一次就可以， 每天换语言真的好烦。,1453428907,1453428907,True,5,1,0.582580387592315674,1,True,False,False,False,,,

20627986,"{'steamid': '76561198118718008', 'num_games_owned': 1558, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1451514777}",english,"After playing Assassin’s Creed IV Black Flag, I was excited to play Freedom Cry and to have a story dedicated to Adewale. Unfortunately, I found the story uninteresting and sometimes confusing. For example, Bastienne, the owner of the local brothel, will like Adewale at the beginning of one scene, then seem to hate him at the end for something he said, and then seem like she's in love with him the next time they meet without explanation or justification.

Then, there are the missions. Most of the missions are about as good as a middle of the road mission from Black Flag. The worst missions, however, are either boring or frustratingly difficult because of annoying placement of enemies or weird technicalities (Why do I have to swap a ship manifest WHILE two enemies are looking at it? Why can't I swap it while it's sitting unguarded? You know, as logic would dictate?)
If you enjoyed Black Flag, and you're wondering if you should play this game, just pass. You won't be missing anything.",1453228316,1453228316,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

20620593,"{'steamid': '76561198108538894', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1453194746}",russian,"Игра просто обдираловка, трейлером нас кормят, давая надежду хоть на какую то промежуточную часть серии игр Assassin`s Creed. На деле же мы имеем в точности тот же DLC Freedom Cry для Assassin`s Creed Blag Flag. Хотя нет, есать одно большое отличие. Цена на игру стала больше, а багов и лагов не убавилось, даже наоборот. Проходя DLC уже складовалось впечатление, что Ubisoft обленились, но выпускать то же самое DLC как самостоятельный продукт - это уже перебор",1453194971,1453194971,False,6,0,0.477178305387496948,0,False,False,False,False,,,

20410275,"{'steamid': '76561198027474775', 'num_games_owned': 769, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1452297675}",english,"Assassin’s Creed Freedom Cry is a standalone game that follows the same pattern as its predecessor did, Black Flag, but this time the main protagonist was a secondary character on the previous title, Adéwalé, being an assassin and many years after the ending of Black Flag, we found ourselves stranded on Port-au-Prince, with no ship and no crew, we must struggle to find our way out of there, though now his motivations are focused on the liberation of slaves that suffer greatly in the new world.
[h1]Story[/h1]

1735 is the year and Adéwalé is now an Assassin, embracing the creed’s beliefs and struggle, he finds himself stranded in Port-au-Prince. But after many years of piracy he decides now is time to put the Creed’s name to a good use and begin a new fight and the liberation of slaves, helping the resistance called The Maroons for independence and dignity, Adéwalé and his skills turn out to be of great help to the resistance. Before leaving, he helps building a new hope for the slaves.
[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

The game mechanics don’t change that much compared to Black Flag, though some new load-out for a new assassin is required as per usual, for Adéwalé we have now some powerful weapons like the blunderbuss and machete, while the blunderbuss is a one-shot gun, its power doesn’t have match, it is a slow weapon but once you have multiple enemies facing you, one blow will kill most of them, if not all, making it a death fest every time you pull the trigger.

On the other hand, the machete is kind of new to us, we have mostly used swords before, but Adéwalé with machete in hand makes him, perhaps the most brutal and relentless fighter of all assassins in my opinion, he is just a beast and the killing animations are proof of it, a good tool for a great and skilled killer.

Many other things remain the same, there are not many differences, smoke bombs, the rope dart and the poison and sleep darts are kept, a small addition were the firecrackers that will help you with guards at some point in the story, besides that, the game remains almost the same.
Naval combat is the same as well, and the map is very limited, but makes sense, this game is not that long and the exploration is restricted to some few islands and locations.

The interesting part of this game is and will always be slavery, our struggle is focused on the liberation of slaves, there are plantations in different parts of the map which can be raided and liberated, this will help you unlock new items and missions and also bring new people to the resistance, also during naval combat you will encounter enemy ships carrying many ore slaves, this ships cannot be attacked but they will always have protection. In the main city, small groups of slaves can be liberated as well, either from punishment, caging or auctions.
[h1]Graphics[/h1]
There are not many things to say on this point, it looks the same as Black Flag, equally beautiful, so if you want to know more, read my Black Flag review.
[h1]Sound and music[/h1]

The sound remains identical to Black Flag as well, voices are full of passion and the accents are great. On the music side, we have some new sounds and tunes that are related to the culture, some sort of African like melodies with chants in French, this makes the atmosphere of the game and the slavery theme. Awesome.
[h1]The bad[/h1]

While ACFC remains bug free and found no issues in-game, I really believe that some few things could have been different to my taste. For example, after liberating plantations, a good idea would have been to destroy at some point certain plantations, setting them on fire or destroying the crops, making them a waste of time to rebuild, this came to my mind after seeing how many times x plantation had a new owner after a few minutes, making it an endless loop of liberation, makes sense, yes, slaves were a profitable business back then and at some point someone will bring more and more, but stopping them once and for all would have been more satisfying in the end.
[h1]Final words[/h1]

ACFC is a good game on its own, it doesn’t have the same spectrum as previous titles and the character is not developed in depth, but that is not a problem when it comes to action and the brutal way we kill enemies. There are some scenes that truly show how slavery was back in that time, it was terrible and at some point you can see how the life of the slaves was regarded as disposable by the masters and the empires. There are heartbreaking moments to say the least.

All in all, it was an enjoyable game, with more pros than cons, new tools and weapons and a very satisfying gameplay, Adéwalé is a killing machine!",1452303127,1462692875,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

20378201,"{'steamid': '76561198059046091', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 398, 'last_played': 1452181402}",german,Da ich n richtiger AC fan bin hab ich mir das Spiel hier als Stand alone gekauft und ich muss sagen es ist echt gut :) zwar ein bisschen kurz aber es macht echt Spaß das Spiel zu zocken die Story ist natürlich mal wieder genial *-*,1452186133,1452186133,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

20218431,"{'steamid': '76561198068636368', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1447012841}",french,"Pour moi le plus mauvais de la serie. a la base c est un addon d accord, mais vraiment a oublier.",1451745531,1451745531,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

20184565,"{'steamid': '76561198087016192', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1056, 'last_played': 1583819755}",english,"After playing through BF and FC there are very few changes. Yes its DLC, but it's a standalone game. Now plaing through this it reminded me of playing through Knife of Dunwall. Playing through a character that didn't get very much backstory and wondering what they did before or after when you met them is always a mystery. Until there's DLC. Anyway Ubisoft did pretty much the same thing the Bethesda did with Knife of Dunwall. They changed a few things, shortened it and made it really good. Now this is over priced and i think $7 would have been a better amount for it, but it is openworld and somethings are renewed and others are the same. The new things include being an assassin, liberating slaves, new main weapons, i,e blunderbuss and machete, new ways to get main weapons and pouches, plantations and slave ships, good story. The things that are renewed are upgrading the ship, though it is shortened, same stealth concept and diving places,and harpooning, again DLC. Anyway a new thing i like is finding new weapons and pouches. It was very nice that they incouraged exploration around the tiny map, and i wish there were more things to find. I also wish you could change your outfit, but i think they thought it wasn't worth the effort. One thing they could have done differently is animating the end ship  decision, it's the same thing but different. All in all it's a really good short game. 7/10",1451666482,1451666482,True,0,0,0.476190477609634399,0,True,False,False,False,,,

20166288,"{'steamid': '76561198074112685', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3033, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 680, 'last_played': 1703701469}",french,"Assassin's creed très court mais aussi très bien ! Une histoire bien pensé, un nouveau personnage, des nouvelles armes, de nouvelles quêtes secondaires et plus encore ! Mais le gros point noir est le manque de temps de jeu... Vraiment trop court... Mais on pardonne à Ubisoft car ce n'est, à la base qu'un DLC de Black Flag qui est devenu un jeu à part entière.

( Et aussi détails un peu trop de copier coller de Black Flag, une île en particulier qui est identique... Mais comme je l'ai dit ce n'est qu'un DLC et il reste sans doute le meilleur qui est été fait ! )",1451613440,1451613440,True,2,1,0.54356849193572998,0,True,False,False,False,,,

20112631,"{'steamid': '76561198251479080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 876, 'last_played': 1453927629}",brazilian,gosto de todas as historias dos  jogos,1451478912,1451478912,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

20051154,"{'steamid': '76561198200980770', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1447882565}",brazilian,"Freedom Cry é bom por se utilizar do tema da escravidão, algo que ainda tinha ficado em segundo plano na franquia. Dava pra ver nos outros jogos o tema escravo, mas não aprofundado como aqui. A missão onde se deve derrubar o negreiro e praticamente metade da tripulação morre, enquanto você tenta salvar o resto das correntes, é espetacular. Não a cena terrivel em sí, mas a adrenalina que te da tentando não só vencer a missão mas em ajudar. É o primeiro personagem masculino negro na franquia(considero connor mestiço) e isso já é um grande avanço. Como lado negativo, o jogo é curto demais, e isso pesa já que a franquia se preocupa em lançar um jogo por ano, ao invez de lançar um impactante bem trabalhado e mais longo.",1451348065,1451348065,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

19978114,"{'steamid': '76561198024922437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1451133679}",english,"I only can recommend this short add-on to AC4 if you really want to do just a couple more things in the pirate world.
Good news is you start the game off, or get very quickly, almost everything that took you the entire AC4 to get.  So you get to have fun with the tools and weapons you got accustmed to in AC4.
Any chance to use more Berseker Darts is ok in my book!!!!
The downside is there is almost no story to keep you motivated.  I actually finished the game and still had some of the tiny map undiscovered, but didn't care enough to play anymore.

In summary, if you want to play a little more AC4 gameplay, and can get this for cheap, then give it a shot. Just keep your expectations low and you will not be dissapointed.",1451172243,1451172243,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

19960965,"{'steamid': '76561198077685130', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 576, 'last_played': 1451132675}",brazilian,"A.C. Freedom Cry, trata de um jogo focado na escravidão.

19858007,"{'steamid': '76561198068677845', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1149, 'last_played': 1453927472}",french,"Ce que j'ai aimé :
- Le personnage d'Adéwalé trés charismatique.
- Pouvoir rendre justice aux esclaves noirs est tellement plaisant.
- L'histoire, tout en apprenant certaines choses a propos de l'esclage au 17eme siecle notamment le code noir et la révolte des ""marrons"".
- Un jeu pas trop long. Ca m'interesse pas de passer 50 heures sur un jeu pour refaire tout le temps les mêmes choses ce que je reproche aux autres assassin creed.
-la pêche des gros poissons.
Ce que je n'ai pas aimé :
-Je ne suis pas fan des combats navals qui ne sont pas tres facile a prendre en main.
-ce que j'aime pas dans les assassin creed c'est que le hero escalade tout ce qui depasse les 10 cm ca devient tres enervant par moment surtout quand on doit poursuivre quelqu'un rapidement.

Je recommande vraiment ce jeu pour son ambiance et sa simplicité (les choses simples sont souvent les meilleures pas besoins de fioritures inutiles). J'ai pris du plaisir a y jouer et a le finir a 100%.",1450833887,1450833887,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

19626785,"{'steamid': '76561198144037701', 'num_games_owned': 1487, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1449816722}",koreana,"어크 블랙 플래그에서 잭도우 호의 갑판장이었던 흑형노예 출신 아데웰의 이야기를 다룬 DLC 게임입니다만, 스탠드얼론으로 따로 나오기도 했습니다.
골드 에디션을 사거나 시즌패스를 사면 블랙 플래그의 DLC로 즐길 수 있는 게임이지만, 저는 블랙 플래그는 디럭스판이었기도 하고 라간지를 위해 스탠드얼론으로 구매를 했습니다.
갑판장에서 해결사 호의 선장으로 급상승한 아데웰이 켄웨이랑 작별한 이후에 암살단으로 활동하면서 흑인노예들을 해방시키는 이야기입니다.
흑형답게 피지컬이 어마어마해서 전투가 시원시원하게 펼쳐집니다. 마체테 들고 신나게 썰어버리면 됩니다. 총도 에드워드처럼 시시하게 권총을 쓰는 게 아니라 나팔총이라는 어마어마한 샷건을 쓰기 때문에 한방 제대로 맞추면 네다섯 명 골로 가는 건 순식간이지요.
해상전은 블랙 플래그와 별로 다를 점이 없습니다. 그래서 오히려 해상전을 할 땐 이제 질리더군요. 블랙 플래그를 할 때 약탈을 하도 많이 했더니만 프리덤 크라이를 할 때쯤 되니 귀찮습니다.
프리덤 크라이에서 재밌던 점은 노예 해방을 위해 여러 가지 부가 미션이 있다는 점입니다. 이렇게 해방 노예들을 모아서 선원 충당도 가능하고 무기 업그레이드라든가 주머니 업그레이드 같은 것들이 가능합니다. 사냥을 할 필요가 없단 거죠.
뭐 이런 걸 빼면 딱히 특이한 점은 없는 그냥저냥 재밌는 게임이었습니다.
아무리 DLC 게임이라지만 이렇게 스탠드얼론으로 낼 거면 어느 정도 플레이 타임 좀 있었으면 좋았을 텐데... 보시다시피 네다섯 시간이면 끝납니다. 마치 앨런 웨이크의 아메리칸 나이트메어 같은 수준이죠.",1449820313,1449820313,True,32,9,0.736473143100738525,1,True,False,False,False,,,

19605208,"{'steamid': '76561198041938685', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1460945022}",spanish,"No está mal,el tutorial bajo el agua es puto cáncer pero es un buen juego

19553208,"{'steamid': '76561197990835108', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1449517763}",english,"Long story short, it's a shame this DLC wasn't expanded into a full-on game. The protagonist is an excellent character with plenty of historical motivation and a stellar voice performance to match. If you enjoyed AC Black Flag then definitely check this one out!
Cons:

-boring on-foot boilerplate missions (spy on this, tail that, stay within range of this while avoiding a swarm of annoying that, blah blah blah...you know the drill by now if you've played every other game in the franchise)
Pros:
-excellent story and characters
-one emotional objective in a mission involves saving slaves from a sinking ship that ought to remind you just what an amazing species we truly are. That story point alone is worth the entire DLC
-gorgeous music; probably better than the base game
-a rare topic like that for a game. Ubi ought to run with it and give Adewale his full game!",1449518310,1449518310,True,15,3,0.639677703380584717,1,True,False,False,False,,,

19521707,"{'steamid': '76561198202034909', 'num_games_owned': 42, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1450456696}",koreana,"스토리는 괜찮고 플레이하면서 굉장히 재밌던 DLC다
하지만 이 DLC를 사는데 15달러를 썼어도
플레이를 하다보면 DLC다 보니 역시 스토리가 짧고 아쉬움이 남는건 당연하다
하지만 만약 스토리를 다 끝낸후에도 할것들이 많이 남아있었다면 얘기가 달라지겠지만
본인이 생각하기에 이 게임은 아니다
플레이후에는 상점에서 살것도 딱히 없고 할것이  있다면
마을에서 이벤트로 펼쳐지는 노예 시장을 습격하는것이랑
또 노예션을 공격해서 흑인 노예들을 탈취해 오는것인데
이것들을 해서 해방시켜준 노예의 수는 처음에는 무기와 보조 아이템을 업그레이드 하는데 필요한 과제로 나타나는데
이것마저 끝내버리면 스토리를 다 깬후에도 할것이 별로 없다
왜냐? 목표가 없기때문이다
필자가 하고싶은말은 이 게임은 단지 DLC일뿐이지 본편만큼에
컨텐츠로 가득찼다고 생각하고 사면 오산이다
이 게임을 사고 싶은사람들에게는
할인을 할때 사는것을 권한다
이 DLC는 15달러의 가치를 갖고있다고 생각하지 않기 때문이다

19436915,"{'steamid': '76561198260066707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 378, 'last_played': 1490875628}",english,Im a big fan of assasins creed this is a very short game more of a expantion pack than anything else but if like me you just finished black flag and just want some more sailing in a ship its great you dont play the same person as in black flag this one you play an x slave going around freeing more slaves i finished this game really quickly i wouldnt pay a lot for it but i enjoyed it all the same,1449063847,1449063962,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

19413820,"{'steamid': '76561198180476627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1526, 'last_played': 1447603209}",english,"This review is for those who actually have played Assassins Creed Black Flag. If you do not have it I suggest you buy it at a sale because the main game will be cheaper than the dlc since the price is only slightly higher but the overall content is more aswell.

I own Assassins Creed on XBox 360 and the game simply is breathtaking with the easy to learn gameplay, the open world features and the good and atmospheric music. The story however was a little short and Freedom Cry as a dlc is of course even shorter. Most players suggest an average gametime of only 4-6 hours. However it took me about 20 Hours to discover all the places unlock everything and tried the minigames like fishing. (They are the same as in Black Flag though)

Adewale has his own combat style and uses a machete. Like Kennway he can use firearms, ropedarts, poisoned darts etc. The overall gameplay is the same as in Black Flag but the story is set 20 years later. (I wont say much about it since i dont want to spoiler and it depends on your taste if you will enjoy it or not).
The map is not very big, i am guessing less than 25% of Black Flags overall map but the locations have their own appearance and are detailed.
I did not encounter any notable bugs but I was a bit dissappointed that Adewales ship is a repainted Jackdaw.
The ship however cannot be upgraded as much as the Jackdaw.

A new element in the game is as already mentioned Adewales own combat style and the ability to free slaves either by boarding slave ships or by killing the overseers at the plantations. Some of the overseers have become very hostile and will attack you instantly. If you are spotted on the plantations, the overseers are going to kill your maroonfellows so you should really take care.
The plantations sooner or later always get new owners so you can replay this part. The game also can be continued after the story has come to an end just like in Black Flag.

If you enjoyed Black Flag and want some more story related content or discover some more West Indies locations I really recommend this but dont expect a lot of new content. Also keep an eye out for a decent sale, I suggest maybe 3-5 dollars is a good price.",1448981987,1448988659,True,6,0,0.571034491062164307,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18998943,"{'steamid': '76561198112190728', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1445925077}",english,Worse performance than Unity,1447193170,1447193170,False,4,0,0.462363779544830322,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18953740,"{'steamid': '76561197971017985', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1446993386}",french,"AC4 est un bon Assassin's Creed. Un des meilleurs à mon sens. Cet add-on n'est pas mauvais, mais il est décevant.

En effet, le sujet abordé mérite d'être bien développé, AC4 et est un très bon cadre pour le faire. Adelawe, le second de Kenway dans AC4, est un personnage à gros potentiel qu'il était logique d'utiliser pour cet add on et pour cette thématique. Facile donc ?
Oui ...

Et pourtant, Ubi a survolé la sujet, l'add-on se plie en 2h maxi en prenant son temps, durant lequel on ""grinde"" plus la libération d'esclave pour débloquer du matos d'assassin (logique ?) et des améliorations de bateau (là aussi, logique ?). Le commerce ne sert à rien, les esclaves et les marrons sont juste un ""compteur"" indiquant les palliers de progressions... c'est très léger.

Et Adelawe, pourtant pourvu d'une certaine sagesse dans AC4, se conduit comme un bourrin écervelé dans ce ""scenario"", causant presque autant de torts que le ""gros méchant"" qu'on apperçoit à peine.

C'est donc, de mon point de vue, une grande déception de voir avec quelle légèreté a été traité l'un des épisodes les plus honteux de notre histoire.",1446994327,1446994327,False,30,3,0.714876472949981689,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18764175,"{'steamid': '76561198161141911', 'num_games_owned': 536, 'num_reviews': 487, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1446211944}",english,"I wasn't a big fan of black flag i gave it a 7/10 and this standalone dlc is more of the same. I wish they had done more with the story and the character of Adewale because the concept is great. You are liberating slaves and this was the games chance to tell a really good and emotional story but they failed to do that.The main story is only 3 hours long but there are extra islands to explore and collectables which should add a few more hours. I didn't bother doing any of that because i just wanted the story to be over and done with so i could go play something else which is not a good thing. Unless you are a massive fan of black flag i see no reason to play this, even if you are a massive fan this dlc doesn't do much to flesh out the story of the main game because there is barely any story at all.
5/10 (Average)",1446210872,1524203712,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18709267,{'steamid': '76561198078018319', 'num_games_owned': 315, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1449225934}",russian,"Вот я и прошёл это замечательное дополнение к Assassin's Creed Black Flag , про освобождение рабов в Карибах.

column1: Плюсы игры:
+Новое оружие-петарды,мушкетон
+Открытый и обширный мир-для дополнения он огромный
+Сюжет-на былов так 7
+Плантации
Минусы тоже есть , но не столь значительные
-боёвка-хоть и много красивых добиваний , но она происходит резко

-оптимизация средняя-на высоких выдавало без сглаживания и примочек нвидиа 40-50 фпс, но после выставления оптимальных настроек в Nvidia geforce Experience фпс не изменился ).Хоть настройки стали выше)
Игра хороша по многим оспектам и по-моему мнению игру надо покупать.

18671151,"{'steamid': '76561197977670448', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1016, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1016, 'last_played': 1413900540}",french,:),1445750688,1445750688,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18654733,"{'steamid': '76561198056723676', 'num_games_owned': 645, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 904, 'last_played': 1445675853}",english,"Freedom Cry has its problems (which I'll get into here in a bit) and it doesn't really do much for the overarching narrative of the series as a whole, but it's still fun to play.

You play as Adewale, member of the Assassins and Edward Kenway's former quartermaster. You begin on the seas in your ship on a mission to intercept a Templar package.  After a brief naval battle, you sail through a storm and end up in Port au Prince in Sam Domingue. From there onwards, you do all kinds of Assassin-y stuff on your own personal mission (of sorts) to free slaves and uncover a plot by Pierre, marquis de Fayet to...do stuff.

Freedom Cry doesn't really offer anything new that Black Flag didn't. In fact, a bit less, which makes sense when you consider the fact that it was originally just a DLC pack before it became a standalone game. Oh and they weren't kidding when they said standalone. If you've never played a single Assassin's Creed title before this one, you won't have any problems grasping what's going on, as it really doesn't have anything to do with the main plot of the series. But, I digress.

You get two main weapons: a machete and a blunderbuss (as well as your hidden blades, but hidden blades in Assassin's Creed are a given at this point). Both can be upgraded with different versions, but still, the lack of variety in weapon types is a little disappointing. But, again, it's DLC. Most of the side weapons from Black Flag are present, including the blow gun and the rope dart.

The naval combat is as excellent as ever, though if you haven't played Black Flag it may take a little while to grasp as there's no real tutorial for it here. Your ship, the Experto Crede, is slightly upgradeable with a few gun and mortar upgrades, as well as a hull upgrade. You can also (kind of) customize its appearance with some nifty anti-slavery decorations.

Very basically, it's a slightly stripped-down Black Flag with a different main character and a much shorter storyline. Very fun to play, frustrating as hell at times, and (SLIGHT SPOILER ALERT THINLY VEILED IN RIDDLE) it'll leave you feeling a bit like Brad Pitt's character at the end of Seven. Remember Seven? Man, that was a good movie. What? Oh, right. The review. Um, yeah. Play this game. And stuff.",1445682224,1445682224,True,0,0,0.42166447639465332,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18624330,"{'steamid': '76561198162125201', 'num_games_owned': 300, 'num_reviews': 176, 'playtime_forever': 307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1445166102}",german,"5 Stunden für über 10Euro ist echt überteuert. 18603973,"{'steamid': '76561198137864485', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1445450392}",german,"Also ich muss sagen, ich bin ein RIESEN Fan der Assassin´s Creed Reihe.
Aber was mich an diesem Spiel wundert ist, dass es bei mir laggt (ja gut ich hab zwar nicht den besten Laptop, aber das ist Nebensachen).

Das ist komisch, weil ich auch Assassin´s Creed Rouge habe, was von Grafik und Spielstil und so eigentlich genau das gleiche ist, aber Assassin´s Creed Freedom Cry (Schrei nach Freiheit) laggt (sogar auf 1280x720p mit NIEDRIGSTEN Grafikeinstellungen) und Assassin´s Creed Rouge laggt so gut wie gar nicht bei mir (1280x720p mit hoher/mittlerer Grafikeinstellungen).
Trotzdem ein cooles Spiel und ich empfehle es allen, die überlegen es sich zu holen!",1445451262,1445451262,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18550386,"{'steamid': '76561198107344519', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 998, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 851, 'last_played': 1506199455}",english,"It's a cool addition to the AC franchsie but only get the game when it's on sale at like $4 because the game tries to make the game longer by blocking mission until you have a specific amount of slaves liberated.
I had a lot of fun with it because reminded me a lot of the good things in AC:IV, such as the naval exploring and navel battles.
BUT I HAVE A GTX 980Ti AND THIS GAME STUTTERS FOR WEIRD REASONS WITH A DUMB 60 FPS CAP. Running Windows 10.",1445180418,1446406252,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18535819,"{'steamid': '76561197990887353', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1445117048}",russian,"Мощный брутальный негр ассасин освобождает своих черных братьев. И освобождает, и освобождает. Потому что без этого никакой прокачки. Хотите мачете получше - освободите 300 братьев. Красивая природа, плавные движения. Главнй герой - машина для убийства, и наблюдать за этим действиельно интересно. Интересно первую тысячу раз, на вторую и десятую, уже хочется просто мимо пробежать. Но не получится. Кажется что вся экономика колоний работает на содержание внутренних войск - так их много.
Плюсы:
1) Коротко (теоретически часов за 10 можно пройти сюжет, получить удовольствие и стереть).
2) Красиво (как в Блэк Флаг).
3) Атмосферно. Плантации, истязание негров, вот это всё.
Минусы:
1) Надоело людей резать в промышленных масштабах.
2) Когда 10 раз перезагружаешься на стелс-миссии, думаешь а оно надо за свои деньги такие мучения.
Вердикт. Блэк флаг лучше. А это для фанатов серии, мастеров стелса, и любителей вырезать полархипелага.",1445117897,1445117897,False,2,0,0.542483627796173096,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18528116,"{'steamid': '76561198085827845', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1445094440}",german,"Assassin`s Creed Freedom Cry ,
enttäuscht in keiner Weiße zum Hauptspiel Assassin’s Creed® IV Black Flag™. Im Gegenteil es ergänzt eher noch die Story vom Hauptspiel, welche sich durchaus vom Hauptspiel abheben kann.
+ Es ergänzt die Story, schlüssig mit dem Haupteil
+ Sehr gut durchdachte, spannende Kampgane. Man fiebert den Ende selbst entgegen.
+ Neues Missionen rund um den Inhalt des Dlc`s
+ Sehr schöne gestaltete eigene Spielwelt, mit ihren Herausforderungen und Geheimnissen
+ Auch nach der Kampagne gibt es noch viel zu entdecken.
- Das Einzige was nach der Zeit langsam eintönig wird ist das rumfahren mit dem Schiff und dieSklaven-Rettung Missionen.
Das Dlc`s wird aufjedenfall der Assassinscreed-Reihe gerecht und ist ein gebürtiger Ableger.
Für alle nur sehr zu empfehlen.

18464985,"{'steamid': '76561198216016927', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1456258344}",schinese,shubiao,1444796582,1444796582,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

18459080,"{'steamid': '76561198076795924', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 871, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 823, 'last_played': 1444761481}",brazilian,"Um excelente jogo e ponto!

AC Freedom Cry não é um AC tradicional, formulas como stealth e parkour são menos importantes neste game que foca muito mais em combates estratégicos e obtenção de aliados. A música e história do jogo são seus pontos mais fortes. Aqui temos um escravo libertado que se une ao Credo dos Assassinos mas após uma missão mal sucedida se vê envolto em uma oportunidade de liberta outros negros escravisados na região do Mar do Caribe, isto embalado por uma empolgante trilha sonora com temas africanos cantados em yorubá.

Empolgante, bem construído e bastante divertido, e com um héroi realmente negro lutando por uma causa válida e justa, este é AC Freedom Cry. Pedida indispensável para fãs da série AC, o único defeito é ser curto (lembrando que úma DLC).",1444762457,1444762457,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,
