13786634,"{'steamid': '76561198029930151', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 908, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 908, 'last_played': 1420212314}",french,"N'ayant jamais joué à un seul AC j'avais décidé d'essayer ce stand alone afin d'avoir un aperçu de cette licence. Donc je ne sais pas si ce que j'ai aperçu ou ressenti est une généralité pour l'ensemble des AC...mais voici en tout cas mon opinion sur ce mini-épisode...

Tout d'abord je regardais du coin de l'oeil Black Flag ""l'intégrale"", ayant peur de mettre trop d'euros dans un jeu qui ne me plairait peut-être pas, j'attendais l'opportunité d'une grosse promo, car l'époque et la situation géographique m'intéressaient beaucoup. Et apparu Freedom Cry.

Trés honnêtement vu le nombre de screenshots que j'ai réalisé, dire qu'il m'a plu est un secret de polichinelle. C'est trés joli, l'ambiance antillaise est une merveille, les dialogues recherchés en utilisant les termes adaptés à l'époque, la bande son, les costumes, les armes, les détails historiques m'ont ravis !
Le scénario sur l'esclavagisme m'a aussi beaucoup plu ! Libérer les plantations, les navires négriers, les éléments de piraterie en pleine mer,....

Par contre une des choses à laquelle j'ai eu bcp de mal à me familiariser durant tout le jeu : le gameplay ! Un énorme décalage entre l'action que l'on veut réaliser et le temps réel de réalisation de la dite action (exemple : escalader, ou bien sauter d'un endroit à un autre),...détailler, rendre réaliste c'est bien...mais dans les phases où il faut hausser le rythme parce que l'on est poursuivi par 10 mecs c'est vite énervant...L'autre chose énervante, c'est le fait de mettre trop de personnages, de foule (même si j'ai bien compris que c'était le kiff des réalisateurs de ce jeu histoire de bien faire ramer les PC et dire ""t'as vu t'as vu hein ?? le nombre de persos??? tu fais mieux toi ?? hein??""), trop de ""quêtes"" annexes proches les unes des autres...ça devient vite le bordel quand elles s'enclenchent en même temps automatiquement en passant juste à proximité .... Ce qui pour ma part m'a forcé à rusher sur les 3 dernieres missions afin d'avancer et de finir ce jeu, afin d'être ""tranquille"".
Un bon stand alone donc, que j'avais eu en promo, donc pas déçu de cette expérience.

Ce qui m'a permis également de conclure, que je ne prendrai jamais d'épisode complet de AC, car je pense que la répétition des missions devient vite lassante, et vu que ça doit être le même principe pour tous les AC (suivre, tuer, espionner)....et bien ...15h de jeu ça m'a suffit largement.
Peu importe le flacon, pourvu qu'on ait l'ivresse ! Hein moussaillon ???",1420214021,1420214287,True,44,15,0.75272446870803833,11,True,False,False,False,,,

13739749,"{'steamid': '76561197999154893', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 108, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1420036708}",czech,"Toto DLC je taková jednohubka ze světa AC. Příběh Adawaleho a jeho boj za osvobození otroků. A o nic víc tu vlastně nejde. Templáři a Asasíni jsou přesunuti na vedlejší kolej, občas o nich padne akorát zmínka.

Naplní hry je teda osvobozování otroků, a jejich záchrana z otrokářských lodí. Za jejich větší počet se dostávají odměny v podobě vylepšení nosnosti zbraní, nové věci na loď atd... Jsou tu i plantáže kde je potřeba zlikvidovat stráže potichu, jinak začnou zabíjet otroky.

Je to sice jako Black Flag ale v mnohem menším měřítku. Boj proti otrokářství je zajímavé téma, jen je škoda že toho víc hra nenabídne. Ve slevě každopádně stojí za nákup, na těch 5 hodin zabaví.",1420040413,1420040413,True,8,0,0.639951825141906738,0,False,False,False,False,,,

13679858,"{'steamid': '76561198064055946', 'num_games_owned': 456, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1419199820}",brazilian,"Apesar de pequeno, traz a temática da escravidão que se encaixa (quase) perfeitamente no enredo de Assassin's Creed. Acho que o jogo poderia ter sido uma versão que tratava dos quilombos como se fosse uma ordem dos assassinos, mas não que ele pertencia à ordem e ajudava os escravos.

Os escravos lutaram em quantidade, ganhavam pela força e quantidade, não pela destreza (e não que não houvessem casos ou que não possa). Sei que é ser um pouco chato com a história pensar assim, mas fico analisando a veracidade dos fatos nos games as vezes, principalmente quando se tratam de enredos, mesmo que fictícios.

A verdade é que o jogo é muito bom, traz o tempo que promete de jogo, diversão acima do que a prevista, e a integração com o sistema do Black Flag (que diga-se de passagem é MUITO BOM). Não vá jogar esperando que é mais um Assassin's Creed com um personagem diferente e missões que tem a ver, é TUDO diferente, armas, falas, animações, e a ambientação é muito boa.",1419822525,1419822525,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

13622554,"{'steamid': '76561198086848284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1438378952}",polish,"AC FC To dodatek do Black Flaga to tak jak by kolejna część asasyna. 13614495,"{'steamid': '76561197960554264', 'num_games_owned': 918, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1419610928}",english,"While I cannot atest to the quality of Assassin's Creed IV, III was an utter mess. Glitchy, buggy, time-wasting and otherwise lost in the sea of AAA checkpoints just to make a sale; Connor deserved a much better game surrounding his wonderfully built world.

This seemed to be the trend with a lot of Ubisoft titles as of late. Stuff the world full of as much nonsense as you can and hope the players get distracted to ignore the flaws. It didn't work in the case of Assassin's Creed III and I have no idea how much superfluous extras there are in IV. With this standalone campaign, though, Ubisoft have finally nailed a perfect balance of missions and pacing.

No longer do you need to trek through mindless set ups and investigations to get to the good stuff. Freedom Cry almost sticks to action 100% of the time, but you do get some small diversions to break up the monotony. Forcing side missions on the player isn't that nice, but the missions are given some extra weight due to the setting and narrative.

As for the plotline, I can't say that I was impressed. I love the idea of a former slave joining the creed and exacting vengeance, but I think IV had more setup for main character, Adewale, that is missing from this. Even the beginning of the game seems like it was already underway before my intervention.

The game also does succumb to being a bit scripted. One of the later missions on a sinking ship would have been exhilerating if there were some actual danger involved. Instead, you simply can wait around until the game tells you to leave and be done with it. Smoke and mirrors was the name of the game with III and I'm sad to see it still being utilized here.

There are also the occassional problems with pathfinding while running and combat getting lost with the camera. I often couldn't tell what I was doing or had a hard time stopping myself from performing one action and ended up failing missions. It can be aggravating when you fail due to no fault of your own, but the extremely generous checkpoints make nearly every mistake moot.

The game is also exceptionally easy. I messed up in a few parts with naval battles, but that was mostly because of my lack of experience with them (I know IV is based around naval encounters). The ship mechanics are vastly improved from III and are actually quite enjoyable. I wouldn't mind getting into more of them.

So overall, Freedom Cry is a nice little diversion from the normal Assassin's Creed experience. It's short length makes it great to plow through in one sitting. It's also a lot more consistent in quality and mission structure than III could ever hope to be.

While it may feel a little undercooked, it still rings true as a beacon of fresh air within this franchise. Hopefully Ubisoft realizes that jamming your game with extraneous missions isn't the best way to garner value for your title.

13545889,"{'steamid': '76561198085217258', 'num_games_owned': 1389, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 441, 'last_played': 1419154838}",thai,สานุกกว่า ภาค Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry อีก,1419344538,1419344538,True,7,11,0.45216602087020874,0,False,False,False,False,,,

13544728,"{'steamid': '76561198070961535', 'num_games_owned': 214, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1419338190}",polish,"[b] Recenzja Assasin's Creed Freedom Cry [/b]
Ogólnie mówiąc Freedom Cry jest takim dodatkiem,w którym oprócz fabuły,która jest tu tylko pretekstem do poskakania sobie po dachach nic nie zmieniono.

Tym razem wcielamy się w Adewale,którego po nieudanej ucieczce morze wyrzuca na brzeg Saint-Domingue bez broni i żadnych planów na przyszłość. Nasz bohater,jako były niewolnik decyduje się pomóc niewolnikom żyjącym na wyspie.
Bitwy morskie (których nie będzie wiele) są podobnie jak w Black Flagu bardzo efektowne.

Walka  w moim odczuciu została zepsuta, zabrano nam dające jakże wielką satysfakcję pistolety, a zastąpiono je garłaczem oraz szablę,którą zastępuje maczeta. Oprócz wymienionych atrybutów nasz bohater dysponuje także strzałkami usypiającymi,petardami czy chociażby  bombami dymnymi.
Gre polecam bardziej dla osób,które nie miały i nie zamierzają mieć kontaktu z Black Flagiem,dlaczego?
Ponieważ osoba,taka jak ja która ukończyła ów Black Flaga,w Freedom Cry nie napotka niczego nowego co ją zaskoczy, a raczej będzie czuła frustrację z odczuwalnego na każdym kroku deja vu.
Grafika: 9/10 {jak zwykle w produkcjach ubisoftu stoi na bardzo wysokim poziomie}
Fabuła: 3/10 {jak już napisałem,fabuła jest tu tylko pretekstem}
Grywalność: 5/10 {jest ciekawie,ale bardzo krótko;misje starczają ledwo na 2-3 godziny}
Ogólna ocena: 6/10 {jeśli będzie w przystępnej cenie to zachęcam do kupna}",1419340452,1419340452,True,33,0,0.772793054580688477,0,True,False,False,False,,,

13496918,"{'steamid': '76561198038851555', 'num_games_owned': 306, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 737, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 527, 'last_played': 1423998861}",russian,"[code]Главное умение Ubisoft - делать из старого что-то новое. Ярким примером такого подхода к продукции является и Freedom Cry, который продолжает развивать тему Liberation, разве что более глобально и ближе к теме освобождения рабов, нежели в истории Авелины.
[code][h1]СЮЖЕТ[/h1][/code]

Во время поиска нужных для Братства документов уже знакомый Адевале попадет в кораблекрушение, после чего его выносит на берег плантаторного центра Вест-Индии - Порт-О-Пренс. Вспоминая, что он тоже когда был среди рабов и бла-бла-бла, решает их освобождать, попутно выполняя задание братства. Я ожидал большего, я ожидал флэшбеков о событиях после Black Flag, возвращения старых персонажей, но в итоге получил всего пару отсылок и только, но концовкой я все равно остался доволен, сам же Адевале после прохождения как очень харизматичный и довольно умный персонаж, это только и радует.  Все эти растягивание и так ультра короткого и предсказуемого сюжета сбивали повествование сильно.
[h1]Оценка: 5/10[/h1]
[code][h1]ГРАФИКА[/h1][/code]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/mr-rondo-hothex/recommended/242050/]См. рецензию Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag [/url]
[code][h1]МЕХАНИКА[/h1][/code]

Наполнен мир довольно скудно, даже учитывая то, что помимо Порт-О-Пренса есть еще более десяти пунктов на морской карте. Да, их более десяти, но тем не менее они очень малы и некоторые из островов имеют всего один сундук для сбора. После же завершения сюжетной кампании, игра оставляет вас наедине с сотнями рабов, которых нужно спасать и ничего интересного, помимо улучшений, от этого вы не получите. Я насчитал всего восемь различных ситуаций, при которых можно спасти рабов. А именно: убийство, гонящегося за рабом плантатора; убийство плантатора, мучующего раба; спасти/купить рабов во время аукциона; спасти рабов, убив их конвой; выпустить рабов из клетки; перенести раненного раба в безопасное место; освободить плантацию и взять на абордаж линейный корабль, на котором перевозят рабов. И это на самом деле очень неплохо, но то, что этим в целом и проходится только и заниматься - раздражает. Благодаря тому, что Адевале самый сильный играбельный персонаж в серии, в нашем распоряжении появились два новых основных вида оружия, а точнее даже один, так как мачете уже было позаимствовано ранее Авелиной. Я говорю о мушкетоне - одной из первых вариаций дробовика, который может одним выстрелом убить около шести человек. Кастомизация по сравнению с Черным Флагом совсем никудышная. Четыре варианта мушкетона и мачете - это всё, чем можно персонализировать своего персонажа. Про корабль вообще молчу, полнейший копипаст Галки из оригинальной четвёрки. Ах да, Адевале, как и все персонажи серии, может использовать орлиное зрение, и это уже действительно странно, учитывая что в начальных играх серии говорилось, что только единицы во всем мире могут получить этот ""дар"", но вы только посмотрите сколько персонажей только за сагу Кэнуэев его имеет.
[h1]Оценка: 7/10[/h1]

Тут уже не вооруженным глазом можно увидеть жадность издателя, 850 рублей за всего одну последовательность и скудный вторичный мир- это дикость. Берите максимум для ознакомления перед Rogue, а лучше посмотрите геймплей на ютубе, времени займет не больше обеда.

13364443,"{'steamid': '76561198088033314', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1418480769}",english,"[h1][b]Cry for more[/b][/h1]
[h1][b]Full Review at [url=http://gamedragons.net/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=126]GameDragons.Net[/url][/b][/h1]
[b]Presentation[/b]

Freedom Cry tells the story of Black Flag's Adéwalé, twenty years after the story of Edward Kenway, following Adéwalé in his journey through the West Indies Sea, where he ends up shipwrecked on the coast of Haiti. Making his way into Port-au-Prince he meets up with Bastienne Josèphe, the proprietor of a local brothel and a sympathiser to the Maroons, a faction of freedom fighters made up of liberated slaves. Soon afterwards Adéwalé gets caught up in the events and ends up teaming with the Maroons to free slaves from around the West Indies Sea.

As emotional and personal the story is, its length demolishes almost everything the plot wants to uncover, as most missions will be over before you realize it, leaving details aside and focusing only on the main objectives, therefore taking away from the emotional impact the story could've had if we were presented with some background on the slaves and their masters which Adéwalé is supposed to fight blindly. Adéwalé's relationship with Bastienne Josèphe is one of the few things that stands out strong throughout the six hour adventure, as you will find out more about her intentions from one visit to the next one, and by the end of the story form a bond with her that you could only wish would continue for a few more hours.
[b]Gameplay[/b]

Being an extension to Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag, Freedom Cry plays exactly the same, with a few interesting things added for the best, and a lot of amazing features present in the original game removed for the worst. This is still an open world game, so you can use your ship to travel from one location to another just like you did in Black Flag, but not only is the game limited to the West Indies Sea which is a pretty small portion of the Caribbean, but at the same time that portion feels empty in a way that Black Flag never did, even with its enormous map.

There are only three main islands where the main plot will take you and maybe five more where you can find a chest or a secret, but for the most part the seas feel empty, and even in those main islands aside from the objective where the mission takes you and the slave liberation missions there is nothing else to do, something that feels weird to begin with for an Assassin's Creed game. On the bright side, the Blunderbuss and Adéwalé's machete are some great new tools to play around with, at least in the main missions since that's the only occasion you'll get to use them properly.
[b]Graphics[/b]

Freedom Cry was built as an extension to Black Flag, so it uses the same engine and environment, which is only for the best since the original game was a beauty with vast seas, populated lands and unforgiving fleets. In this title, the seas are still there in all their beauty and so are the ships cruising them, but the difference comes when you set sail for land and realize there is nothing else to see there; unlike Black Flag, Freedom Cry has only a few islands and even those look similar, as no matter which one you set foot on next, you'll still be greeted by the same slave plantation or empty beach.
[b]Audio[/b]

With such great audio design and quality in Black Flag, it was impossible to screw it up this time, since most of it is reused in here, which isn't much of a problem since all the effects feel authentic in Adéwalé's story as well. There are a couple new tunes created for Freedom Cry exclusively and those find their spot in Adéwalé's story flawlessly, and thanks to some great voice acting performed by Tristan D. Lalla, Adéwalé's character feels even more authentic than it did before in Black Flag throughout Kenway's story.
[b]Extras[/b]

Even though this can be purchased as a standalone experience, it is obviously just an extension to Black Flag, but even so playing an Assassin's Creed game where you can barely squeeze six hours of playtime if you're taking your time with the story, completing all the slave liberation missions and looking around for the few islands that hide a chest feels weird since Assassin's Creed was always about exploration and the things you can do on the side, things that are almost non-existent in Freedom Cry.
[b]Verdict[/b]

Freedom Cry wanted to tell a more personal story than the original Black Flag, but unfortunately the limited length of the story, as well as the empty environment in which it takes place makes it fall flawed as important and emotional events will be over before realizing it and for most parts without any explanation or background on Adéwalé's intentions.

13217470,"{'steamid': '76561198088146924', 'num_games_owned': 300, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 206, 'last_played': 1417552426}",brazilian,"Em minha opinião um otimo AC eu gostei da campanha é curta e objetiva de uma forma que você não vai ficar cansado em jogar, por mim um modelo tipo esse para Ubisoft daqui pra frente, eles num querem fazer um jogo por ano? Voltando ao jogo, ele era uma DLC do Assassin's Creed 4 Black Flag e tem as mesmas mecanicas gerais exeto que ele não usa as mesmas armas do Edward, outra coisa que eu gostei também dele é o mapa que é medio, é bem bem pequeno comparado ao 4 porém ele tá no limite entre um mapa que cansa ficar vindo e indo fora que tem os objetivos extras como libertar escravos e tal parar navios negreiros enfim é muito bom eu recomendo para quem quer jogar não quer ficar enjoado fazendo um milhão de coisas e ainda sim ter tempo para se divertir!",1417639349,1417639349,True,26,1,0.755231082439422607,1,True,False,False,False,,,

13216944,"{'steamid': '76561198082230307', 'num_games_owned': 275, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 828, 'last_played': 1417636153}",german,"...eigentlich auch 15€ wert!
Anmerkung: ich hab mir das Spiel für 5€ im Sale gekauft weil ich keine 15€ ausgeben wollte.

Rückblickend hätte ich das aber tun sollen, denn ""Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry"" macht eine sehr gute Figur als Standalone. Als 3stündige Singleplayererweiterung hat mir ""AC:FC"" rund 15 Stunden Spaß bereitet alle Collectibles zu sammeln, Schiff und Ausrüstung zu vervollständigen und wie immer ne Menge Tod zu verursachen^^

Für mich hat Freedom Cry tatsächlich Lust geweckt ""Black Flag"", also das zugehörige Hauptspiel doch noch durchzuspielen, obwohl ich davon bisher gar nicht mal sooo begeistert war. Freedom Cry hat mir derbe Spaß gemacht und jetzt möchte ich die volle Ladung Karibikassasinenpiratengedöns.

Die Technik ist die selbe wie bei BF, das Gameplay gefällt, die Story fällt leider etwas kurz und gestellt aus, zum Glück ist da aber kaum sichtlich hingestellte Templerscheiße, die einfach nicht ins Setting gepasst hätte. Die leider etwas dünn gezeichnete Geschichte gleicht der sehr coole Hauptcharakter total aus, im Schnitt würd ich ""Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry"" 9/10 und ein Assassin's Creed Fanboysternchen geben.
Danke Ubisoft ! :)
Unter 10€ direkt kaufen Leute, es lohnt sich.

,1417636727,1417636727,True,18,0,0.731382131576538086,0,False,False,False,False,,,
13202999,{'steamid': '76561197960550055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 761, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 640, 'last_played': 1448842249}",english,"[h1]TLDR [/h1] A sloppy and underwhelming DLC product that does a disservice to both it's subject matter and original game. Buy the base game, Assassins Creed 4: Black Flag, or Assassins Creed: Rogue.
[h1]Tone Deaf [/h1]

The narrative feels rushed and unfocused, beginning and ending rather abruptly. It starts with your classic AC MacGuffin, then promptly forgets about it; Then touches on themes of slavery but begins to quickly move them to the backround, instead focusing too much of it's narrative on a cartographer mapping the Caribbean that happens to be in Port au Prince (The primary setting of this DLC.) This leads to far too many tail/eavesdrop missions, moreso some of the worst, most frustrating examples in any of the AC games to date. It relies too much on tightly scripted sequences that limit your mobility and/or abilities and mistakes tedium for engagement too often. The main story missions can be completed in under 4 hours.

The freeing of slaves is relegated mostly to narrative-devoid side activities, tied to unlocking upgraded weapons and other optional items, cheapening the poignancy to the point of repetitively farming a statistic. The repetition is not helped by the rapid respawn of prisoners; I could return to the same spot within two minutes to find new caged prisoners, new guards taking the exact same routes, the corpses of their predecessors still laying about.
[h1]Landlubber [/h1]

The game is really at it's best when you are raiding plantations. You free the slaves of the plantation by killing guards. It's just nice having that chance to take it on in your own way, with your full set of skills and the space to use them instead of limiting them like a majority of the main missions. It's always the same objective, Kill 20 guards, and it feels like a wasted opportunity; It could have used more variety to keep it fresh, and without narrative it only serves as a distraction from the underwhelming storyline.

Sailing feels like an afterthought, with a very small map and only a handful of locations to explore, with many of those being little more than beaches with a chest or two on them. After all the sea shanties of AC4, it is very noticeable that Adewale's ship crew is generally silent; it would have been nice if there were a couple of new, theme appropriate songs for them to sing, or just a few of the old ones. There are no treasure maps to find, no forts to destroy, no side assassinations to undertake. Hunting and whaling are pointless as there's nothing to craft. I didn't even notice there were ship upgrades until the second playthrough, the ship's upgraded enough out of the gate to deal with the few ship-to-ship fights. It's also painfully obvious you're always sailing the Jackdaw, the recycled ship model from the main game (AC4 Black Flag.) The ship you're sailing and sinks out of the gate is identical, and then the next one you steal is EXACTLY THE SAME, right down to the decorations, even the three skulls hanging over captains quarters entrance.

The new items border on impractical: The blunderbuss is a shrapnel-spread shotgun that's just as likely to kill the slaves you're trying to free or your crew as you board other ships; The noise-making firecrackers can only be dropped right in front of you and the noise doesn't seem to have much distance. The Machete is a sword, just like any other AC game, albeit with some pretty sweet, brutal animations. The animations are sort of aesthetically flawed since they go on a little long in combos and tend to get cut off as you parry other enemies in groups.
[h1]Drunken Sailor [/h1]

As with other recent series entries, this one suffers from an inconsistent frame rate and animation/scripting bugs that mar it's presentation. I watched a hunter's ship sail up the side of an islands rocky peak and into the air before flipping back into the water. I was caught during tailing/eavesdrop missions because sometimes the target would get caught on something/someone and would do a quick spin on the spot, seeing in all directions at once for a second. Sometimes freeing slaves would spawn guards out of thin air (Maybe not a bug but it happened a lot, it was tedious and annoying.) The frame rate plummets noticeably at seemingly random intervals and occasionally assets will materialise in front of Adewale as he runs through the streets.
[h1]A Ship Without An Anchor [/h1]

Adewale is a potentially interesting and charismatic character and I was hoping to get to know him a bit better, as well as explore a very dark aspect of colonialism that was largely glossed over in AC 3 and 4. Freedom Cry does little to add much dimension to it's protagonist, seems uncomfortable confronting the issues of it's own subject matter, and it's disappointing it failed to approach it with compelling narrative or engaging gameplay.",1417552981,1550163059,False,11,0,0.434134095907211304,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12963308,"{'steamid': '76561198087047963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1734, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1049, 'last_played': 1584755609}",portuguese,"jogo perfeito graficos ótimos, perfeita jogabilidade. eu recomendo!!",1416119203,1416119203,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12940415,"{'steamid': '76561198028886427', 'num_games_owned': 413, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 721, 'last_played': 1415990648}",russian,"Вообщем прошел стэндалоун дополнение к Асассин Крид Блэк Флаг и был приятно удивлён. После убогенького дополнения про Авелину ( которое занимало чуть ли не пол часа времени и ноль контента имело оно)  казалось что и нет смысла делать это длс именно как стэндалоун дополнение, но на деле тут контента оказалось куда больше. Сама сюжетка состоит из всего девяти миссий, но их искусственно растянули за счет надобности выполнять побочные задания. Что и не напрягает и не даёт пройти сюжетку за пару часов. Да и тут есть хоть минимальный открытый мир, где можно вполне себе побродить та пособирать разные предметы и прочее. В дополнении есть чуть ли не все основные фишки игры, хоть и в ,мягко говоря, куда меньшем количестве.  Всё же за игрой можно провести вечера\другой.

Порекомендовал бы её либо тем кто хочет поиграть в  эдакую демо-версию основной игры (с чём она отлично справляется)  , либо  тем, кому просто очень уж хочется вернутся на Карибы и бороздить там водную гладь, попутно освобождая своих собратьев и обзывая всех сухопутными крысами :)
Плюсы :
Отличная демо-версия оригинала.
Узнаешь чуть больше о жизни Адевале после прощания с Эдвардом.
Вернутся в столь живописный мир сам по себе уже плюс :)
Минусы :

Мир игры итак сплюснут до одного нормального острова + пару более менее островов + ещё парочка совсем уж детских островков, так ещё и карта врёт ибо границы игры заканчиваются намного раньше, нежели показано на карте. Я то думал что и там ещё будет по пару островков.

Побочные задания с освобождением рабов порою ну ОЧЕНЬ навязчивые. Ты бежишь по квестовому заданию, как мимо тебя пробегает раб просящий о помощи  и этот квест автоматически берется и отображается у тебя на пол экрана. Мало того что это отвлекает и мешает выполнять сюжетный квест, так ещё и провалы квестов (пусть и побочных) бесят таких людей как Я , которым вечно хочется успеть выполнить всё.
Все минусы оригинальной игры аккуратно перекочевали и сюда.

Например персонаж временами делает ВООБЩЕ не то , чего Ты от него просишь. То зачем-то спустится тогда, когда тебе нужно было что б он полз в другую сторону. То во время погони он зачем-то упрется в стенку и будет пытаться на неё вскарабкаться, то блок не пройдёт, то ещё что-то.

Ну а так рекомендую поиграть как и в неё, так и в оригинальную игру :)  При том что это лишь длс,  Я всё же сумел провести в игре аж 12 часов (хотя на деле думаю часов 10. в общей сложности часа два ещё ушло на моменты когда Я сворачивал игру или отходил от компа. ну и минут 30 одни лишь титры заняли ахахах)",1415993038,1415993038,True,0,0,0,0,False,False,False,False,,,

12935554,"{'steamid': '76561198035264707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 277, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1415804651}",russian,"Те -же Яйца,только в профиль.Игровой процесс,тот-же,что в Black Flag,только с негроидом в главной роли.Поиграл немного и бросил.",1415966266,1415966266,False,5,0,0.44215470552444458,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12923569,"{'steamid': '76561198036093311', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1428852359}",dutch,wat een vies vuil smerig spel ik kan geen klote hij loopt al vast in het beging zonde van m'n geld,1415885102,1415885102,False,0,1,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12893074,"{'steamid': '76561198075248580', 'num_games_owned': 288, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 622, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1549214836}",czech,"Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry je první a bohužel také poslední DLC na AC: Black Flag a jde o takovou malou ochutnávku toho, co nabízí Black Flag jako samotný. Základní kostra hry je stále stejná: návykové lodní bitvy, chytlavý soubojový systém a rozsáhlý herní arzenál. Zbytek hry je už ale něco docela jiného. Freedom Cry nás vytáhne z pirátské lehkosti a bezstarostnosti Black Flag a vrhá nás do temného a vážnějšího světa otroků, kde se základní koncept hry opět vrací k zarytému tématu Assassini X Templáři. Herní mechanismy se této změně také přizpůsobily a tak už si nové zbraně nekupujete za naloupené peníze, ale za počet osvobozeních otroků což je docela dobrá změna, ale rychle přejde v stereotypní hraní a to obzvláště, když je nutný určitý počet osvobozených otroků na pokračování v kampani. Navíc zde pak ztrácíte jakoukoliv inspiraci pro přepadávání lodí, jelikož vám z toho neplyne žádná odměna (tedy pokud nepřepadáváte otrokářské lodě, což ale není taková sranda, jelikož je nemůžete poškodit). Samotná délka kampaně se i s všemi potřebnými misemi neprotáhne navíc jak na čtyři hodiny, což je i přes stereotypní hratelnost docela škoda, ale stále je to Assassin's Creed jak má být ačkoliv jeho kvalita neodpovídá jeho ceně, a tak doporučuji si jí koupit ve slevě za nějaká čtyři eura (když vezmeme v úvahu, že starší, příběhem nabitější díly, se dají koupit za tři eura).",1415739431,1415739431,True,24,3,0.769400954246520996,0,True,False,False,False,,,

If you are fan of series buy it. If not do not bother.,1415550700,1415550700,True,1,0,0.40213814377784729,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12853078,"{'steamid': '76561198059607035', 'num_games_owned': 2173, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1415490834}",spanish,"[h1]  ¿Una expansión de AC IV: Blackflag necesaria?   	 [/h1]

En Assassín's Creed: Freedom Cry seremos Adéwalé, un esclavo que huyó de su miseria para hacerse independiente y poder lograr la independencia de los esclavos que eran de raza negra, recordemos que fue Edward Kenway el que lo ayudó a liberarse, es casi necesario jugar AC IV para poder entender mejor a Adéwalé, es decir, lo que fue, lo que es y lo que será.

El juego es muy similar a AC IV, por no decir que igual, tiene el mismo motor gráfico, jugabilidad, las misiones si bien no son las mismas, son similares. Tiene algunos cambios, sobretodo en armas, agregan un par más, así como un dardo nuevo, como sea, no es realmente una gran innovación y si acabaste AC IV forzosamente, entonces tal vez no querrás jugar este juego.

La historia no es muy atrapante, basicamente es lograr la independencia de tu raza, para eso debes empezar poco a poco, liberando esclavos, luego grupos mayores, así como destruir barcos... Lo que realmente me parece que vale la pena este juego es el final, si bien durante todo el juego vemos a esclavos en jaulas o llevados por la fuerza, es en el climax donde Adéwalé intenta salvar más esclavos,  en esa misión vemos a esclavos sufrir mucho, algunos murieron por hambre, otros incinerados, pero todos piden misericordia, incluso cuando escapas logras ver cadaveres de inocentes por todas partes.

Si eres fan de Assassín Creed entonces deberías probar este juego, ya que nos ofrece algo muy similar a AC IV, solamente que con otro personaje como principal, si no es lo tuyo los AC entonces tal vez deberías dejarlo pasar. En general me parece que cumple y que vale la pena probarlo.

12798316,"{'steamid': '76561198105271398', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 390, 'last_played': 1413806910}",russian,"Я фанат серии игры Асасин.Прошел все части.И скажу честно с каждым разом Юби они все больше и больше меня огарчают в плане Сюжета и Истории в новых частях.Обычно люди жалуется на баги Графу и движок и т.д но мне чесно на это насрать потомучто эта игра зацепиала меня свои сюжетом.Сюжет они начали пороть псоле той части когда Дезмонд здох.Тоесть после этой части я проходил остальные чисто на автомате в ожидании что Юби внесут и продолжат старый сюжет но не хера.....

12585376,"{'steamid': '76561198076587335', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 1285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 950, 'last_played': 1600615474}",english,"I bought AC:FC as solo game after finishing Black Flag. Well, this really should remain only as DLC. A few hours more of sidestory of Adéwalé liberating his black brothers from slavery. A few just eavesdropping or following missions, where you could easily get punished when leaving stealth. Don't like the way the game pushes you to be stealth, you just have no option.

Felt more free when playing older AC's beforce AC3 came. I love stealth, but don't like the way FreedomCry literally pushes you into the corner during story missions and punishes you by failing mission without any possibility to run away or fight etc.

Game itself has same assets, animations and whole core are from Black Flag, so beside of main story you can again sail the beatiful sea on a few isles and liberat slaves from slaveships or from plantations, which are infinitely occupied againg some time after you liberate them. Hunting/fishing and revealing a few unknown locations is here too.
Not bad, but not so good, expected more or a bit richier story of Adwéwalé. Nice setting and characters, i could imagine whole game based on slavery theme.

Anyway i loved different approach when liberating plantations during day and during night. Most of time there is a static daytime (i loved dynamic daytime in AC2/Bhd/Rvs), but you can easily change daytime between day and night ... same was as in FarCry2 ;).
If you're AC fan as probably i am ;) you can give it try, but don't expect too much.",1413825494,1413825494,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12479707,"{'steamid': '76561198063955453', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 766, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 766, 'last_played': 1413224126}",english,"Now, as a long term Assassin's Creed fan I was super god damn excited to play this game when I saw it on sale. However, when I finished it a day or so later, I felt a little disappointed.

This game overall feels more like a couple of long DLC missions in the main game than a stand alone game. It's entertaining enough if you liked Black Flag, because this is basically the same, but on a much smaller, less interesting scale. It feels like you're just playing as a reskinned Edward, as the idle animations are the exact same. You can hunt certain animals, but there's no purpose, because you can't craft or make more outfits. Like in Black Flag, you can plunder other ships, but the rewards are so badly scaled to the prices of the few upgrades, that you're basically decked out after you've pulverized four ships. Freedom Cry feels like someone cut a tiny square out of the bayeux tapestry. It's aesthetically pleasing in itself, but it's lacking a whole hell of a lot of context.

I personally don't feel like Freedom Cry's got enough content or weight to be its own game. I played it, I completed it, it was okay while it lasted, but in a critical light, this really isn't that big of a deal. I would't recommend buying this unless it's on sale.",1413225031,1413225089,False,23,3,0.48898845911026001,1,True,False,False,False,,,

12471644,"{'steamid': '76561198042405745', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1416197180}",english,"Seems like it will be a good game.  But this is the first I have played any of the Assassin games, there is no tutorial mode to teach you how to fight move, climb drive a boat, shoot a cannon, clime a tree jump.  Nothing, you just die and reload and try again.  I am guessing you had to start from a previous/older version of the Assassin series to figure this out.  Kind of frustrating.  Let me know if one of the other games have a build up/training mode to help you learn the ins and outs of moving and combat?  Thanks.

I went out and bought a gamepad to see if that would help play this game.  Nope.  this game sucks on PC, not really configurable.  I can't seem to custumize it any usful way.  I think there is too much automatic assumptions made based on my movement and I can't control anything very well.  The start of the game on the ship, I seem to be able to do that with Keyboard and Mouse better then with the gamepad, but fighting and basic movement is completely skewed and there is no tutorial on playing.  There is a few tips that pop up durring a battle, I trying not to die, fighing clicking random buttons and trying to read directions at the same time...  WTF!!  Big flaw in the design there.

Gamepad X, Y configs are screwed too, I can't reverse one with out reversing both, so it modifies left and right if I modify up and down.  ??   ARG!  This seems like it would be a fun game, but I think I might shoot myself if I try to play it anymore.",1413159497,1416197748,False,1,1,0.424929201602935791,0,True,False,False,False,,,

Das Kampfsystem ist mies, Adewale macht viel zu selten was ich ihm sage.
Ich drücke Kontern, er fängt sich eine, ich drücke Rauchbombe werfen, er tut es erst nach 10-20 maligen Drücken...
Ich laufe direkt hinter Gegnern, er tötet sie dennoch nicht mit der versteckten Klinge, nur bei jedem 4 Gegner gelingt das es auf Anhieb.

Ich hatte mir das Spiel eigentlich geholt, weil ich mir Assassins Creed IV holen wollte, aber erst einmal einen Vorgeschmack brauchte. Wenn Assassins Creed IV sich genauso spielt, ist es das mieseste Assassins Creed aller Zeiten...",1413024675,1413024675,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12445093,"{'steamid': '76561198023265396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 187, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1417255411}",thai,เกมสืสนุกช่วงลดคุ้มค่ามาก,1413012498,1413012498,True,1,0,0.473372787237167358,0,False,False,False,False,,,

12444402,"{'steamid': '76561198137671653', 'num_games_owned': 256, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1413006983}",russian,"Прежде всего, хотелось бы предоставить краткую информацию об этой игре. ""Freedom Cry"" изначально была сюжетным дополнением к ""Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag"", входящей в состав Season Pass, а позже перенесена в отдельную игру.
Большинство считает, что это просто трехчасовое приключение старпома Эдварда, но на самом деле тут не все так просто.

Во-первых, существует сильная сюжетная связь между третьей частью, ""Черным флагом"", ""Криком свободы"" и ""Изгоем"". И история Адевале дает понять, что стало с чернокожим другом и помощником главного героя из основной игры и его кораблем до событий, связанных с Шеем Кормаком.

Адевале стал ассассином, а его целью было освобождение рабов. Действие игры разворачивается на острове Гаити, у берегов которого корабль ""Галка"" потерпел крушение. Став капитаном нового судна ""Эксперто Креде"" он решил помочь местным рабам. К сожалению, больше событий в три часа геймплея разработчикам вместить не удалось.

Во-вторых, тут довольно много нового контента, в отличие от, например, сюжетных дополнений для ""Теней Мордора"". Это новая территория, новый герой с новым вооружением и новой анимацией боя, а также новые элементы геймплея. Основным оружием Адевале является мачете и мушкетон, что уже сильно отличается от двух мечей и пистолетов Эдварда.

В целом, это шикарное дополнение, которое очень кстати вынесли в отдельную игру, так как в этом случае ее можно объединить в трилогию вместе с ""Черным флагом"" и ""Изгоем"". Или в тетралогию, если учитывать третью часть. Кроме того, я считаю, что ознакомиться с ""Криком свободы"" можно и обойдя стороной основную игру. Но покупать его рекомендую только по скидке, так как оно включено в сезонный пропуск.",1413007192,1435917449,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12439024,"{'steamid': '76561198028441242', 'num_games_owned': 270, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1412967002}",english,"Freedom Cry is the main DLC content for Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag and follows the efforts of Adewale, Edward Kenway's former quartermaster and now an Assassin, to aid the Maroon slaves rebellion around the town of Port'au'Prince.

Compared to the main game, Freedom Cry's main novelity as a DLC are the liberation side quest, which involves completing random events around the map in order to free slaves and obtain more rebels on the protagonist's side. Clearing these events becomes mandatory later on due to some main missions being unlocked only after a certain quota of slaves has been achieved. There are also some plantations the player can raid to further boost the rebels rank.

Aside from these events, Freedom Cry doesn't offer much new content or mechanics, fancing itself as just a smaller version of Black Flag which can be cleared in under four hours. It's also worth mentioning that the naval features are barely used in the DLC at all, due to the far smaller overall map and the main missions taking place mainly in Port'au'Prince.

What makes Freedom Cry worth a shot from any player from the Assassin's Creed series is the compelling story, which sets it quite apart from Edward's adventure and manages to be both engaging and rather touching",1412969931,1468752101,True,14,0,0.640748322010040283,0,False,False,False,False,,,

12438173,"{'steamid': '76561198088575296', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1429634540}",russian,35/100,1412965455,1549907827,False,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12434877,"{'steamid': '76561198059860556', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 652, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 652, 'last_played': 1412933865}",japanese,"アサシンクリード4で無駄に多かった収集品は大幅に減り、面倒だった発見即失敗ミッションがほぼなく遊びやすい。
奴隷農園開放ではステルス戦、奴隷船開放では海戦とメイン要素はしっかり味わえる。
だが数ヶ所ある農園は構造が同じで変わり映えがせず、最強ラッパ銃のアンロック条件がフルシンクロ達成なので入手しても使い道がない。
最大の不満は舟歌がない事で操船していて物足りなさを感じる。
ストーリーも復讐で苦しめて殺すというのがアサシンのやり方らしくなく腑に落ちない所。
コンパクトに纏まったアサシンクリード4といった感じで楽しいが、これならではの要素というのがなく安かったらオススメくらい。",1412947444,1412991787,True,12,1,0.603240072727203369,0,True,False,False,False,,,

ЗАЕБИСЬ ! и игра но не игра можно так сказать адон Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry тоже ЗАЕБИСЬ !",1412884912,1412884912,True,5,3,0.484644323587417603,0,False,False,False,False,,,

12426642,"{'steamid': '76561198037328996', 'num_games_owned': 1255, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1412882390}",french,"Un bon Dlc avec une campagne courte certe mais un scénario qui sort de l'ordinaire !  Un scénario bien réaliser . Nous incarnons Adewalé qui étais à l'époque avec le personnage De assassin's Creed VI Black flag .. ET nous avons pour objectif de libérer les esclaves dans plusieurs iles . Nous auront des choix à faire , bon ou mauvais ..  Des petites scénes marrantes sont au rendez vous avec une histoire , je le redit , palipante dans l'époque et la façon dont elle à étais refaite en jeux car cette histoire s'inspire évidément de fait réelle .

Il faut compter 6 heures de jeu pour la missions et arriver à 94 % de Synchronisation , en fin pour moi   aprés pour vous peux être qu'il faudras moin ou plus ...Un systéme  à répétition de libérer les esclaves de leurs boureaux ; ce qui est palipitant , que ce soit en mer ou sur terre . Des objectifs à accomplir qui devrait avoir pour but de finir le jeu ; Tout comme le quatre , il faut chercher des trésor et se battre avec son magnifique bateau
Les plus :

De Beau graphismes , un scénario bien repris , Quelques histoires du passés avec le jackdraw ( Assassin's creed Black flag ) , Facilité d'y aller en mode bourrin ou en mode silencieux et des batailles navales plus que complétes
Les moins :
Fait chauffer la carte graphique tout de même , trop parfois
Quelques bugs de colisions et autres mineurs
Je recommande évidemment ce jeu  car il en vaut la peine , croyais moi .. Mise à jour le 09/12/2014",1412882969,1418126826,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12421064,"{'steamid': '76561198052263435', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1412849459}",english,"If you are Porting a game from being a DLC to being a stand alone means you need to add contect for those players who bought it as stand alone. They failed at this. Instructions flash up on your screen super fast and if you miss them you have to dig deep into the menue to see them again, so I spent a LOT of time jumping back and forward from the menue.

Then theres no dialog, no music and no story contect for me at the beging. I don't know who i'm playing or why i'm ment to care and there's little make me want to find out. Then the second part of the opening level is an underwater scene. Underwater levels are almost universally hated in Video games, but Since Black Flag was so loved I figured they must have sorted this underwater shit out (it is a game set at sea after all), NOPE.

Breath bars, no weapons, marauding sharks and clumsy controls, all while i'm still learning how the game operates! I stopped there, and that's as far as I plan to take my Pirate adventures.",1412849885,1412849885,False,6,0,0.48336416482925415,1,True,False,False,False,,,

12296991,"{'steamid': '76561198068866968', 'num_games_owned': 449, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1340, 'last_played': 1457502330}",thai,"Assassin's Creed : Freedom Cry (2014)
ผมเป็นติ่งของ Assassin อยู่แล้วนะ แต่พอเล่นภาคนี้นี่เริ่มหวั่นๆเล็กน้อยนะ
-ความอลัง  ไม่ค่อยมีอะนะ มันก็คือ ภาค Black Frag ดีๆเนี่ยละ
-เนื้อเรื่อง    เหมือนจะน่าติดตามนะแต่ดูเวอร์ๆยังไงไม่รู้นะ ยังชอบภาค 3 มากกว่าอยู่ดี(ยากที่จะล้ม)
-เควส         เหวิ้นเหว้อ มากๆดูกลวงๆ เควสพาเสียเวลาเอาจริงๆไม่ค่อยมีอะไรมากแต่อ้อมไปมาไกลเท่านั้นเอง
-ระบบเรือ    ไม่ต่างจากภาค Black Frag เลย ดูๆไปพอเราได้
-Open World   ไม่กว้างอย่างที่คิด แต่ก็พอหาอะไรเล่นได้บ้าง เอาจริงๆน่า ไม่ค่อยปลื้ม ดูกลวงๆไปหมด
(ความคิดเห็นเพิ่ม)  ไม่ค่อยเหมาะกับพวกที่อยากมาเล่นธรรมดาอะ กลวงมากๆ ระบบเรือไม่ช่วยให้เกมดีขึ้นเลย

12280179,"{'steamid': '76561198154221472', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 963, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1500654497}",brazilian,"Gostei muito dele, ele é irado",1411930149,1411930149,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12222279,"{'steamid': '76561198047224328', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 580, 'last_played': 1411580592}",russian,"Хорошее дополнение к игре Assassin's Creed Black Flag IV жаль что короткое и ущербное, сразу видно что пытались сделать как можно скорее по одному сундуку на остров это уже даже не халявчики а проёбщики из Ubisoft((( 9 часов за 400 рублей не очень-то((( хотя я купил Assassin's Creed Black Flag Gold Edition и там Крик свободы идёт в комлекте как DLC и ещё я купил Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry как отдельную игру то есть заплатил дважды за этот DLC печальная история вообщем запомните если вы бирёте Assassin's Creed Black Flag IV Gold Edition или Assassin's Creed Black Flag IV Season Pass то Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry у вас уже есть плюс Авелина еще жаль что я это не знал раньше(( Оценка как и в полной игре 8\10",1411581321,1411581321,True,13,0,0.448982417583465576,0,True,False,False,False,,,

12213331,"{'steamid': '76561198071960199', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1435989454}",english,"This game is an absolute blast to play, provided you don't want to actually play the game and you're content to simply stare at the beautiful graphics motionless. When I say this game runs about as well as my 81 year old grandma who just had her hip replaced, I feel like I'm being generous. The number of times I've died due to unresponsive controls from the [i]single digit[/i] frame rate have me feeling like I could cut off my big toe from frustration. Taking a ship can be stressful enough simply because of the frustratingly poor camera controls and the series' signature crappy combat, but playing this in slide show mode can make it simply impossible. It isn't that I have the settings too high or that my rig is too old, I have two 4 gb gtx 760s going with a i7-3770k, far beyond the recommended settings, with the graphics settings on low, and still there is no noticeable improvement with the frame rate. I have to say that this is one time it's simply better to play the game on a console, unless you're okay with shit optimization and unresponsive controls. Then the game is fantastic, simply a must buy. Such a disappointment because this game could be so incredibly fun, but even moving your character around get incredibly jittery frame rates (I feel like I'm playing a ps3 instead of a $1600 gaming rig that handles far more intensive games with ease).

I'll definitely never be giving my money to Ubisoft again, that's one thing I've learned for sure. Putting out crap like this is unacceptable, not even AC4 stuttered this badly.",1411528161,1411528161,False,21,5,0.504215419292449951,0,False,False,False,False,,,

11895781,"{'steamid': '76561198054357894', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 857, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 857, 'last_played': 1408605619}",japanese,"8/10
まず日本語吹き替えあるのが超嬉しい。ゲームは吹き替えで楽しみたい派の自分としてはこの時点ですでに評価アップ！
で、肝心の内容はというと、今作では大きく分けて２つ、地上編と海上編があります。
地上編はこれまでのシリーズ同様、良くも悪くもアサシンクリードです。使用できるアイテムの種類やアップグレードが少ないことや、弟子などがいない所は追加コンテンツなのでしょうがないです。
自分はシリーズではBHとリベしかプレイしていません。キャラクターのもたつきは大分改善されてはいるのですが、相変わらず早く動きたい時に限ってセミのように壁に張り付いたり、壁の上にしゃがみ込み進むも降りるも出来ず地蔵のように固まったりでストレスの貯まる挙動が多々あります。
で、肝心の海上編はというと・・・これが凄く面白い！BHやリベでもミッションで船に乗って戦う事はありましたが、それをかなりグレードアップした感じです。
海賊船の船長として広いカリブの海を冒険する！男ならときめかないはずがない！昔大航海時代オンラインというゲームでちょっと帆船にハマった時期があり、ホーンブロワーなどの海洋アドベンチャー小説を読み漁った自分としてはこういうゲームをやりたかった！
追加コンテンツなので船のカスタマイズはあまり出来ませんが、好きな船種を選べたり、色々な大砲を積んだり、もう少し船の中を自由に動きまわる事ができたら神ゲー間違いなし！UBIさんには是非この路線のゲームを1つ出していただきたい！",1409225582,1409226037,True,10,0,0.532949388027191162,0,True,False,False,False,,,

11891168,"{'steamid': '76561198061919148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1067, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 893, 'last_played': 1448138713}",french,.20/20,1409182769,1409182769,True,2,0,0.48207169771194458,0,True,False,False,False,,,

11888556,"{'steamid': '76561198007104822', 'num_games_owned': 783, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 655, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 655, 'last_played': 1409154498}",english,"Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry.
While not throwing stealth away completely, this game trades up stealth for some head on action sequences.
You play as Adewale, 15 years after the events of Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag.
Older, wiser and now a fully trained assassin. He even gets his own murder hood.

Much of the in game assets were from ACIV:BF so the graphics are more or less the same. Gameplay wise as well, but again more action than stealth really. And his attack animations, though not as fluid or graceful as i expected assassins would be, he has a sort of brutal flair that really defines him as an assassin. Not just Edward Kenway reskinned to be Adewale.
Weapons in Freedom Cry are different as they got rid of swords and daggers. You get machetes for Adewale instead. (This does not prevent you from picking up and using a sword from a slain enemy.)
No flintlock pistols, just a blunderbuss for you, Ade.
You still have your own pair of Hidden Blades of course.

The whole campaign itself is short and sweet. It left me wanting more from it, more of what happens to Adewale, more of what becomes of the liberated slaves and their resistance and more of what happened to the Assassins after Black Flag.
For a DLC turned standalone game, it has a lot more content than one would expect.
Honestly i thought it was just gonna be a bunch of uninspired self contained missions, but this totally blew me away.
I dare say Adewale was more fun to play with than Connor. But of course, that is my opinion.

Get it on sale if you feel that $15 is still too much. Get it however you can as it is a very good game and you won't really regret playing it.",1409165848,1409165956,True,395,4,0.942232728004455566,7,False,False,False,False,,,

11877091,"{'steamid': '76561197979084213', 'num_games_owned': 4499, 'num_reviews': 1010, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1409080375}",english,"+ Plenty of content
+ Same pretty graphics as in Black Flag (obviously)
+ Feels more action oriented (instead of stealthy), and because of it feels sort of fresh
- More glitches and bugs
- Repetitive missions with little variety
- Story not so interesting

11868109,"{'steamid': '76561198000735651', 'num_games_owned': 741, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 1071, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 766, 'last_played': 1509075441}",english,"It took me 12.8 hours to finish a 3 hour game… BECAUSE IT WAS AMAZING! The story in Assassin’s Creed Freedom Cry was SOOO MUCH MORE EMOTIONAL than it was in Assassin’s Creed IV Black Flag! I absolutely love this game! UGH! SO GOOD! I bought this game before Black Flag as a stand alone expansion but once I finish Black Flag today, I decided to finish it and it was SOOO GOOD! I recommend it especially if you have only so little to spend on games :P It is super cheap",1409021798,1409021798,True,44,0,0.675661087036132813,0,True,False,False,False,,,

11838325,"{'steamid': '76561197971042239', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 969, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 969, 'last_played': 1409611028}",english,"I was compelled to try 'Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry' after learning that slavery is the primary theme of the game. It is a game full of potential -- beautiful graphics, excellent voice acting, and a seldomly explored subject matter tied together with a commercially proven gaming formula. Yet, while 'Freedom Cry' was not horrible, it was not stellar or impressive as it should be. What we got is a game with a partially developed character, about whom I actually want to learn more, in a half-baked story that felt like 'Assassin's Creed' Lite.

It was innovative to play as a slave-turned-Assassin, who despite having gifts and talents bestowed upon him by the Brotherhood, still needed to be weary of slave jailers because of the colour of his skin. This was enough to change the usual pace of an 'Assassin's Creed' game, and I quite enjoyed that. Not needing to deal with modern day Abstergo/Animus story elements was also very welcomed, but it was odd to see the concept of synchronicity being left in the game. The modern day story elements in 'Assassin's Creed' had always felt like Ubisoft lacked confidence in a loosely historical third-person stealth action game. 'Freedom Cry' would have been the perfect opportunity for the franchise to distant itself from this extraneous story element, but that chance was unfortunately wasted.

My biggest complaint about 'Freedom Cry', is the naval combat. As someone who had not played 'Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag', I found the learning curve for naval warfare to be steep. There wasn't much of a tutorial and it took much trial and error for me to fully understand the basic mechanics. Plus, there was one mission that would have been difficulty to complete if I had not fully upgraded my ship through constant pirating. Such level grinding has no place in a game like 'Freedom Cry' as it slowed the entire game down. That and the repetitiveness and general lack of mission variety made the game rather tedious at times. Seriously, how many eavesdropping missions did 'Freedom Cry' really need for a nine-mission game?

The theme of slavery is both a shining factor and a major weakness of 'Freedom Cry'. I got much satisfaction freeing slaves in the game, but when the number of slaves I freed became the currency of weapon upgrades eligibility, I became frustrated. Shouldn't I be freeing slaves because it is the right thing to do and because it is the main character's motivation, not because of a weapon upgrade? Plus, why would black merchants, who knew I free slaves, only sell me weapons if I meet a quota? This game mechanic, while thematically important, was not very well thought out and well implemented.

For those who have played 'Black Flag', 'Freedom Cry' may appeal to you, but for those who haven't, your time may be better spent on other games than this somewhat mediocre entry to the 'Assassin's Creed' franchise.",1408828492,1409612455,False,109,3,0.600208163261413574,5,False,False,False,False,,,

11829107,"{'steamid': '76561198142312631', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1432465110}",english,how do you get the code,1408776147,1408776147,True,1,1,0.473542600870132446,0,True,False,False,False,,,

11816857,"{'steamid': '76561198020787303', 'num_games_owned': 297, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 440, 'last_played': 1408696712}",japanese,"海賊船の副官だったアドウェールの後日談で、黒人奴隷を解放するための反乱組織マルーンと共同戦線を張るという話。テンプル騎士団とはあまり関係がないのでストーリーは理解しやすい。
ゲーム内容は本編の各要素を簡略化しつつ詰め込んであり、海戦と暗殺、それから奴隷の解放がメイン。
船の強化や装備品の強化も健在だが、短時間でフル強化できるようになっている。
プレイ時間はメインストーリーのみ進めると３時間、寄り道もすべて終えると８時間程度。
特に不満点はなかったので、アサクリシリーズが好きな人はおすすめ。
操作方法のチュートリアルが無いので、経験が無いと面食らうかもしれない。特にゲーム開幕の海戦。
ちなみにストアページに日本語表記がないが、ＵＩ、字幕、吹き替えすべて日本語あり。",1408697566,1419347587,True,71,0,0.818421661853790283,0,True,False,False,False,,,

11807242,"{'steamid': '76561198089903392', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1452057799}",koreana,"어쌔신 크리드 프리덤 크라이는 아드왈레의 몸이 일단 죽여주고 무기가 마체테이기 때문에 써는 맛이 있다. 해상전은 온 몸에 전율이 흐르고, 미션은 긴박하고 재미있으며, 강추이다.",1408631286,1408631286,True,0,0,0,0,False,False,False,False,,,

11758147,"{'steamid': '76561198120802437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 444, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 444, 'last_played': 1408307938}",italian,"***S P O I L E R****
Allora il gioco non è male, ma la durata è qualcosa di insignificante, di solito un gioco quando ha una staoria breve ha 2 cose:
1 il multiplayer
2 O una storia fatta bene e coinvolgente
Guarda caso nessuno dei 2 è presente,
So benissimo che è un' espansione, ma è anche stand alone, quindi almeno 6 ore dovrebbe durare...
Le missioni secondarie, sono sempre uguali e mancano di originalità, ovvero:
A: Libera gli schiavi dalle piantagioni dove sono rinchiusi
B: Assalta le navi dove sono tenuti prigionieri gli schiavi
C: Trova tesori nascosti
D: Visita relitti sottomarini
E molte altre cose già presenti in Assassin' s creed 4 Black Flag...
Da fan della saga posso dire che è il peggior capitolo/espansione della saga di Assassin's creed... Senza contare che il prezzo è eccessivo in una maniera vergognosa, cazzo 15 euro che volano via...

11704851,"{'steamid': '76561198014766672', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 398, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1408041892}",english,"The final Assassins Creed game of the marathon and the series. Freedom Cry is actually a standalone game of Blackflag era. Although I wasn't a huge fan of Blackflag, this one did end up with me wanting more at the end.

The main character, Adewalé, who also played a part in Blackflag is one of the most bad-ass characters I've played, not just in Assassin's Creed, but gaming as a whole. The is built like a tank, and won't take any crap from anybody. Proper bad ass.

The story is very DLC style length, and leaves you wanting more after you complete the main mission. There is still plenty of side quests, challenges and hidden treasures to find once you finish it, so for a standalone game, the quantity of gameplay is actually rather impressive.
Graphics wise, very impressive. Built on the same engine as Blackflag, you will not find your self disappointed at the visual side of this title.

I would highly recommend this game. If you are unsure about purchasing Blackflag, this is probably your best starting point as the gameplay is exactly the same, almost like a long demo. As a stand alone as well, this is a very well put together game that you will certainly get a lot of enjoyment out of.
More reviews at - http://completingthebacklog.blogspot.co.uk/

,1408044106,1408044106,True,48,2,0.603003442287445068,1,True,False,False,False,,,
11628802,{'steamid': '76561198085442752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1625, 'last_played': 1449613166}",brazilian,"Sem palavras, uma DLC que veio para arrebentar. A jogabilidade é ótima, os gráficos te deixam boquiaberto e o enredo, pelos deuses, que enredo mais bem bolado e encaixado na história.

Seu personagem é Adewale que deixou de ser escravo para tornar-se um pirata e entrar na ordem dos Assassinos (Para quem jogou o Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag, ""Ade"" era o contra-mestre de Edward Kenway). Ao chegar na ilha do Haiti, o nosso novo assassino luta pela liberdade do povo, libertando e recrutando diversos escravos durante sua jornada.
Observações:
* No final da história de Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag Adewale se ingressa na ordem dos assassinos;
* Em uma das falas de Adewale em Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry, Kenway e seu navio o Gralha, são mencionados;
* Freedom Cry ocorre alguns anos depois do Black Flag.",1407679173,1407679173,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

11375809,"{'steamid': '76561198084944727', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1412205962}",english,"Great game. In my opinion Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag was one of the best, if not the best game of the series. It felt really good to be able to play something related to it just a little bit more. 11192210,"{'steamid': '76561197995669497', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 854, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 801, 'last_played': 1408017805}",english,"The game is a mixed bag, it gives you 4-6 hours of simple fun with a few long story missions but also makes things way to simple/basic. The game really shines with the navy combat, over the few hours you will go from what feels like a small fishing boat to a battleship, with small whaling mini games and a few small beaches to explore.
I think its a fantastic buy for those who want a short game and dont need to invest too much time into a complex game.",1405129074,1405129126,True,2,0,0.530547857284545898,0,True,False,False,False,,,

10924442,"{'steamid': '76561198004651403', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1403687041}",english,"I wouldn't say this is one of the better Assassin's Creed games I've played.  The storyline was a bit iffy and not much happened.  I wasn't really sure what was happening with that Templar package.  This game did not really make an impact on the series, being that the storyline was so short and too simple.  I spent 6 hours in the game and that was me taking my time.  There was a lack of actual Assassins at work other than our protagonist.  Although slavery itself is historically accurate, not much of what Adewale did seemed to be on the history timeline. 10883663,"{'steamid': '76561198090468054', 'num_games_owned': 3608, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 621, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 621, 'last_played': 1403902577}",italian,"Questo gioco è un piccolo siparietto ottimamente realizzato sul periodo storico e sul luogo che vuol rappresentare. Tutto viene delinato con toni a tratti retorici e a tratti non, esattamente come il gioco di cui era in origine dlc, rendendo alla fine una sensazione di ""verità"" veramente immersiva. In questo la saga di AC ha fatto passi da gigante. Da notare la spettacolare colonna sonora, remix orchestrato di temi popolari haitiani. Non ci sono notevoli innovazioni di gameplay rispetto agli altri capitoli della saga: il machete e la spingarda sono più revisioni estetiche che vertono su un senso di maggiore brutalità. La trama per essere così breve ha dei momenti salienti di grande tensione, come la nave di schiavi che affonda e il finale, anch'esso rapido ma molto  profondo nelle gestualità e d'atmosfera.

Unica pecca è la davvero pessima ottimizzazione per pc, che mi ha costretto a giocare a una risoluzione abbastanza bassa per avere un'esperienza fluida (e su questo pc girano giochi coevi al massimo!). Per il resto, acquisto consigliatissimo per i fan e non della saga.",1403901761,1403901761,True,0,0,0,0,True,False,False,False,,,

10405558,"{'steamid': '76561198045841853', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 715, 'last_played': 1441805008}",koreana,"어쌔신 크리드 4의 dlc인 프리덤 크라이(통칭 흑쌔신크리드)
3랑 4 하기전에 해봤지만 재미있다.확실히 dlc의 한계가 있지만 재미는 충분하다.
-장점
첫째.그래픽이 죽여준다. 내가 지금까지 어쌔신크리드 시리즈를 하면서 이렇게 좋은 그래픽은 복적이없다(나이스 잡 유비소프트)맵의 표현이라던가 인물의 표현도 나쁘지 않았다.
둘째. 전투가 재미있다. 기존 어쌔신들이 쓰는 나약한 총과 검과는 다른 크고 아름다운 마체테와 총은 학살을 하기에는 충분했다.
오죽하면 필자는 어쌔신크리드 3를 하다가 빡칠정도.그리고 해상전투도 한 몫을 한 것 같다.물론 처음에 해상전투를 제대로 할 줄 몰라서 어버버  했지만 나중가면 일부러 싸움을걸고 약탈을 일삼게 될정도. 그리고 맵이 넓고 컨텐츠가 많아서 즐길거리가 많은것 같다.
-단점(개인적인 평입니다.)
우선적으로는 이 게임은 dlc기 때문에 스토리가 짧다. 그리고 주인공도 하는 일이라곤 하나부터 열까지 노예해방뿐이다.그렇기 때문에 하다보면 좀 질릴때가 있다. 그리고 맵이 너무 넓어서 탐험을 귀찮아하는 유저라면 음...그냥 스토리만 하시길...그리고 뭐랄까 아드웰은 뭔가 암살자라기 보단 학살자?느낌이 매우 강해서...좀 아쉽긴했다.
어차피 프리덤 크라이는 dlc이기 때문에 그렇게 큰걸 바랄순 없지만 이 정도면 dlc라해도 매우 흡족하다.(다른 dlc발들은..... 좀 그렇지...)당신이 정말로 골수 어쌔신크리드 팬이고,짱짱쎈 흑형과 함께 정글을 누비며 노예들을 해방하고 학살을 하고 약탈과 모험을 하고싶다면 꼭 하길 바랍니다.

10345288,{'steamid': '76561198097251562', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1418467387}",english,"Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag: Freedom Cry Standalone game review:

In this Assassin's Creed game you are Adewale, a big black dude with a machete and a blunderbuss (Big shotgunny thing). You were formerly a slave, working on a plantation until pirates raided it. Although Adewale was previously the legendary Edward Kenway's Quartermaster, Adewale found that he wanted to save slaves, rather than be a pirate. In this game, you follow him across the Carribean, as he liberates slaves and recruits maroons.

The quality of the game is FANTASTIC! A new feature for the AC series (which was also introduced in Black Flag) is sailing across open world areas, rather than only whilst on missions (in Assassin's Creed 3). Sailing is incredibly simple as all you do is press the forward key, maybe move left and right, etc. A feature of the game (which personally had me excited) was the ability to board other enemy vessels. Boarding too is simple. All you do is press the S key (or whatever you have set stop to) whilst alongside another almost destroyed vessel, and it will automatically cause your ship to dock alongside. Your crew too will react, throwing Grappling hooks to draw your vessels nearer to each other.Your crew will then board the vessel and so on. The Graphics in the game are of a high standard, as Nvidia is involved (seeing as modern Nvidia games are awesome), so you will need at least a 2.6 GHZ processor and a decent graphics card to withstand the urges ingame. The fighting style in AC4 is incredibly similar to that of AC3, with only a couple of differences. For £11 I am incredibly happy, aand will be getting Black Flag soon.",1401895601,1401895601,True,1,0,0.496062248945236206,0,True,False,False,False,,,

9900582,"{'steamid': '76561197997692330', 'num_games_owned': 918, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 886, 'last_played': 1396209789}",english,"AMAZING GAME.  It's rather short of course, but the developers have a nice creativity meets willingness to pay margin here in my opinion.  If you don't own AC4 get this now, if you do own it maybe pass because it's more of the same but slighty less of it.. YES it's another AC BUT the pirate theme which is briefly touched upon in 3 is SOOO much cooler here.

Tropical Island paradises ripped right out of history you most likely never knew about.  The game even includes the option to learn all about the people and events in their thesarus thing built into the menu.

The graphics are breathtaking and the story telling is better than ever.  I had to try out AC4 after playing this and my mind was blown.  For the money try this and see if you like the new theme.  It's the new direction they are going and it's interesting.  Keep in mind though AC4 is much more cinematic and much more enveloping as you experience life outside the Anemus and whatnot.

ALSO EVERYBODY HATES UPLAY INCLUDING ME, It's not as bad as others but giving players the option to choose would go a long ways.",1398179340,1398179579,True,2,0,0.513592839241027832,0,True,False,False,False,,,

9591470,"{'steamid': '76561197971485856', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1395345843}",english,"If you've beaten Black Flag and want more, this will mostly do the trick. Set 13-15 years after AC4, Adewale has risen from Kenway's right-hand man, to a full-fledged Assassin/Captain. After an intense opening scene, he finds himself washed ashore and caught in the midst of a civil struggle. It's time to free some slaves, hence the subtitle of the game. There are many different scenarios in which you can free said slaves. Some will be locked in a cage, and you have to kill the guard carrying the key. Others will be working on plantations, in which you must eliminate a certain number of guards to free them.

Freeing as many slaves as possible actually grants you bonuses, and sometimes even needed to advance the story. The bonuses range from free restocks on ammunition, to even new weapons. With slaves pratically all over the place ready to be liberated, achieving these bonuses doesn't exactly take a long time.

As you'd expect, Freedom Cry does have naval content, including it's own (DLC sized) open-world map. Attacking and boarding other ships for goods is still relevant, but nowhere near as much as Black Flag. A lot of the locations to discover are unfortunately pretty dull. There's several islands which consist of only a small beach and one chest to open, then you're done there. I'm not sure why Ubisoft even bothered, as it's probably the most disappointing part of FC. Still, just sailing the open sea remains a joy to behold. No sea shanties (pirate songs), however.

Just like Black Flag, Freedom Cry is GORGEOUS. It's a shame that sometimes some information is still present on your screen, even with the HUD options turned ""all off"", because I love taking clean screenshots. Even so, it's such a beautiful game to behold, especially the water. You'll catch yourself just staring at the visuals and remember there's a game to play.

I was surprised with the length of FC. I expected to be done in about 3-4 hours, but my save file clocks-in at almost 9 hours. That's including all side-content. Not a bad chunk of time for a piece of something that's stand-alone DLC. So, if you want a demo of Black Flag, this is the closest you'll get of that experience. Granted, Black Flag is obviously the fuller experience, but I do recommend buying this if you're wondering what it's like.

I am pleased with the time I spent with Freedom Cry. A lovely slice of Assassin/Pirate content to keep one's interest for a decent amount of time.",1395476280,1395476280,True,2,0,0.53057408332824707,0,True,False,False,False,,,

9387729,"{'steamid': '76561198084916065', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1425808981}",german,"Assassin´s Creed Freedom Cry, der neueste Standalone-DLC des 2013 erschienenen Assassin´s Creed 4 Black Flag, hat mich positiv überrascht.

Die Erweiterung handelt von Adéwalé, dem als Sklave geborenen und in die Freiheit entflohenen Quartiermeister an Bord der Jackdaw, welches unter Edward Kenways Kommando segelte. 15 Jahre später ist er bereits von den Assassinen ausgebildet worden und selber Kapitän seines eigenen Schiffs. Nach einem heftigen Unwetter findet er sich gestrandet in Saint-Dominque wieder, einem von den Franzosen besetzter Teil der Karibik. Dort trifft er auf die Maroon, die ihn überreden können sie zu unterstützen und die Sklaven zu befreien.

Optisch betrachtet hat Ubisoft mit Freedom Cry zwar keine Meisterleistung vollbracht, aber schön anzusehen ist es trotzdem. Auch das HUD ist benutzerfreundlich aufgebaut und leicht zu verstehen. Neben der Stadt Saint-au-Prince kann man in dem Open-World-Adventure mehrere kleine Inseln sowie Plantagen erkunden. Bei seiner Erkundungsreise findet man neue Waffen, Beutel und Veränderungen für Adéwalés Schiff, der Experto Crede. Die ganze Karibik zu erforschen wurde uns in dem DLC verwehrt, lediglich der Süd-Osten des karibischen Meers ist begehbar. Storymäßig hält Freedom Cry im Prinzip eine ca. 3-4 stündige Befreihungsaktion von Sklaven bereit, welche allerdings mehr Action bietet als die ersten sieben Sequenzen von Black Flag. Neben der Action sind auch wie in jedem Assassin´s Creed Schleichmissionen vorhanden, welche mich in diesem DLC eher weniger gestört haben als in Black Flag, da sich Adéwalé als gebranntmarkter, afrikanischer Immigrant vor Sklavenhändlern verdeckt halten muss. Freedom Cry lässt sich wie jedes Spiel der Serie einfach spielen und erfordert keinerlei Erfahrung im Umgang mit Controller bzw. mit Maus & Tastatur. Als In-Game Sound hat sich Ubisoft für afrikanische Stammeslieder & viel Percussion-Musik entschieden. Eine gute Entscheidung, da diese hervorragend zum Spiel und der Handlung passen.

Zusammenfassend ist Assassin´s Creed Freedom Cry eine gelungene und spielbare Erweiterung zu Black Flag, die ihr Geld allemal wert ist. Zwar habe ich noch ein paar Mängel, wie zb. die verkleinerte Spielwelt oder dass es nur eine Hand voll Freischaltbares gibt, allerdings unterliegen diese Nachteile den Vorteilen des DLC´s.",1394302138,1394818186,True,51,2,0.843684136867523193,0,False,False,False,False,,,

9285497,"{'steamid': '76561197963593718', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1498326827}",english,"This game is  a fun, compelling and interesting addition to the Asssassin's Creed franchise. It borrows the ACIV: Black Flag engine and a character from the game. As with other Assassin's Creed games this one introduces a new character (though Adewale is introduced in ACIV: Black Flag) with a unique Assassins vs. Templars storyline. If you held off on buying ACIV: Black Flag as I did then this game will offer insight into what you are missing. It is the same classic Assassin's Creed formula that makes the series fun with new location, improved visuals and continues the Assassin's fight for a noble cause.
I highly recommend it!",1393547442,1393995479,True,34,0,0.625290155410766602,2,True,False,False,False,,,
